sql.sql: SELECT AY.JCAYXXUUID, AY.JCAYBH, AY.SWJCAYZT_DM, AY.JLRQ, AY.JLR_DM, AY.nsrsbh, AY.nsrmc FROM JC_AYXX AY, JC_AYXX_LYMX MX WHERE AY.JCAYXXUUID = MX.JCAYXXUUID AND MX.JCAYXXLY_DM = ? AND AY.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND AY.AYSZJG_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.JLRQ = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR MX.AYXXTGFMC LIKE ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.JCAYBH = ?) AND AY.SWJCAYZT_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.HY_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.DJZCLX_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.ZGSWJG_DM = ?) order by ay.lrrq asc
select t.* from jc_swcljds t where t.swcljdsuuid = $uuid$
select * from NP_SSQBSBQKB b where b.gjssqbdjbuuid= ? and b.tbdw=?

with a as (select swjg_dm from fz_byswxzcfjds where byswxzcfjdsuuid = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, fz_byswxzcfjds b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh=$value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.XZFYSQDJBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.AJLY, T.AJBH_1, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.XZJJSQFS_DM, T.SQRLB_DM, T.SQRXM, T.SQRSFZJHM, T.SQRXB_DM, T.SQRNL, T.SQRMZMC, T.SQRJG, T.SQRZS, T.SQRYZBM, T.SQRLXDH, T.SQRGZDWMC, T.SQRZW, T.SQRFRHQTZZMC, T.SQRFRHQTZZLXDH, T.SQRFRHQTZZDZ, T.SQRFRHQTZZYZBM, T.SQRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRXM, T.SQRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRZW, T.SQRDLRMC, T.SQDLRXB_DM, T.SQDLRNL, T.SQRDLRZZ, T.SQRDLRGZDWMC, T.SQRDLRZW, T.DSRLX_DM, T.DSRXM_1, T.DSRSFZJHM, T.DSRXB_DM, T.DSRNL, T.DSRMZMC, T.DSRJG, T.DSRZS, T.DSRYZBM, T.DSRLXDH, T.DSRGZDWMC, T.DSRZW_1, T.DSRFRHQTZZMC, T.DSRFRHQTZZLXDH, T.DSRFRHQTZZDZ, T.DSRFRHQTZZYZBM, T.DSRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRXM, T.DSRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRZW, T.DSRDLRMC, T.DSRDLRXB_DM, T.DSRDLRNL, T.DSRDLRZZ, T.DSRDLRGZDWMC, T.DSRDLRZW, T.BSQRMC_1, T.BSQRFZRXM, T.BSQRDZ, T.BSQRYZBM, T.BSQRLXDH, T.FYSQDYJTXZXWMC, T.JTXZXWZL, T.FYSQDYJTXZXWWSZG, T.FYSQDYJTXZXWZCRQ, T.FYSQDYJTXZXWZCYJ, T.FYQQ, T.ZYSSHLY, T.XZFYJG_DM, T.XZFYJGMC, T.XZFYJGDZ, T.SQRQ, T.SDFYSQRQ, T.SFYQTJGYFZS, T.AJLYLX_DM, T.YAJBH, T.YAJMC, T.ZSJGMC_1, T.ZSRQ_1, T.DJR, T.DJRQ, T.SQR, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SFJGFYJD, T.SSHJ_DM, T.FYAJZT, T.BHFYSQZT, T.TSZT, T.ZLSLZT, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FZ_XZFYSQDJB T WHERE T.JTXZXWZL = $value1$ AND T.FYSQDYJTXZXWMC = $value2$ AND T.FYSQDYJTXZXWWSZG = $value3$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from fz_gy_fjb t where t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select z.sjfhfpzbuuid, z.sjfhfpuuid, z.fpmc, z.fpzl_dm, z.fpfs, z.fpqshm, z.fpzzhm, z.bz, z.xh from fz_sjfhfpzb z, fz_sjfhfp f where f.sjfhfpuuid = z.sjfhfpuuid and f.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = $uuid$
select t.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid, t.yzpzxh from fz_shbxfxzcfjdsjy t where t.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yzpzxh is not null
select yhhb_dm as pcode,yhyywd_dm as code ,yhyywdmc as caption from dm_gy_yhyywd where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y' and yhhb_dm=? and xzqhsz_dm=?

select dj.nsrsbh, dj.djxh, dj.nsrmc, sj.swjgjg || sj.zg || '〔' || sj.nh || '〕' || sj.wh || '号' as sjtgjdswszg, sj.tgsjfprq, sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, sj.sswfxwdjuuid, fp.sjfhfpuuid,sj.sjly_dm,sj.lrswjg_dm,sj.gsnsrglm from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb sj, fz_sjfhfp fp, fz_sswfxwdj dj, dj_nsrxx nsrxx where sj.sswfxwdjuuid = dj.sswfxwdjuuid and sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = fp.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid(+) and dj.djxh = nsrxx.djxh(+) and sj.zstybz = ? and (sj.zfbz_1 = ? or sj.zfbz_1 is null) and sj.tgsjfpjcbz = ? and (sj.swjg_dm = ? or nsrxx.zgswj_dm in (#macroparam#) or nsrxx.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) or sj.lrswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and dj.nsrsbh = ? and sj.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(sj.lcbjbz, 'N') = ?
select t.* from jc_swjcjl t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select jds.swcljdsuuid as uuid, jds.sjslid, 'BDA1120037' as dzbzdszlDm, jds.swjgjg, jds.zg, jds.nh, jds.wh from jc_swcljds jds where (jds.zfbz_1 is null or jds.zfbz_1 = 'N') and jds.jcajxxuuid = ? union all select jl.swjcjluuid as uuid, jl.sjslid, 'BDA1120036' as dzbzdszlDm, jl.swjgjg, jl.zg, jl.nh, jl.wh from jc_swjcjl jl where (jl.zfbz_1 is null or jl.zfbz_1 = 'N') and jl.jcajxxuuid = ? union all select cfjds.swxzcfjdsuuid as uuid, cfjds.sjslid, 'BDA1220090' as dzbzdszlDm, cfjds.swjgjg, cfjds.zg, cfjds.nh, cfjds.wh from fz_swxzcfjds cfjds where (cfjds.zfbz_1 is null or cfjds.zfbz_1 = 'N') and cfjds.sswfxwdjuuid = ? union all select bycfjds.byswxzcfjdsuuid as uuid, bycfjds.sjslid, 'BDA1220084' as dzbzdszlDm, bycfjds.swjgjg, bycfjds.zg, bycfjds.nh, bycfjds.wh from fz_byswxzcfjds bycfjds where (bycfjds.zfbz_1 is null or bycfjds.zfbz_1 = 'N') and bycfjds.sswfxwdjuuid = ? union all select tqs.zdswajsltqsuuid as uuid, tqs.sjslid, 'BDA1120044' as dzbzdszlDm, tqs.swjgjg, tqs.zg, tqs.nh, tqs.wh from jc_zdswajsltqs tqs where nvl(tqs.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and tqs.jcajxxuuid = ?

select djb.sswfxwjjdjbuuid, djb.jcayxxuuid, djb.jcajxxuuid, djb.bjjrmc, djb.bjjrdjxh, djb.jjzynr, jjr.sswfxwjjdjbjjrxxuuid, jjr.jjrxm_1, jjr.jjrq_1, jjr.jjrsfzjzl_dm, jjr.jjrsfzjhm, jjr.jjrdwmc, jjr.jjrdz, jjr.jjrlxdh, jjr.jjxs_dm from jc_sswfxwjjdjb djb, jc_sswfxwjjdjb_jjrxx jjr, jc_ajxx aj where djb.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = jjr.sswfxwjjdjbuuid and djb.jcajxxuuid = aj.jcajxxuuid and jjr.jjlx_dm = '1' and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrxm_1 like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrdz like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrdwmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrlxdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrsfzjzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrsfzjhm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or aj.ajjczt_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(djb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(jjr.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(aj.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (djb.ajszjg_dm = ? or aj.ajszjg_dm = ?)

select t.UUID, t.WSBH, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.AJBH, t.AJBH_1, t.AJMC, t.NSRMC, t.NSRSBH, t.SQLX, t.CYHZCFZNR, t.CYHZCFZR, t.CYHZCFZRQ, t.AJGLRY, t.JYAJZLMCHZNR, t.SQYYJYJ, t.SQR, t.SQRQ, t.AJJYGHYS, t.AJJYGHRQ, t.JYR, t.JYRLXDH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SJSLID from JC_AJGLCL t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPJKZX T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.JLBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM, T.JARQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM JC_AJXX T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.DJXH =?

select T.SQSWRYHBJDUUID, T.SQSWRYHBCLUUID, T.YUUID, T.DJXH, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.WSZG, T.YJ_1, T.SCJDNR, T.SFFH, T.FHJDNR, T.SCWSZG, T.WSZZRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ from FZ_SQSWRYHBJD T where T.SQSWRYHBJDUUID = $UUID$
select t.tqzjthqduuid, t.thrq_1, t.swjg_dm, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.wsbh, t.zjtgdwjbrqz, t.sjslid, t.zjtgdwgrqz from JC_TQZJTHQD t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid ,t.ywzjuuid,t.dzbzdszl_dm,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_Zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$
select t.gljg_dm from dm_qx_znjgdzbkz_jcjg t where t.jcjg_dm=?

select distinct t.jcayxxuuid, t.jcaybh, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.jlrq, t.wsbh from jc_ayxx t, jc_ayxx_lymx ly where not exists (select la.jcayxxuuid from jc_lasqb la where t.jcayxxuuid = la.jcayxxuuid and (la.zfbz_1 is null or la.zfbz_1 = 'N')) and t.jcayxxuuid = ly.jcayxxuuid(+) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zgswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.hy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ly.jcayxxly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajclyj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcaybh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.swjcayzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jlrq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djzclx_dm = ?) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.ayszjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.jcajxxuuid is null

select t.ncbtskhzbuuid, t.swjcbguuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.wfwzxw_dm, t.wfwzlx_dm, t.jsyjsbs, t.jsyjtzs, t.mbyqndks, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.ynse_1, t.ybtse, t.ncfbs, t.ncfje, t.zgswjg_dm, t.mswfsdje, t.xxsesbs, t.ynsesbs, t.ldsesbs, t.xxsetzse, t.xxsetjse, t.jxsetzse, t.jxsetjse, t.sjslid, t.hdslid, t.bz_1, t.ldsetze, t.jxsesbs, t.zszm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.djxh, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.sfxcznjqs, t.qcldse, t.znjjsrqq, t.znjjsrqz, t.zszspm_dm ,t.htqdrq from JC_NCBTSKHZB t where t.swjcbguuid = $uuid$ order by t.zspm_dm asc, t.skssqq asc, t.skssqz asc

SELECT T1.YYDJSXXXUUID,T2.SDWSUUID,T1.WSZG,T2.WSSDSJ FROM (SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_YYDJAPTJZSSQTZS WHERE NVL(ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND YYDJSXXXUUID= ? )T1 LEFT JOIN ZH_SDXX T2 ON T2.AJXXUUID=T1.YYDJSXXXUUID AND T2.SDWSUUID=T1.YYDJAPTJZSSQTZSUUID
SELECT * FROM jc_qysdsjsb a WHERE a.sjslid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

with a as (select swjg_dm, dzbzdszl_dm from jc_swjctzsy where SWJCTZSYUUID = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, jc_swjctzsy b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and b.dzbzdszl_dm = a.dzbzdszl_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh = $value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.djxh,t.sswflx_Dm,t.sswfsd_dm,t.ssqjq_1,t.ssqjz_1,t.zfr_dm,t.zfrq_1,t.lcslid from fz_sswfxwdj t where t.sswfxwdjuuid =? and nvl(t.zfbz_1 ,'N') ='N'
SELECT N.TBNSDCJAZJHSFSBUUID, N.TBNSDCAJXXUUID, N.LCSLID, N.TJBZ, N.ZJZCY, N.FSZT_DM, N.HSFSRQ, N.HSJZRQ FROM NP_TBNSDCJAZJHSFSB N WHERE N.PARENTPROCESSID = ?

select b.bguuid, b.fxydxh, b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.nsrmc, b.atshzsyj, b.pgajbh, b.ydczswjg_dm, s.swyttzsuuid, s.ytsj, s.tgzl, s.lxr_dm, s.lxdh, s.ytdd, s.swjgjg, s.zg, s.nh, s.wh, s.wszzrq, s.swjg_dm, s.lcslid, s.sjslid, s.qtryxm, s.sy, s.qtsm, s.ssyd, s.yj_1 from np_swyttzs s, np_ssfxydbg b where s.nspgajxxuuid = b.bguuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.swyttzsuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.* from jc_swjcslbg t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid,t.ywzjuuid,t.dzbzdszl_dm,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.fhzdywqsmc,t.cpgg,t.sl,t.dj from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_Zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$
update jc_cbyjsyqkb t set t.sybz = ? where t.yjsksyqkbuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.* from fz_swsxtzs t where t.slbz = 'B' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$
select count(*) from np_nspgajxxb where (ajzt_dm = 0 or ajzt_dm is null) and djxh = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
update NP_GXSSYBTMXB g set g.tbnsdctztzsuuid ='',g.xgrq=?,xgr_dm=? where g.tbnsdctztzsuuid=?
select swjg_dm, swjgmc, port, ip from cs_np_fxglfxhyfkb where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

select ajxx.jcajxxuuid, ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid, ajxx.jcajbh, ajxx.ajmc, ajxx.LABM_DM, ajxx.sjskze, ajxx.sjfkze, ajxx.djxh, ajxx.nsrsbh, ajxx.nsrmc from jc_ajxx ajxx, jc_ayxx_lymx ayxxlymx, JC_AYXX ayxx where ajxx.ajjczt_dm in (#macroparam#) and ajxx.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and ayxx.jcajxxuuid = ajxx.jcajxxuuid and ayxx.jcayxxuuid = ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.djzclx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ayxxlymx.jcayxxly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.hy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.labm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.jcbm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.sjskze = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.sjfkze = ?) and (ajxx.wtajbz is null or ajxx.wtajbz = 'N')
select yhhb_dm as code ,yhhbmc as caption from dm_gy_yhhb where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y'
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPZSSQS_FSZLQK T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ? ) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FJUUID = ? )
select t.ywzjuuid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.ywuuid from np_zdydsjxx t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.ywuuid = ? and t.xtgn_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y'

select t.yydjaptqzxqkdjbuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.swsxtzssltzuuid, t.sqczsx, t.yydjapzxzzrqq, t.yydjapzxzzrq, t.yydjapsyrqq, t.yydjapsyrqz, t.yydjaptqzxzzyy, t.yydjapzzjd, t.yydjaptqhfyy, t.yydjaptqztyy, t.yydjaptqztsj, t.yydjaptqhfsj, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.zsr_dm, t.zsrq_3, t.shyj, t.djr_dm, t.djrq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, b.djxh, b.yydjapajbh, b.yydjapaybh, b.yydjapajmc, b.yydjqdlx_dm, b.yydjajzt_dm, b.yydjaplx_dm, b.apsyndq, b.apsyndz, b.apsyrqq, b.apsyrqz from np_yydjaptqzxqkdjb t, np_yydjsxxx b where t.yydjsxxxuuid = b.yydjsxxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yydjsxxxuuid =$yydjsxxxuuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJDBYYDJAPWB T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.dcxcuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.ajmc, t.jcssqq, t.jcssqz, t.larq, t.jarq, t.sjgsdq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.jcry, t.jcjg_dm, t.dclx_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zjhsbz, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.sjtb_sj,p.tbnsdcaybh from np_tbnsdcajxxb t,np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb p where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = p.tbnsdcajxxuuid(+) and t.djxh = $uuid$ and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(p.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select dqzbzlthqduuid, ajxxuuid, thrq_1, swjg_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, qyjbrxm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sjgsdq, sjslid, nsrqz_1, thsjcryqz, dzbzdszl_dm from jc_dqzbzlthqd t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select s.nsxybfpsqbuuid, s.djxh, s.gszgswjgdm, s.dszgswjgdm, s.jbr, s.jbrlxdh, s.sqbpnd, s.slrdm, s.sqrq, s.slrq, s.sljgdm, s.slbz, s.lcslid,s.sjslid,s.ndpjjg,s.nsrxybpyy_dm,s.nsrxyfpyy_dm,s.zfbz_1 from Zh_Nsxybfpsqb s where s.nsxybfpsqbuuid = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.AJCYHZCFZUUID, T.SWJCAJUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WSBH, T.SQLX, T.JCAJZLLB_DM, T.DW, T.SQRXM, T.CYSXQ, T.CYSXZ, T.YYJYJ, T.NZCFZAJZLMCHZNR, T.SQSJ, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSTYBZ, T.ZSSJ, T.SWRY_DM, T.LCSLID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFBZ_1, T.AJBH, T.BZ_1 FROM JC_AJCYHZCFZXXB T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) and T.LCSLID = $uuid$

SELECT DJ.WFXWBH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.WFXWMC, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID, DJ.DJXH, '' AS SQR, '' AS SQRQ, '' AS SQSX, '' AS TZSQDJBUUID, GZS.NCFJE, SD.WSSDSJ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND (1 = #macroparam# or DJ.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or DJ.WFXWBH = ?) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '01' AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND NVL(GZS.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(SD.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(DJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT JC.JCAJBH AS WFXWBH, JC.NSRSBH, JC.NSRMC, JC.AJMC AS WFXWMC, JC.JCAJXXUUID AS SSWFXWDJUUID, JC.DJXH, '' AS SQR, '' AS SQRQ, '' AS SQSX, '' AS TZSQDJBUUID, GZS.NCFJE, SD.WSSDSJ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD, JC_AJXX JC WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = JC.JCAJXXUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND (1 = #macroparam# or JC.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JC.JCAJBH = ?) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'Y' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND NVL(GZS.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(SD.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(DJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(JC.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT DJ.WFXWBH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.WFXWMC, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID, DJ.DJXH, '' AS SQR, '' AS SQRQ, '' AS SQSX, '' AS TZSQDJBUUID, GZS.CFJE AS NCFJE, SD.WSSDSJ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SHBXFXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SBFXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND (1 = #macroparam# or DJ.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or DJ.WFXWBH = ?) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '01' AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND NVL(GZS.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(SD.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(DJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from NP_YBFBSGLYQTGXGZLSQDJB n where n.ybfbsglyqtgxgzlsqdjbuuid = $uuid$
select c.swyttzsuuid,c.nspgajxxuuid,c.lcslid, c.swjgjg, c.pgajbh, c.zg, c.nh, c.wh, c.djxh, c.ytsj,c.sjslid from np_swyttzs c where c.lcslid = ? and nvl(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' order by c.ytsj desc

SELECT B.SSQZZXJDSKJSSKXSYUUID UUID, '《税收强制执行决定书（扣缴税收款项适用）》' || B.SWJGJG || B.ZG || '〔' || B.NH || '〕' || B.WH || '号' WSBH FROM FZ_SWXZZFSQB A, FZ_SSQZZXJDS_KJSSKXSY B WHERE A.SWXZZFSQBUUID = B.SWXZZFSQBUUID AND A.AJXXUUID = $value1$ AND B.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value2$ AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT A.SWXZCFJDSUUID UUID, '《税务行政处罚决定书》' || A.SWJGJG || A.ZG || '〔' || A.NH || '〕' || A.WH || '号' WSBH FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS A WHERE A.SSWFXWDJUUID = $value3$ AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT T.SWCLJDSUUID UUID, '《税务处理决定书》' || T.SWJGJG || T.ZG || '〔' || T.NH || '〕' || T.WH || '号' WSBH FROM JC_SWCLJDS T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $value4$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT C.SHBXFXZCFJDSUUID UUID, '《社会保险费行政处罚决定书》' || C.SWJGJG || C.ZG || '〔' || C.NH || '〕' || C.WH || '号' WSBH FROM FZ_SHBXFXZCFJDS C WHERE C.SSWFXWDJUUID = $value5$ AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select sjjdyjcluuid, sjjdyjsmc, jdyjswszg, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, bsjdwmc, sjczjdjcssqjs, sjczjdjcssqjz, sjczjdjcjtxm, jdyjnr, jdyjzssksz, jdyjzsskje, jdyjzsznjje, sjczjgmc, jdyjrq, sdjdyjrq, djr, djrq, sjczzjdfjmc, wszg, sjzsrkskje, sjzsrkznjje, wrkskje, wrkznjje, wzerkyy, swjgmc, swjg_dm, wszzrq, fjmc, lcslid, dzbzdszl_dm, fkdzbzdszl_dm,yjlx_dm from fz_sjjdyjcl t where t.lcslid = $uuid$
select gpr.gprxm, gpr.sfzjzl_dm, gpr.sfzjhm from fp_pzhdgprxx gpr where gpr.djxh = ? and yxbz = 'Y' order by gpr.gprxm

select t.zstybz, t.zssj, t.zsr_dm, t.hdslid, t.lcslid, t.swjg_dm, t.barq, t.baswjgmc, t.dfswjqdfswjgmc, t.dfswjqdfqmrzw, t.dfswjqdfqmrxm, t.dfswjqdfqdrq, t.gjswjqdfqmrxm, t.gjswjqdfqdrq, t.gjswjqdfswjgmc, t.gjswjqdfqmrzw, t.sbhdwh, t.xyzxrqq, t.xyzxrqz, t.nsnd_1, t.jstj, t.tjzlmc, t.tcxqsqqx, t.qyfqzrxm, t.qyfqzrzw, t.zrdjff, t.sxrq, t.yydjapqddd, t.ssxddyfqdrq, t.djyzyjsyj, t.apsymynsndqxz, t.apsymynsndqxq, t.hzqdyydjapswjgmc, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.yydjapuuid, t.qdaprq, t.yydjapqdrq, t.sjgljylx, t.sjglfmc, t.sjtb_sj,t.fjuuid,t.swjgmc from np_yydjap t where t.yydjapuuid = $yydjapuuid$

select t. SWJCGZDGUUID, t. GFJCAJXXUUID, t. SWJG_DM, t. JCRYQMRQ, t. BCDXDSRCSYJ, t. BCDXQZ, t. JBRQZRQ, t. JCRYQM_1, t. NSRJBRQZ, t. JCRQ_1, t. NRZY, t. SJSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. DZBZDSZL_DM from JC_SWJCGZDG t where sjslid = $uuid$
SELECT * FROM DM_GY_SWRY WHERE SWRY_DM = ?
select t.* from jc_zdswajslajjjd t where t.zdswajslajjjduuid = $uuid$

SELECT SWXZCFTZTZSUUID, TZZCSQWTSUUID, SSWFXWDJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, TZSJ, TZDD, TZZCR, WSZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, HDSLID, LCSLID, SJGSDQ, ZJBZ, ZZBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SJSLID, SHBXFBZ, YXBZ, SWJG_DM FROM FZ_SWXZCFTZTZS WHERE SJSLID = $sjslid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.ZDSSWFAJBQDCBUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.JCAYXXUUID, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.SWJCAJDBJB_DM, t.WSBH, t.DCBSWJG_DM, t.DJXH, t.JCSWJG_DM, t.LXRXM, t.LXDH, t.FSCL, t.CZRY_DM, t.CZRQ_1, t.BQSWJG_DM, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSRQ_3, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SJSLID, t.ZSTYBZ, t.DCBBZ, t.ccfajtnr, t.SQDSSHLY, t.bqswjghjcj_Dm, t.dcbswjgjcj_dm from JC_ZDSSWFAJBQDCBXXB t where t.zdsswfajbqdcbuuid = $uuid$
select t.DYKBFPSJZBUUID, t.DYKBFPSJUUID, t.DYFPZL_DM, t.DYFPMC, t.DYFP_DM, t.DYFPQSHM, t.DYFPZZHM, t.DYFPFS, t.BDYFPQKBZ, t.THBZ, t.FPDYQKBZ from jc_dykbfpsj_zb t where t.dykbfpsjuuid = $uuid$

UPDATE ZH_SDXX T SET T.ZFBZ_1 = ?, T.ZFR_DM = ?, T.ZFRQ_1 = SYSDATE, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE, T.XGR_DM = ? WHERE T.SDWSUUID IN (SELECT W.TZZCSQWTSUUID FROM FZ_TZZCSQWTS W WHERE W.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(W.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.SDZT_DM != '03'
UPDATE NP_NSPGBG T SET T.ZLCSLID = '', T.ZSR_DM = '', T.ZSSJ = '', T.ZSTYBZ = '', T.XGR_DM = ?, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE WHERE T.NSPGBGUUID = ?
delete from fz_gy_fjb t where t.ywzjuuid =?

update fz_zlxqgzxxb t set t.zlxqgzqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), t.xgr_dm = ?, t.xgrq = sysdate where t.zlxqgzxxbuuid = ? and exists (select a.sdwsuuid from zh_sdxx a where a.sdzt_dm = '01' and a.sdwsuuid = t.zlxqgzxxbuuid)

select t.YYDJSXXXUUID, t.YBHTSQDJBUUID, t.YYDJAPZSSQDJBUUID, t.DJXH, t.YYDJAPAJBH, t.YYDJAPAYBH, t.YYDJAPAJMC, t.YYDJQDLX_DM, t.YYDJAJZT_DM, t.YYDJAPLX_DM, t.APSYNDQ, t.APSYNDZ, t.APSYRQQ, t.APSYRQZ, t.NMSQBZ, t.SWJG_DM, t.LCSLID, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.SJTB_SJ from NP_YYDJSXXX t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.lcslid = $lcslid$
select * from np_nsqkzcbgb where lcslid=$lcslid$ and nspgbguuid=$sjslid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

select t.SWJCZBLUUID, t.SWJCZBLSQBZBUUID, t.WSBH, t.CZRXM, t.SFZJHM, t.GZDW, t.JCFW, t.JCZZ, t.FZJG, t.YXRQQ, t.YXRQZ, t.SWJCZH, t.FZRQ, t.NSBZ, t.NSRQ, t.JSBS, t.JXRQ, nvl(t.LSSQBZ,'N') lssqbz from JC_SWJCZBL t where t.czrxm = $uuid$ and (t.bz_1 is null or t.bz_1 = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_YSQSLTZ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Tzsuuid = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?

select l.swcljdqkbuuid, l.jcajxxuuid, l.zsxm_dm, l.zspm_dm, l.skzzfs_dm, l.skssqq, l.skssqz, l.sldwse, l.wfwzlx_dm, l.yzpzxh, l.sjslid, l.ybtse, l.jdxz_dm, l.zgswskfj_dm, l.jsyjtzs, l.mbyqndks, l.nsqx, l.xxsetzse, l.xxsetjse, l.jxsetzse, l.jxsetjse, l.ldsetze, l.cbskhfkbguuid, l.lcslid, l.yzpzmxxh, l.yzpzxh, l.wfwzxw_dm, l.jsyjsbs, l.ynse_1, l.mswfsdje, l.zgswjg_dm, l.wfcy_dm, l.ncfbs, l.ncfje, l.xxsesbs, l.jxsesbs, l.ldsesbs, l.swcljdsuuid, l.sjtb_sj, l.zszm_dm, l.hy_dm, l.djxh, l.sshj_dm, l.cktsywlx, l.ywfl_dm, l.sfxcznjqs from jc_swcljdqkb l where l.jcajxxuuid = ? and nvl(l.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and l.cbskhfkbguuid is null
select t.tqzjzysjuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.zjtgdwgrmc, t.zfbz_1, t.sjslid, t.wsbh, t.tfrq, t.tqrxm_1 from JC_TQZJZYSJ T where t.sjslid = $uuid$
SELECT T.FSWFSDUUID, T.XH, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SSWFLX_DM, T.SSWFSD_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FZ_FSWFSD T WHERE T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_ZSSQBYSLTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJSXXXUUID= ?
select c.cxzcjtxzxwjgbuuid, c.djxh, c.nsrsbh, c.nsrmc, c.cxzcjtxzxwly,c.sqr,c.sqrq from zh_cxzcxzxwzb c where c.cxzcjtxzxwjgbuuid = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.wssjbgxxuuid, m.ywzj, t.ywwsuuid, t.bghxmnr, t.bgqxmnr, t.lcslid, m.zdzwmc, m.zdmc, m.zdlx, m.bz_1, m.bmc, m.dzbzdszl_dm, m.csbuuid, n.dzbzdszlmc from jc_WSSJBGXX t, cs_jc_xgzdpzb m, dm_gy_dzbzdszl n where t.csbuuid = m.csbuuid and m.dzbzdszl_dm = n.dzbzdszl_dm and t.lcslid = $uuid$ order by t.ywwsuuid
SELECT * FROM cs_jc_sswfxwclcfyjdzb a WHERE a.sswfxwwtxm_dm = $value1$ AND a.wfwzsd_dm = $value2$ AND NVL(a.qybz,'Y') = 'Y'
select g.nsrsbh, g.nsrmc from np_hcdxgzxzfqbgzqkdg g where g.jsssqbclqkbuuid = ? and g.lhzl = ?

SELECT T.ZLXQGZXXBUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.WFXWLX, T.FLYJ, T.ZLXQGZQX, T.ZLXQGZNR, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.WSZZRQ, T.XGSWJG_DM, T.SFGZ, T.XHRQ, T.ZLXQGZZT_DM, T.LCSLID FROM FZ_ZLXQGZXXB T WHERE T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' ORDER BY T.LRRQ DESC
delete from fz_nsdbccqd_zb where nsdbccqduuid=?
select t.* from jc_swcljdqkb t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select t.xzclbqcctzsuuid,t.sswfxwdjuuid,t.cjwsswjg,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.wh,t.nh,t.sy,t.yj_1,t.clsx,t.cfkyjdsmc,t.ssbqcsjds_kycfsyuuid,(t.swjgjg || '' || t.zg || '〔' || t.nh || '〕' || t.wh || '号') as wszg, t.ssbqcsjdswszg,t.wszzrq from fz_swsxtzs_xzclbqccsy t where t.sswfxwdjuuid=$value5$ and t.ssbqcsjds_kycfsyuuid=$value4$ and t.lcslid is null

select distinct bg.jcajxxuuid, hzb.*, hzb.sl_1 sldwse from jc_swjcbg bg, jc_ncbtskhzb hzb where bg.swjcbguuid = hzb.swjcbguuid and bg.jcajxxuuid=? and hzb.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and (hzb.zfbz_1 is null or hzb.zfbz_1='N') and (bg.yxbz is null or bg.yxbz = 'Y')
select t.*, (t.swjgjg || '' || t.zg || '〔' || t.nh || '〕' || t.wh || '号') as sdwswszg from zh_sdxx t where t.ajxxuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.WFXWBH, T.WFXWMC, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.SSWFLX_DM, T.WFSS, T.SSQJQ_1, T.SSQJZ_1, T.SSWFXWCLZT_DM, T.DJJG_DM, T.DJRQ, T.DJR_DM, T.SFSBFWF, T.SSWFSD_DM, T.RGDJBZ, T.JCAJBZ, T.AJLY, T.ZJLX_DM_1, T.ZJSHRY_DM, T.ZJSHRQ, T.FZCZJYY, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFLX_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFSD_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJRQ < (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1))
select t.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, t.sswfxwdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.hdslid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.yuuid, t.zstybz, t.lcbjbz from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$
select t.* from jc_swjczxbg t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select * from Np_Gxssybtmxb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $value$ and t.zxtzbz = '1'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC T WHERE T.JDSUUID = $value1$ AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.AJXXUUID = $value2$) AND (1 = $tj4$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value4$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.djxh, t.dbsehj, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.dbsehj, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbxs, t.swjg_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lcslid from fz_nsdbs t, zh_sdxx s where nvl(t.sfdqcl, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfjccl, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.nsdbzt = 'Y' and t.nsdbsuuid = s.sdwsuuid and s.sdzt_dm = '03'

select t.DQZBZLQDMXUUID, t.DQZBZLQDUUID, t.ZLSSSQQ, t.ZLSSSQZ, t.DW_1, (t.SL - nvl(sum(t2.sl),0)) sl, t.YS, t.BZ, t.DQTHZBZLLX_DM, t.ZBZLMC from jc_dqzbzlqd_mx t left join jc_dqzbzlthmxqd t2 on t.dqzbzlqdmxuuid = t2.dqzbzlqdmxuuid where t.dqzbzlqdmxuuid = $uuid$ group by t.DQZBZLQDMXUUID, t.DQZBZLQDUUID, t.ZLSSSQQ, t.ZLSSSQZ, t.DW_1, t.YS, t.SL, t.BZ, t.DQTHZBZLLX_DM, t.ZBZLMC

select f.zgswskfj_dm, f.djxh, f.yjskhj, q.hy_dm, q.zsxm_dm, q.zspm_dm, q.zszm_dm, q.skssqq, q.skssqz, q.jsyjsbs, q.jsyjtzs, q.sldwse from jc_zfjgftmx f, jc_swcljdqkb q where f.swcljdqkbuuid = q.swcljdqkbuuid and q.zfbz_1 = 'N' and f.jcajxxuuid = ?

SELECT DCB.NSXYDJTSSXDCBUUID, DCB.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID, DCB.DJXH, DCB.DJTJ1YJ, DCB.DJTJ2YJ, DCB.DJTJ3YJ, DCB.CJTJ1YJ, DCB.CJTJ2YJ, DCB.CJTJ3YJ, DCB.CJTJ4YJ, DCB.CJTJ5YJ, DCB.FBYJ, DCB.FATJ1YJ, DCB.FATJ2YJ, DCB.FATJ3YJ, DCB.FATJ4YJ, DCB.FATJ5YJ, DCB.TSSXDJ, DCB.TSSXDJYJ, DCB.DCR, DCB.DCRQ, DCB.XYDJDCLX_DM, DCB.DCSX_DM, DCB.TSSXDJNSRYJ, DCB.NSRQZ, DCB.ZGSWJGYJ, DCB.ZGSWJG_DM, DCB.SWJGFZRXM, DCB.ZGSWJGQRRQ FROM NP_NSXYDJTSSXDCB DCB WHERE DCB.NSXYDJTSSXDCBUUID = ? AND DCB.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.SWYTTZSUUID, t.NSPGAJXXUUID, t.PGAJBH, t.DJXH, t.SSYD, t.YTSJ, t.TGZL, t.LXR_DM, t.LXDH, t.YTDD, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.SWJG_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.QTRYXM, t.QTSM, t.SY, t.YJ_1 from np_swyttzs t, np_nspgajxxb a where t.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.SJSLID = $sjslid$

select f.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, f.lcslid, f.sswflx_dm, f.cflx_dm, f.wfsd_dm, f.wfcy_dm, f.zjgftfkje, f.fzjgftfkje, f.zgswjg_dm, f.mswfsdje from FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF f where nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and f.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and f.sshj_dm='118'

select t.zdsswfajtsclpfuuid, t.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.pfyj, t.pfyjsm, t.pfyqccqx, t.qtsx, t.lcslid, t.sjgsdq, t.hdslid, t.pfrq, t.pfswjg_Dm_1, t.slryqm, t.slryqmrq, t.slwyhbgsyj, t.bgsfzrqm, t.bgsfzrqmrq, t.slwyhfzryj, t.slwyhfzrqmrq, t.slwyhfzrqm, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.wszzr from jc_zdsswfajtsclpf t where t.zdsswfajtsclpfuuid = $uuid$
select d.* from Np_Dbyydjapsltqyxshsqb d where d.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and d.dbyydjapsltqyxsqbuuid = ? and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N')= ?
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPTQYXS T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND YYDJSXXXUUID = ?

select t.XZFYGYXXBUUID, t.XZFYSQDJBUUID, t.SQSXMC, t.SQR, t.SQRQ, t.FYSQCHRQ, t.SQCHYY, t.DJR_DM, t.DJRQ, t.JTXZXWMC, t.JTXZXWZCRQ, t.WSZG, t.SQLY, t.TZJTXZXWYY_DM, t.YQSFHL, t.SFDCHJXY, t.DCHJXYRQ, t.HJXYZYNR, t.TCHFXRQ, t.GFXWJWSZG, t.GFXWJMC, t.TQCLLY, t.FYYJHJYLXMC, t.SDJGBM, t.SDJGBMDZ, t.ZSRQ_3, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SDR_DM, t.WSSDRQ, t.SFFH_1, t.FHLY, t.DJR, t.SFFK, t.CLJG, t.CLR_DM, t.CLRQ, t.FKRQ, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSWSX_DM, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SJSLID, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFBZ_1, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.GFXWJCLLY_DM, t.SFYSQ, t.FLYJ, t.SQSX from FZ_XZFYGYXXB t where t.lcslid = $uuid$
select t.gfjcclzxxxuuid from JC_GFJCCLZXXX t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

SELECT YJ.YJSKSYQKBUUID, YJ.YJSKUUID, YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID, YJ.JCAJXXUUID, YJ.LCSLID, YJ.SJSLID, YJ.ZSXM_DM, YJ.ZSPM_DM, YJ.ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, YJ.HY_DM, YJ.SKSSQQ, YJ.SKSSQZ, YJ.RKRQ, YJ.DJXH, YJ.SYJE, YJ.ZNJ, YJ.SYBZ, YJ.Yzpzxh, YJ.Yzpzmxxh, CL.SKZZFS_DM, CL.ZSPM_DM ZSZSPM, CL.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, cl.skssqq qkbskssqq, cl.skssqz qkbskssqz FROM JC_CBYJSYQKB YJ, JC_SWCLJDQKB CL, jc_swcljds ds WHERE YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID = CL.SWCLJDQKBUUID and cl.swcljdsuuid = ds.swcljdsuuid AND YJ.SYBZ = 'Y' and nvl(cl.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(ds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and ds.swcljdsuuid = ? and (yj.zfbz_1 = 'N' or yj.zfbz_1 is null)

select ZFJGFTMXUUID, NCBTSKHZBUUID, SWJCBGUUID, DJXH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, BLSL, YJSKHJ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, SWCLJDQKBUUID, SJSLID, JCAJXXUUID, SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID, ZFBZ_1 from jc_zfjgftmx where jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and zfbz_1 = 'N' and SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID is not null
select s.swsxqfbuuid,s.qfyj,s.qfyjsm,s.qfr,s.qfrq,s.bz,s.fj,s.gjssqbdjbuuid,s.fjuuid from np_swsxqfb s where s.gjssqbdjbuuid=?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWWFSSBCLTZS T WHERE T.SWWFSSBCLTZSUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_TQYXBZNRTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJAPAYBH = ?

select max(b.yydjsxxxuuid), max(b.yydjaplx_Dm), max(b.djxh), max(b.yydjapajbh), max(b.yydjapajmc), max(d.lrrq) as jssqrq from np_yydjsxxx b, np_yydjapzssqdjb C, zh_tzsxx d where b.yydjsxxxuuid = c.yydjsxxxuuid and c.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID = d.tzsuuid and b.YYDJAJZT_DM in ('201','400','212') and b.djxh = $uuid$ group by b.yydjsxxxuuid

select t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.yydjapajbh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, t.yydjaplx_dm, t.apsyrqq, t.apsyrqz, t.yydjapajmc, t.yydjajzt_dm, t.djxh from NP_SWSXTZS_TQYXSLTZ a left join NP_YYDJAJXXB t on a.yydjsxxxuuid = t.yydjsxxxuuid where t.swjg_dm =? and t.yydjajzt_dm =? and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') =?
select DB_ID uuid, WFSS, SYCFLC, CFJSWCBZ, SCSJ from YW_WFWZ_CFJG where XWDJ_UUID = ?
select n.zrdjtcyqtgxgzlsqdjbuuid,n.tbnsdcajxxuuid,n.djxh,n.yqtgxgzljzrq from np_zrdjdcyqtgxgzlsqdjb n where n.tzsuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_TZBG T WHERE T.TZBGUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select t.* from jc_swjczxbg t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t. SHJCYJQDUUID, t. SSSXNBYSJFKBUUID, t. PZDM, t. PZHM_2, t. FPWTLX_DM, t. ZZSKSPZLX_DM, t. YJLY, t. FKRQ, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. YJR_DM, t. YJRQ, t. SJGSDQ from ZH_SHJCYJQD t where t.SSSXNBYSJFKBUUID= $uuid$

select t.tbnsjkglkhtjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.yydjapajbh, t.yydjapajmc, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.jkgljd, t.djxh, t.qymc, t.jknd, t.jklx, t.jkqqk, t.jkhqk, t.gtzrmbje, t.qysdsmbkse, t.qysdstzynssde, t.qysdstzybsdse, t.zzsyssre, t.ybzzse, t.xfsyssre, t.ybxfse, t.yysyssre, t.ybyyse, t.qtsyssre, t.ybqtse, t.gzglndq, t.gzglndz, t.tbnsdcgzglfxpgjl, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsjkglkhtjb t where t.djxh = $uuid$
select t.* from fz_zdswajsmslyjb t where t.zdswajsmslyjbuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select nspgajxxuuid, pgajbh, djxh, ydwtfx, pgxmmc, pgssqq, pgssqz, xmsssj, pgfxrq, pgfxry_dm, fxydxh, sdhcbz, nspgjy_dm, nspgcljy_dm, lcslid, hdslid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjly_dm, ajzt_dm, ytpgjy_dm from np_nspgajxxb where fxydxh = $uuid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select y.dzbzdszl_dm, y.AJMLUUID, y.SWJCAJUUID, y.YC, y.ZLMC, y.BZ, y.ZRRXM, y.WH, y.uuid from jc_swjcaj_ml y where y.swjcajuuid in (select t.swjcajuuid from jc_swjcaj t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$) and (y.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' or y.ZFBZ_1 is null)
SELECT * FROM FZ_SWSXTZS T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM IN (#macroparam#)) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
update np_jsssqbclqkb b set b.czzt = ? where b.lhqkdjbuuid = ?

select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zjbh z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.zjbhuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.uuid =? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_sswfxwjjdjb z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.jcayxxuuid = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_TZBL T WHERE T.TZBLUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

SELECT XZFYGYWSUUID, XZFYSQDJBUUID, DJXH, NSRMC, NSRSBH, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, XZFYJG_DM, XZFYJGMC, SLSWJG_DM, TZZCRXM, TZSJ, TZDD, BXWDCRXM, DJXYNR, SQR, SLFYRQ, SWJG_DM, WSZZRQ, TZSUUID, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ_3, DZBZDSZL_DM, LCSWSX_DM, LCSLID, HDSLID, SJSLID, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFBZ_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, XZFYGYXXBUUID, ZSTYBZ, SJTB_SJ, SQRMC, FLYJ, TZZCRZGZSHM, XZFYZZYYLX_DM_1, XZFYZZYYLX_DM, WSZG, WFSSHSHSX, PBXWT, GJJY, XZJGMC, WFGDXW, CFJY, ZCXZFYJDJZRQ, TZZXJTXZXWRQ, TZZXLY, SFFK, FKRQ, FKYJ, CLJG, DJR_DM, DJRQ FROM FZ_XZFYGYWS WHERE XZFYGYWSUUID=$uuid$

select distinct bw.bwqkdjbuuid,bw.lhqkdjbuuid,bw.fwmc_1,bw.fwzh_1,bw.mj_2,bw.yqhfrq,bw.swdw, bw.bz,bw.bwry,bw.fwrq,qkb.clswjg_dm,qkb.jsswjg_dm,qkb.hcswjg,qkb.czzt from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb, np_bwqkdjb bw where qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid and qkb.bwqkdjbuuid=?

SELECT DISTINCT F.SSWFXWDJUUID AJXXUUID, F.WFXWBH AJBH, F.WFXWMC AJMC, F.DJXH, F.NSRSBH, F.NSRMC, B.SSBQXXBUUID, B.SWJG_DM, B.WSZZRQ, B.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, B.JCSSBQCSLY, B.DZBZDSZL_DM, B.BLJCCFKYSXSX, B.SWJGJG,B.ZG,B.NH,B.WH, TO_CHAR(B.SSBQFLYJ) SSBQFLYJ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ F, FZ_SSBQXXB B WHERE F.SSWFXWDJUUID = B.AJXXUUID AND F.DJXH = $VALUE1$ AND (B.DZBZDSZL_DM = 'BDA1220112') AND NVL(F.JCAJBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(F.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = $TJ1$ OR F.WFXWBH = $VALUE2$) AND (1 = $TJ2$ OR B.LRRQ > TO_DATE($VALUE3$, 'YY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = $TJ3$ OR B.LRRQ < TO_DATE($VALUE4$, 'YY-MM-DD')) UNION SELECT DISTINCT J.JCAJXXUUID AJXXUUID, J.JCAJBH AJBH, J.AJMC, J.DJXH, J.NSRSBH, J.NSRMC, B.SSBQXXBUUID, B.SWJG_DM, B.WSZZRQ, B.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, B.JCSSBQCSLY, B.DZBZDSZL_DM, B.BLJCCFKYSXSX, B.SWJGJG,B.ZG,B.NH,B.WH, TO_CHAR(B.SSBQFLYJ) SSBQFLYJ FROM JC_AJXX J, FZ_SSBQXXB B WHERE J.JCAJXXUUID = B.AJXXUUID AND J.DJXH = $VALUE5$ AND B.DZBZDSZL_DM = 'BDA1220112' AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = $TJ4$ OR J.JCAJBH = $VALUE6$) AND (1 = $TJ5$ OR B.LRRQ > TO_DATE($VALUE7$, 'YY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = $TJ6$ OR B.LRRQ < TO_DATE($VALUE8$, 'YY-MM-DD'))

select djb.sswfxwjjdjbuuid, djb.bjjrmc, djb.bjjrdjxh, djb.jjzynr, jjr.sswfxwjjdjbjjrxxuuid, jjr.jjrxm_1, jjr.jjrq_1, jjr.jjrsfzjzl_dm, jjr.jjrsfzjhm, jjr.jjrdwmc, jjr.jjrdz, jjr.jjrlxdh, aj.jcajxxuuid, aj.jcajbh, aj.ajmc, aj.yjskze, aj.yjfkze, ay.jcaybh from jc_ajxx aj, jc_ayxx ay, jc_sswfxwjjdjb djb, jc_sswfxwjjdjb_jjrxx jjr where aj.jcajxxuuid = ay.jcajxxuuid and djb.jcajxxuuid = aj.jcajxxuuid and djb.jcayxxuuid = ay.jcayxxuuid and djb.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = jjr.sswfxwjjdjbuuid and (djb.zfbz_1 is null or djb.zfbz_1 = 'N') and (jjr.zfbz_1 is null or jjr.zfbz_1 = 'N') and nvl(jjr.jjjlzt, '0') = '0' and aj.ajjczt_dm = '501' and (aj.sjskze > 0 or aj.sjfkze > 0) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrxm_1 like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrdz like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrdwmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrlxdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrsfzjzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jjr.jjrsfzjhm = ?) and (djb.ajszjg_dm = ? or aj.ajszjg_dm = ? or aj.ZXBM_DM in (#macroparam#))

SELECT STXCYQUUID, SHGLXXBUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, WH, NH, XCBH, SJSWJG_DM, WTXCHWSZG, HHJZRQ, SQYQJZRQ, SQYQYY, STFYJCQK, LXR, LXDH, WSZZRQ, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ, ZSTYBZ, SJSLID, LCSLID, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_XCYQSQ_STXC WHERE STXCYQUUID = $stxcyquuid$

select a.rwuuid, a.fxydxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.djxh, a.ydczswjg_dm, a.ydbm_dm, a.ydczry_dm, a.qzhduuid, a.fxdj, a.rwwcsx, a.ydxfswjg_dm, a.ydxfsj, a.ydxfph, a.ajzt_dm, a.zfbz_1 from NP_ATSHRWFPB a where nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ydczswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and a.ajzt_dm in(#macroparam#) and a.ydczry_dm = ? order by lrrq desc

SELECT S.WSSDSJ, S.SDZT_DM, D.DJXH, D.NSRSBH, D.NSRMC, D.WFXWBH AJBH, D.WFXWMC AJMC, T.*, T.SWJGJG || T.ZG || '〔' || T.NH || '〕' || T.WH || '号' AS WSZG FROM ZH_SDXX S, FZ_SSWFXWDJ D, FZ_ZLXQJNSFK T WHERE NVL(S.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND S.SDZT_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND S.SDWSUUID = T.ZLXQJNSFKUUID AND NVL(D.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR D.DJXH = ?) AND T.SSWFXWDJUUID = D.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LRR_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WSZZRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WSZZRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.YWFL_DM, 'A12') = ?)
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS T WHERE T.SJSLID = $sjslid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_YYDJAPCXZXQKYZQ A WHERE A.YYDJAPAJBH=? AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1,'N')=?
select * from np_jsssqbclqkb b where b.jsssqbclqkbuuid=?
select t.jkqyzxqkjluuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid,t.jkzxqqyzxyydjapqk,t.swjg_dm,t.jcapzxrqq,t.jcapzxrqz,t.jcryxm,t.sm_2,t.fjuuid from np_jkqyzxqkjl t where t.yydjsxxxuuid =?
select t.sphwhzqtccuuid,t.hcrq,t.hcr from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc t where t.sjslid=$uuid$

select distinct (jh.jhnd) as jhnd, jh.jhnd || jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm code, jh.jhnd || '稽查计划' caption, jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm pcode from jc_jcjh jh where jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(jh.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? union all select '' as jhnd, jh.jcjhuuid code, nvl(jh.jcjhmc, jh.jhnd || '稽查计划') caption, jh.jhnd || jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm pcode from jc_jcjh jh where jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(jh.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?

SELECT HJXXBUUID, AJXXUUID, FJUUID, YQSPUUID, BH, UUID, AJBH_1, XZQHLX_DM, DJXH, CLYJ, JLYJ, ZRFYSYFKGGX, ZZSWJG_DM, ZZR_DM, FHSWJGLXDZ, FHSWJG_DM, FHRQ_2, QDRXM, QDRQ, QDSWJG_DM, BWTHGMC, DHCHGJKSFS, MJ_DM, QFRXM, QBBH, LXDH, LXR_DM, YZBM, HFDW_DM, HFDZ, HFRQ, HJBH, HJZT_DM, JSRXM, JSRQ, JSSWJG_DM, SQYQXCSWJG_DM, YQSQWSZG, YQJZRQ, SQYQJZRQ, WSZZRQ, WSZG, XCHWSZG, XDCSX, XDCYD, XCHWSZZRQ, FHWSZG, DCJG_1, FHWSZZRQ, SQR_DM, SQRQ, LCSLID, LRRQ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, TXDZ, NR, SJTB_SJ, ZZSJ, XCYQ, QDR_DM, LXR, NSRSBH, NSRMC, HCHBH, DZBZDSZL_DM, CZ, QBSL, QBZT, HCHMC, FWZH_1, LHF, QBJHLX_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, LHQKDJBUUID, BWQKDJBUUID, GJQBJHSJJDXXBUUID, ZFFX, WTHGMC, HFHBH FROM ZH_HJXXB WHERE HJXXBUUID = $hjxxbuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.ZJBHUUID, T.UUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.ZJSWJG_DM, T.JSSWJG_DM, T.ZBSX, T.HFJZRQ, T.WSZZRQ, T.SFXYHF, T.DZ, T.LXRY, T.LXDH, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM FROM JC_ZJBH T WHERE T.UUID = ? AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select count(1) as count from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.tgsjfpjcbz, 'N') = ? and t.zstybz = 'Y' and t.tgsjfpjdlx_dm in ('01', '03') and t.lcbjbz = 'Y' union all select count(1) as count from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.tgsjfpjcbz, 'N') = ? and t.lcbjbz = 'N'

with a as (select zgswjg_dm from jc_dqzbzltzs where dqzbzltzsuuid = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, jc_dqzbzltzs b where b.zgswjg_dm = a.zgswjg_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh = $value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdczxtzuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.tbnsdcajxxuuid,t.tbnsdcajbh,t.tbnsdcajmc,t.lrrq from np_tbnsdczxtz t where ( 1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = #macroparam#) and ( 1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh = #macroparam#)
SELECT T.* from FZ_SZMX T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = $ywzjuuid$ AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$)

select b.atshjlbuuid, b.bguuid, b.atshhsr, b.atshhsr, b.atshhsyj, b.atshhsyjsm, b.lcslid, b.zfbz_1, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.zfr_dm from np_atshjlb b where b.bguuid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or b.atshhsr = ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select zxbztzsuuid, nspgajxxuuid, bzqx, slswjg_dm, wtms, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, wszzrq, qrbz, lcslid, sy, yj_1, bsqx, qtsm,sjslid from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz where lcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT SSWFAJXCHFHUUID, SHGLXXBUUID, FHYWZJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, WH, NH, HFSWJG_DM, XCBH, DBHWSZG, DJXH, WTXCHWSZG, WTXCSWJG_DM, WTXCAJBH, WTXCAJMC, STXCAJBH, STXCAJMC, JBQK, DCQZQKJFXDWT, XCJL, CLQK, LXR, LXDH, LXDZ, YZBM, QDR_DM, QDRQ, QDSWJG_DM, SJSLID, LCSLID, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, FJUUID FROM ZH_SSWFAJXCHFH WHERE SSWFAJXCHFHUUID = $sswfajxchfhuuid$

select jcayxxuuid, swjclasqbuuid, lasqr_dm, xarq, wfwzlx_dm, wszt_dm, swjg_dm, sjgsdq, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, lcslid, xafxjlayj, sfdya, jclx_dm, jcbm_dm, wfwzxw_dm, sxsswfxw, jbr_dm, jbrq, ajmc, jcssqjq, jcssqjz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zstybz, wsbh from jc_lasqb where jcayxxuuid = $uuid$ and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.yydjaptqzxqkdjbuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.swsxtzssltzuuid, t.sqczsx, t.yydjapzxzzrqq, t.yydjapzxzzrq, t.yydjapsyrqq, t.yydjapsyrqz, t.yydjaptqzxzzyy, t.yydjapzzjd, t.yydjaptqhfyy, t.yydjaptqztyy, t.yydjaptqztsj, t.yydjaptqhfsj, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.zsr_dm, t.zsrq_3, t.shyj, t.djr_dm, t.djrq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid,t.fjuuid, b.djxh, b.yydjapajbh, b.yydjapaybh, b.yydjapajmc, b.yydjqdlx_dm, b.yydjajzt_dm, b.yydjaplx_dm, b.apsyndq, b.apsyndz, b.apsyrqq, b.apsyrqz from np_yydjaptqzxqkdjb t, np_yydjsxxx b where t.yydjsxxxuuid = b.yydjsxxxuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yydjaptqzxqkdjbuuid=$yydjaptqzxqkdjbuuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_YQHZFQJNFKXXB T WHERE T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBUUID = $uuid$

select cs.tddj_dm, cs.swjg_dm, cs.zspm_dm from cs_dj_tddjzspmdzb cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and cs.tddj_dm = ?
update jc_tqzjzysj_zb t set t.tqzjthqduuid = '', t.thbz = 'N' where t.tqzjthqduuid = ?
select t.* from jc_jcry t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.sshj_dm = $sshjDm$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm = ? union select #macroparam# as swjg_dm from dual), swjg22 as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm in (select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) union select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and exists (select 1 from swjg t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) union select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.lrr_dm = ? union select a.*, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and exists (select 1 from swjg22 t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm)
update np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz set qrbz = ?, xgrq = sysdate, xgr_dm=? where nspgajxxuuid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from cs_jc_wssplj t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = $uuid$

select z.zlxqjnsfkuuid, z.sswfxwdjuuid, z.xqjnskqx, t.sssqq, t.sssqz, t.xz, t.fxzcfje from fz_shbxffzmxxxb t, fz_zlxqjnsfk z where t.ywzjuuid = z.zlxqjnsfkuuid and z.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and z.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select j.fxydxh, j.fxxxxh, j.djxh, j.nsrssswjg_dm, j.clzt, j.clsj, j.fxzfz, j.fxdj, j.scsj, j.fxydbxclbz, j.ydxfph, j.sjjhcgbz, j.ydxfswjg_dm, j.ydxfry_dm,j.sjjhsj,j.ydxfsj from td_fxxx_jcxab j where j.fxydxh = ?

select t.sphwhzqtccuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.jdsuuid,t.sjbh,t.swjg_dm,t.zxr,t.zxrq_1,t.bzxrmc,t.cfbcgyy,t.kybcgyy,t.wszzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm,t.pmbmjgjsrxm,t.pmbmjg,t.pmbmsgdwjsr,t.swjgfzr_dm,t.swjgfzrxm,t.bfhcwdwjsrxm,t.bfhcwdwjsrqmrq,t.nsrqsrq, t.nsdbrqsrq,t.jehj,t.nsrmc,t.swjgjbrxm,t.nsdbrmc,t.sfcf,t.hcrq,t.hcr from fz_sphwhzqtcc t where t.lcslid is null and t.jdsuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value2$
select * from jc_zfjgftmx where sjslid = $uuid$
select y.yydjapajbh, y.apsyrqq, y.apsyrqz, y.djxh, p.yydjapqdrq from NP_YYDJAJXXB y, NP_YYDJDBYYDJAP p where y.YYDJAPAJBH = ? and p.zfbz_1 = ? and y.YYDJAPAJBH = p.yydjapajbh
select * from zh_tzsxx t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.tzsuuid=$uuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_SQXQSLTZ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Tzsuuid = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
select t.pmbmgyxxbuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrmc,t.nsrsbh,t.pmbmswjg_dm,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.nh,t.wh,t.flyj,t.dwmc,t.wszg,t.wszzrq from Fz_Pmbmgyxxb t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA1220121'

select t.* from fz_sswfxwdj t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfxwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.rgdjbz, 'N') = ? and ((t.sswfxwclzt_dm not in ('38', '01') and t.lcslid is null) or t.sswfxwclzt_dm in ('01')) and t.jcajbz = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjq_1 >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjz_1 <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajly in (#macroparam#))

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM, t.jcxm FROM JC_AJXX T WHERE T.jcajbh = ? and NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM jc_qysdsjsb_zb a WHERE a.qysdsjsbuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.skssqq,a.skssqz

SELECT QC.DJXH, QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID, QC.ZGSWJ_DM ZGSWJG, QC.ZDJB_DM ZDJB, PFDC.CKDJ, TSSX.TSSXDJ, PFDC.NSXYDJPFDCBUUID, TSSX.NSXYDJTSSXDCBUUID FROM NP_NSXYDJPDQDQC QC LEFT JOIN NP_NSXYDJPFDCB PFDC ON QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID = PFDC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID AND QC.DJXH = PFDC.DJXH LEFT JOIN NP_NSXYDJTSSXDCB TSSX ON QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID = TSSX.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID AND QC.DJXH = PFDC.DJXH WHERE QC.ZGSWJ_DM = ? AND QC.XYDJPDZT = '1' AND QC.ZFBZ_1='N'

SELECT a.*,b.clyjwjyxqq,b.clyjwjyxqz,b.fkblxx,b.fkblsx,b.fkjexx,b.fkjesx FROM jc_sswfwtgjjsb_zb a LEFT JOIN cs_jc_sswfxwclcfyjdzb b ON a.sswfxwclcfyjdzbuuid = b.uuid WHERE a.sswfwtgjjsbuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.skssqq,a.skssqz,a.sswfxwwtxm_dm,a.wfwzsd_dm
select d.gjssqbdjbuuid, d.qbbh, d.qblx, d.czzt, d.swjgmc, d.swjg_dm, d.djry, d.djrq, d.sfht as sfth from NP_GJSSQBDJB d where d.czzt = ? and d.swjg_dm=?

select t.swjczblsqbzbuuid, t.swjczblsqbuuid, t.czrxm, t.sfzjhm, t.zp, t.gzdw, t.jcfw, t.jczz, t.fzjg, t.yxrqq, t.yxrqz, t.swjczbllx_dm, t.bfyy, t.bgyy, t.yswjczh, t.blzt_dm, t.fjuuid, t.spbz, nvl(t.lssqbz,'N') lssqbz, t.swjczbluuid from jc_swjczblsqb_zb t where t.swjczblsqbuuid = $uuid$

select t.xzfysqdjbuuid, t.ajbh_1, t.ajmc, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.sqr, t.xzfyjg_dm, t.FYSQDYJTXZXWMC, t.sqrq, t.tszt, t.djxh from fz_xzfysqdjb t where t.FYAJZT in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.ajbh_1 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.ajmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrmc like ?) and (T.ZFBZ_1 = ? OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) and (T.tszt = ? OR T.tszt = ? OR T.tszt IS NULL)
select b.* from np_sdhcgzdg b where (1 = #macroparam# or b.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.sdhcgzdguuid = ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.SWXZBCXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.AJLY, T.AJBH_1, T.AJMC, T.SQRLX_DM, T.BCQQNR, T.ZYSSHLY, T.BCSQDYJTXZXWMC, T.BCSQDYJTXZXWZCRQ, T.BCYWJGMC, T.BCSQDJR, T.BCSQDJSJ, T.NSRMC, T.NSRSBH, T.DWDZ, T.LXDH, T.YZBM, T.ZW, T.ZS, T.XB_DM, T.FDDBR, T.QQRSFZJHM, T.WTDLRXM, T.WTDLRGZDWMC, T.DLRZWZY, T.DLRNL, T.TZSQR_DLR_ZS, T.DLRSFZJHM_1, T.SQRQ, T.SQR, T.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, T.SWSXTZSBYSLTZUUID, T.SWSXTZSBZNRTZUUID, T.SLNR, T.SLYJ_1, T.SLRY_DM, T.SLRQ_1, T.ZSSJ, T.ZSR_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.BCJD, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.ZCYJ, T.WSZZRQ, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSTYBZ, T.SLYJ_2, T.BCSQFS_DM, T.SJTB_SJ, T.WTDLRXB_DM, T.MZ_DM, T.GZDW, T.NL, T.XM, T.DJXH, T.SWJG_DM FROM FZ_SWXZBCXXB T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ order by t.lrrq asc
select t.* from jc_swjczxbg_zxwsb t where t.jczxbguuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

SELECT T.ZDSSWFAJNCLYJBGUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.JBQK, T.BGSJ, T.SSJCRQQ, T.SSWFSS, T.NSWCLCFDYJJYJ, T.ZZZJSM, T.ZDSSWFAJDBHUUID, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.CBDW_DM, T.JCCLRQZ, T.QTQKSM, T.SJSLID, T.WSZZSWJG_DM FROM JC_ZDSSWFAJNCLYJBG T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.LCSLID = $uuid$

select qc1.djxh, qc1.gdsbz, qc1.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, qc1.zzpj_dm, qc1.gszt, qc1.ygsts, qc1.gsrq, nvl(qc1.shxydm,qc1.nsrsbh) as nsrsbh, qc1.nsrmc, case when qc1.gdsbz = '1' then qc1.zgswj_dm else qc2.zgswj_dm end gszgswjg, case when qc1.gdsbz = '2' then qc1.zgswj_dm else qc2.zgswj_dm end dszgswjg from (select qc.djxh, qc.gdsbz, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, qc.zzpj_dm, qc.gszt, trunc(Sysdate) - trunc(qc.gsrq) ygsts, qc.gsrq, nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) as nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.gdghlx_dm from Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc, dj_nsrxx nsr where qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrmc like ?) and (((qc.zzpj_dm != '1' and 1 = #macroparam#) or (qc.zzpj_dm = '1' and 1 = #macroparam#)) or 1=#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.gszt = ?) and qc.gdsbz = ? and qc.xydjpdzt = '3' and qc.zfbz_1 = 'N') qc1 left join Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc2 on qc1.djxh = qc2.djxh and qc2.gdsbz = ? where qc1.zgswj_dm = ?

select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.jcajxxuuid, t.lcslid, x.sswfajtsclsqbuuid zjuuid, x.zssj zzrq, t.ajjczt_dm ajzt_dm from jc_ajxx t, jc_sswfajtsclsqb x where t.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.ajjczt_dm = ? and x.bz_1 = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid = ?) and (t.ajmc = ? or t.jcajbh = ?) and t.ajszjg_dm = ? union all select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.jcajxxuuid, t.lcslid, x.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid zjuuid, y.lrrq zzrq, t.ajjczt_dm ajzt_dm from jc_ajxx t, jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb x, jc_zdsswfajtsclpf y where t.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and x.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid = y.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.ajjczt_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid = ?) and (t.ajmc = ? or t.jcajbh = ?) and t.ajszjg_dm = ? and x.bz_1='N'

SELECT X.FXYDXH, X.FXXXXH, X.NSRSBH, X.NSRMC, X.SCSJ, X.DJXH, X.YDXFRYXM, X.NSRSSSWJGMC, X.NSRSSSWJG_DM, X.Fxzfz, X.Ydxfph, X.Ydxfsj, x.shxydm FROM TD_FXXX_JCXAB X WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or x.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.nsrmc like ?) AND (X.CLZT IS NULL OR X.CLZT = '0') AND X.NSRSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)

SELECT T.PCAJBH AS AJBH, T.AJMC, T.DWDZ, T.LXDH, T.YZBM AS YB, T.FDDBR, T.ZW, T.XM, T.XB_DM AS XB, T.NL, T.MZ_DM AS MZ, T.GZDW, T.ZZ AS ZS, T.QQRSFZJHM, T.WTDLRXM, T.WTDLRXB_DM AS WTDLRXB, T.DLRZW AS WTDLRZW, T.WTDLRGZDWMC AS WTDLRGZDW, T.WTDLRZZ AS WTDLRZS, T.WTDLRSFZJHM, T.JTXZXWMC AS PCSQDYJTXZXW, T.JTXZXWZCRQ AS PCSQDYJTXZXWZCRQ, T.XZJJSQFS_DM AS PCSQFS, T.PCYWJG_DM AS PCYWJG, T.SSYLY AS SQPCDSSJG, T.PCQQDJTNR, T.SQPCDLYGJ, T.SQRQ, T.SQRXM AS SQR FROM FZ_SWXZPC T WHERE T.DJXH = ?
select t.* from fz_swsxtzs t where t.slbz = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$

select t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.ajly, t.bh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm, t.nsdbrdz, t.nsdbrlxdh, t.nsdbrkhyh_dm, t.nsdbrkhyhzh, t.nsdbxs, t.dbsehj, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.dbccmc, t.nsdbccmc, t.dbccsl, t.dbcczmmc, t.dbdcczmfs, t.nsdbrfzr, t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc, t.nsdbrsfzjhm, t.nsdbrqsrq, t.nsrfzrqz, t.nsrfzrqzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.wszzrq, t.dbccbdcjzgj, t.dbccdcjzgj, t.dbccdqtccjz, t.dbcczjzgj, t.jfrsbh, t.yjshbxfje, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.shbxfbz, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.tzsuuid, t.jcnsdbtzsuuid, t.lcslid from fz_nsdbs t where t.nsdbzt='Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfdqcl,'N') = 'N' and nsdbsuuid=$uuid$
select t.tbnsdcjazjhsfsbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid from np_tbnsdcjazjhsfsb t where t.fsr_dm = $uuid$ and t.tjbz = 'N'
select t.sfswjg_dm from dm_qx_swrysf t where t.swry_dm = ?

select q.gjssqbdjbuuid, z.xdygtgzfqqzxqbgzqkdguuid, q.qbbh, z.nsrsbh, z.nsrmc, z.nsrlx, z.djxh, z.sjdygnsrmc, z.sjdygnsrlx from np_gjssqbdjb q, NP_XDYGTGZFQQZXQBGZQKDG z where q.gjssqbdjbuuid = z.gjssqbdjbuuid and q.gjssqbdjbuuid = ? and z.qblx = ?
select tbnsdcrwfpbuuid, tbnsdcajxxuuid, swjg_dm, dcbmmc, dcry, zbry_dm, swzjsfclajdcxz, czry_dm, czrq from NP_TBNSDCAJRWFPB t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid=$uuid$

select t. TBNSTZFHSWSXXCHFHUUID, t. XCHTBNSTZUUID, t. JCAJXXUUID, t. TBNSDCAJBH, t. YZBM, t. HFDZ, t. LXDH, t. LXR_DM, t. WSZG, t. DJXH, t. SJWCSJ, t. JCAJBH, t. AJMC, t. WSZZRQ, t. FHSWJGDZ, t. LCSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1 from ZH_TBNSTZFH_SWSXXCHFH t where t.TBNSTZFHSWSXXCHFHUUID = $uuid$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, (a.swjgjg || '' || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号') as sdwswszg, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sftt from zh_sdxx a where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, (a.swjgjg || '' || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号') as sdwswszg, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sftt from zh_sdxx a where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.gywsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.SWCLJDSUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.JCFWHNR, t.WFSS, t.CLJDJYJ, t.WSZZRQ, t.FYJGMC, t.SJGSDQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.HDSLID, t.XJTS, t.CBSKHFKBGUUID, t.LCSLID, t.JKDD from jc_swcljds t where t.jcajxxuuid = ? and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N') order by t.lrrq desc
select distinct t.yzpzxh, t.gfjccljdsuuid from jc_gfjccljds t where t.gfjccljdsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yzpzxh is not null

with ycl as (select decode(n.zdmc, 'wh', t.bghxmnr) as wh, decode(n.zdmc, 'nh', t.bghxmnr) as nh, decode(n.zdmc, 'qsrq', t.bghxmnr, 'czrq1', t.bghxmnr) as wszzrq, n.dzbzdszl_dm as dzbzdszlDm, t.ywwsuuid from jc_wssjbgxx t, cs_jc_xgzdpzb n where n.dzbzdszl_dm in ('BDA1120032', 'BDA0710106') and t.csbuuid = n.csbuuid and n.bmc is null and t.lcslid = $uuid$) select min(wh) as wh, min(nh) as nh, min(wszzrq) as wszzrq,min(dzbzdszlDm) as dzbzdszlDm, ywwsuuid from ycl group by ywwsuuid

select distinct fb.yzpzxh, fb.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid qkbuuid from fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb where fb.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(fb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and fb.swxzcfjdsuuid in (#macroparam#) union all select distinct t.yzpzxh, t.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid qkbuuid from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk t where t.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.swxzcfjdsuuid in (#macroparam#)
select gjssqbdjbuuid, qbbh, dygmc_1, qblx, mj_2, qbzt, sl, sjsz, sjsdrq, djry, bz, djrq, jgcj_dm, czzt, sfht, swjg_dm, swjgmc from np_gjssqbdjb g where g.gjssqbdjbuuid=?

SELECT SWJCXMSUUID, JCAYXXUUID, FXQJQ, FXQJZ, FXRY_DM, FXRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, ZBR_DM, ZBRQ, XABMFZRQM, JCDXMC, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1,JCBMJBRQM,JCBMFZRQM,FKRQ,SLBMJBRQM,SLBMFZRQM,SHRQ FROM JC_SWJCXMS WHERE JCAYXXUUID = $uuid$ and ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.WFXWBH AJBH, T.WFXWMC AJMC, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.SSWFLX_DM WFWZLXDM, D.SSWFLXMC WFWZXWMC, T.SSQJQ_1 SSSQQ, T.SSQJZ_1 SSSQZ, T.DJRQ, T.SSWFXWCLZT_DM, Z.SSWFXWCLZTMC, NVL(C.YJFKJE, 0) FKJE FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ T LEFT JOIN FZ_SWXZCFJDS C ON T.SSWFXWDJUUID = C.SSWFXWDJUUID, DM_GY_SSWFLX D, DM_FZ_SSWFXWCLZT Z WHERE T.SSWFLX_DM = D.SSWFLX_DM AND T.SSWFXWCLZT_DM = Z.SSWFXWCLZT_DM AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJRQ >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJRQ <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
select l.* from fz_cssbbl l where (1 = #macroparam# or l.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or l.sswfxwdjuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or l.cssbbluuid = ?) and nvl(l.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT DM.DZBZDSZLMC, DM.DZBZDSZL_DM, LJ.XMLZHBEANLLJ, LJ.YWBDSJLJ, ZB.XMLLSH, ZB.YWWSUUID, NVL(NVL(ZB.WSBH, ZB.WSZG),'无') WH, ZB.UUID, LJ.BDLJMC, LJ.CSDMZ_1, LJ.LCBZ, ZB.LRR_DM ZRRXM, ZB.LCSLID, zb.lrrq FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ LJ, GY_WS_WSZB ZB, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL DM WHERE LJ.DZBZDSZL_DM = ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM = DM.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.YWZJUUID = ? AND ZB.ZFR_DM IS NULL
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.SWJCAYZT_DM = ? and t.ayszjg_dm = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select distinct t.yzpzxh, t.tbnsdctztzsuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid from np_gxssybtmxb t where t.tbnsdctztzsuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.yzpzxh is not null

select z.zxbztzsuuid, z.nspgajxxuuid, z.bzqx, z.slswjg_dm, z.wtms, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, z.qrbz, z.lcslid, a.djxh, a.pgssqq, a.pgssqz, a.sjly_dm from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz z, np_nspgajxxb a,zh_sdxx t where z.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and z.sjslid = t.sdwsuuid and a.djxh = $djxh$ and TRUNC(a.pgssqq, 'yyyy') <= trunc(to_date($pgssqq$, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy') and TRUNC(a.pgssqz, 'yyyy') >= trunc(to_date($pgssqz$, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy') and z.qrbz = 'N' and t.sdzt_dm ='03' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajdbh z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.zdsswfajdbhuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.jcayxxuuid = ? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajbqdcbxxb x, gy_ws_wszb t where x.zdsswfajbqdcbuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and x.jcayxxuuid = ? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb y, gy_ws_wszb t where y.zdsswfajdblxuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and y.jcayxxuuid = ?
SELECT T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.XH, T.FLYJ, T.XYBZ, T.YXBZ from CS_FZ_YWCLFLYJ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.XH = ?) AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select t.zdswajslajjjduuid,t.wszg,t.yjajsl,t.clys,t.swajlaspbys,t.swajdcbgys,t.jcwslfs,t.jcwslys,t.dsrcssbfs,t.dsrcssbys, t.zzpzzjlfs,t.zzpzzjlys,t.qtzjcllfs,t.qtzjcllys,t.yjdw_dm,t.jsdw_dm,t.yjr_dm,t.yjrq,t.jsryxm,t.jsrq,t.jsry_dm from jc_zdswajslajjjd t where t.zdswajslajjjduuid = $uuid$
select t.yydjapzssqyqbssqsuuid, t.djxh, t.cwfzrxm, t.cwfzrgddh, t.sqyqyy, t.sqyqqx, t.sqrq, t.ybhtsqdjbuuid from np_yydjapzssqyqbssqs t where t.yydjapzssqyqbssqsuuid = $uuid$

select t.tbnsdcgzglqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.pgfxry_dm, t.pgfxrq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1, t.sjtb_sj, t.fjuuid, t.ydctzqkdmyxs, t.xsqlrl, t.ydctzqkdtzynssde, t.ydctzqkdtzrkse, t.gzglcqff, t.gzgljl, t.gzqdmyxs, t.sfzz, t.zzje_1, t.gzglqdgljylx from np_tbnsdcgzglqkb t where t.tbnsdcgzglqkbuuid = $uuid$

SELECT T.WFXWBH AJBH, T.WFXWMC AJMC, T.SSWFXWDJUUID AJXXUUID, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.SSQJQ_1, T.SSQJZ_1, T.SSWFLX_DM FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ T WHERE T.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND T.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND T.ZFBZ_1 != 'Y' AND (1 = $tj1$ OR T.DJXH = $value1$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.WFXWBH = $value2$) AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.SSWFLX_DM = $value3$) UNION SELECT A.JCAJBH AJBH, A.AJMC, A.JCAJXXUUID AJXXUUID, A.DJXH, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC, A.JCSSQJQ SSQJQ_1, A.JCSSQJZ SSQJZ_1, Y.SSWFLX_DM FROM JC_AJXX A, JC_AYXX Y WHERE A.JCAJXXUUID = Y.JCAJXXUUID AND A.AJJCZT_DM NOT IN (SELECT AJZT_DM FROM DM_JC_AJZT WHERE SJAJZT_DM = '500') AND A.ZFBZ_1 != 'Y' AND (1 = $tj4$ OR A.DJXH = $value4$) AND (1 = $tj5$ OR A.JCAJBH = $value5$) AND (1 = $tj6$ OR Y.SSWFLX_DM = $value6$)
select l.* from np_ytbl l where l.bguuid = ? and nvl(l.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select t. FYSCYJUUID, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. BSQRDBNR, t. SLNR, t. SLYJ_1, t. XZFYYJLX_DM, t. SCYJNR, t. SLRY, t. WSZZRQ, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. XWDCBLUUID, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZSTYBZ
from FZ_XZFYSCYJ t where t.FYSCYJUUID=$uuid$
select t.* from jc_fkzypz t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

SELECT YJ.YJSKSYQKBUUID, YJ.YJSKUUID, YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID, YJ.JCAJXXUUID, YJ.LCSLID, YJ.SJSLID, YJ.ZSXM_DM, YJ.ZSPM_DM, YJ.ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, YJ.HY_DM, YJ.SKSSQQ, YJ.SKSSQZ, YJ.RKRQ, YJ.DJXH, YJ.SYJE, YJ.ZNJ, YJ.SYBZ, YJ.Yzpzxh, YJ.Yzpzmxxh, YJ.Znjjkqx, CL.SKZZFS_DM, CL.ZSPM_DM ZSZSPM, CL.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, cl.skssqq qkbskssqq, cl.skssqz qkbskssqz FROM JC_CBYJSYQKB YJ, JC_SWCLJDQKB CL WHERE YJ.JCAJXXUUID = ? AND YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID = CL.SWCLJDQKBUUID AND YJ.SYBZ = 'Y' and (yj.zfbz_1 = 'N' or yj.zfbz_1 is null)
select zb.sphwhzqtcczbuuid,zb.sphwhzqtccmc,zb.jldw_dm,zb.sl,zb.je,zb.dj,zb.bz,zb.cssl,zb.bzxrsysl,zb.cqzswh from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_Zb zb where zb.ywzjuuid=$uuid$
update fz_swxzcfjds_jy a set a.yzpzxh = null, a.xgr_dm = ?, a.xgrq = sysdate where a.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.swxzcfjdsjyuuid in (#macroparam#)

SELECT T.SWJG_DM, COUNT(T.SWJG_DM) SL FROM CS_FZ_XZCFCLQ T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) GROUP BY T.SWJG_DM

SELECT T.ZLXQJNSFKUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.SY, T.YJ_1, T.XQJNSKSSSQQ, T.XQJNSKSSSQZ, T.XQJNSZDT, T.XQJNSKXXJE, T.XQJNSKQX, T.SKZNRQ, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.WSZZRQ, T.SWJG_DM, T.XQJNFKDZ, T.ZSJG_DM, T.HJJE, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ FROM FZ_ZLXQJNSFK T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZLXQJNSFKUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE (1=#macroparam# or T.Jcaybh = #macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid = #macroparam#)
SELECT rtrim(T.HY_DM) CODE, T.HYMC CAPTION FROM DM_GY_HY T WHERE T.MLBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.HY_DM
delete jc_jcry a where a.jcajxxuuid = ? and a.sshj_dm = ?

SELECT T1.YWZJUUID AS YYDJSXXXUUID,T2.SDWSUUID,T1.WSZG,T2.WSSDSJ FROM (SELECT * FROM FZ_SWSXTZS WHERE NVL(ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND DZBZDSZL_DM = ? AND YWZJUUID = ? )T1 LEFT JOIN ZH_SDXX T2 ON T2.AJXXUUID=T1.YWZJUUID AND T2.SDWSUUID=T1.TZSUUID

select f.sswfxwxzcfscbgfbuuid, f.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid, f.xh, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.wfsd_dm, f.wfcy_dm, f.nfkje ncfje, f.msffsdje, f.sjtzsz_dm, f.tzje_2, f.bz, f.yzpzxh, f.djxh, f.zgswskfj_dm, f.zgswjg_dm, f.zszspm_dm, f.lcslid, f.sjslid, f.cflx_dm, f.sswflx_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.cfyj from Fz_Sswfxwxzcfscbgfb f where f.cbskhfkbguuid = ? and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.ZDSSWFAJDBHUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZDSSWFAJDBLXUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.BGJZRQ, T.CJJZRQ, T.BGJGTS, T.CBJG_DM, T.CXBZ, T.WSZZRQ, T.WSZZR, T.LXDH, T.DBSWRY_DM, T.DBSWJG_DM, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.HDSLID, T.LCSLID FROM JC_ZDSSWFAJDBH T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZFYSQDJB T WHERE T.XZFYSQDJBUUID = $uuid$

select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg d where exists (select s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where exists (select j.sjswjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j where j.swjg_dm =? and j.sjswjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) and s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' and s.swjg_dm = d.sjswjg_dm) and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y'

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, (a.swjgjg || '' || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号') as sdwswszg, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from zh_sdxx a where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdhzuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwslcslid = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select tbnsdccbtztzsuuid, tbnsdcajxxuuid, djxh, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, tbnstzssndq, tbnstzssndz, tzynssr, tzynssde, ybqysdse, swjg_dm, wszzrq, sjslid ,cqysdsse from NP_TBNSDCCBTZTZS t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and t.yxbz='Y'

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s start with s.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) select t.* from fz_sswfxwdj t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfxwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.rgdjbz, 'N') = ? and exists (select 1 from swjg a where a.swjg_dm = t.djjg_dm) and ((t.sswfxwclzt_dm not in ('38', '01') and t.lcslid is null) or t.sswfxwclzt_dm in ('01')) and t.jcajbz = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjq_1 >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjz_1 <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajly in (#macroparam#))

SELECT SSWFAJXCHUUID, WTXCUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, WH, NH, STXCSWJG_DM, XCBH, DBHWSZG, DJXH, AJBH_1, AJMC, HFRQ, HFDZ, HFYZBM, HFSWJGLXR_DM, HFSWJGLXDH, LCSLID, HFDW_DM, FHSWJG_DM, FHSWJGLXDZ, FHSWJGYZBM, FHSWJGLXR_DM, FHSWJGLXDH, ZZR_DM, ZZSWJG_DM, WSZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, HJZT_DM, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_SSWFAJXCH WHERE SSWFAJXCHUUID = $sswfajxchuuid$

select t.* from jc_sswfxwjjdjb t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.lcbjbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and (1=#macroparam# or t.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.ajclyj_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or t.ajszjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.bjjrnsrsbh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.bjjrmc like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.bjjrdjzclx_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.jlr_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zbr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zbrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zbrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or t.jcayxxuuid = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid = ?)
