select t.pmbmgyxxbuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.yuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.pmbmswjg_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.flyj, t.jdnr, t.fyjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.spswjg_dm, t.wszzrq, t.dwmc, t.jdsmc, t.pmbmrq, t.pmbmdd, t.blqx, t.ggnr, t.fyje, t.pmbmsdje, t.pmbmsrje, t.xgfyje, t.djskje, t.djznjje_1, t.djfkje, t.djmswfsdje, t.rqje, t.fhsphwhzqtccly, t.fhcwswjg_dm, t.yxddzlmc, t.pgjdyj, t.pgjdwtlx_dm, t.pgjdstlx_dm, t.hcr_dm, t.hcrq, t.hth, t.wtpmbmhtnr, t.wthtqdrq, t.wtdwfddbrxm, t.wtdwfddbrzw, t.strxm, t.strgzdw, t.strzw, t.strzjlx_dm, t.wszg, t.pmbmjdswszg, t.strzjhm, t.dlqx, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm from fz_pmbmgyxxb t where nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and t.lcslid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$

select t.TZYQSQDJBUUID, t.TZSQDJBUUID, t.YJLX_DM, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFBZ_1, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SJSLID, t.sqr, t.SSWFXWDJUUID, t.SQSX, t.SQRQ, t.DJR_DM, t.DJRQ from FZ_TZYQSQDJB t where t.tzyqsqdjbuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm from (select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where nspg.nsrssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and nspg.djxh = ? and (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and (nspg.YDCZRY_DM is null) union all select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM is not null and nspg.djxh = ?) nspg

select JCAYXXUUID, JCAYBH, DJXH, ZCAJBH, ZCAJMC, AYSZJG_DM, AYSZBM_DM, AJLX_DM, AYNCLYJSM, WSBH, XGCL, ZYNR, JLR_DM, JLRQ, NCLCBDW, NCLCBRQ, NCLYHFRQ, QDTJ, WFWZLX_DM, AJCLYJ_DM, QDSX, JCAJXXUUID, BABZ, NSRSBH, NSRMC, HY_DM, DJZCLX_DM, ZGSWJG_DM, SWJCAYZT_DM, SSWFLX_DM from jc_ayxx where ZCAJBH = ?

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWCLGZB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWCLGZBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SJSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FLCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FHDSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)

SELECT T.FJMCBGCZYXXCDBUUID, T.WSBH, T.HBMC, T.SFGCCSJG, T.CDFLXR_DM, T.CDFLXDH, T.CDFSWJG_DM, T.CDRQ, T.JSR_DM, T.JSRQ, T.JSJG_DM, T.JSFLXDH, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_FJMCBGCZYXXCDB T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.FJMCBGCZYXXCDBUUID = $uuid$

select t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_zb t,Fz_Sphwhzqtcc cc where t.ywzjuuid=cc.sphwhzqtccuuid and ajxxuuid=$value1$ and lcslid=$value2$ union select zb.dbccmc as sphwhzqtccmc,zb.dbccjldw as jldw_dm,zb.dbccsl as sl,zb.dbccdj as dj,zb.dbccje as je from fz_nsdbs ns,fz_nsdbccqd qd,fz_nsdbccqd_zb zb where ns.nsdbsuuid=qd.nsdbsuuid and qd.nsdbccqduuid=zb.nsdbccqduuid and ns.ajxxuuid=$value3$ union select zb.sphwhzqtccmc,zb.jldw_dm,zb.sl,zb.dj,zb.je from fz_ssbqxxb xxb,Fz_Sphwhzqtcc t ,Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_zb zb where xxb.jcbz='N' and t.jdsuuid=xxb.ssbqxxbuuid and t.sphwhzqtccuuid =zb.ywzjuuid and xxb.ajxxuuid=$value4$

select t.JCAJXXUUID, t.ZZFF, t.ZZSJ, t.ZZDD, t.WJLY, t.WJGS, t.WJCD, t.ZMR, t.SWJG_DM, t.STZLDZZJUUID, t.ZZR, t.SJSLID, t.ZFBZ_1, t.BQZDXYJ, t.BQZDXQM, t.BQZDXQMSJ, t.WSBH, t.YJCFC, t.fjuuid from jc_stzldzzj t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select s.sjfhfpuuid, s.bzxrmc, s.zxr_dm, s.wszzrq, s.swjg_dm, s.swjgjbr_dm, s.bfhfpdwjsr, s.dzbzdszl_dm, s.lcslid, s.hdslid, s.sjslid, s.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, s.zfr_dm, s.zfrq_1, s.zfbz_1, s.lrr_dm, s.lrrq, s.sjgsdq, d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, decode(x.swjgjg, null, '', x.swjgjg || '' || x.zg || '〔' || x.nh || '〕' || x.wh || '号') as wszg from fz_sjfhfp s, fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_sjtzfsfpxxb x where s.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = x.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid and x.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and s.sjfhfpuuid = $uuid$
select n.* from td_fxmx_nspgb n where n.fxydxh = ? and n.ydlx_bj = ? order by n.ydlx_bj desc
select a.* from NP_YYDJAJXXB a where a.lcslid = ? and a.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?
select dcb.nsxydjpfdcbuuid, dcb.djxh, dcb.pfhj, dcb.ckdj, dcb.dcr, dcb.dcrq, dcb.zgswjg_dm, dcb.swjgfzrxm, dcb.zgswjgqrrq from Np_Nsxydjpfdcb dcb where dcb.nsxydjpfdcbuuid = ? and dcb.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select sjjdyjclzbuuid, ywzjuuid, zspm_dm, skssqq, skssqz, lcslid, dzbzdszl_dm, zsxm_dm, jdyjzsskje, jdyjzsznjje, yzpzxh, jsyj, sldwse, jsyj_1 from fz_sjjdyjclzb t where lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* from FZ_QZZXDJB T WHERE T.QZZXDJBUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc, b.sy, a.zgswjg_dm, c.zgjysuuid from jc_ajxx a, jc_jcjys b,jc_zgjys c where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid and c.jcajxxuuid = a.jcajxxuuid and a.jcajxxuuid = ? and (b.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR b.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)
select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.hsyjsm, t.tbrq_1, t.hsyj_dm from np_tbnsdcjazjhsyjjlb t where t.tbnsdcjazjhsyjjlbuuid = $uuid$
select y.* from np_swyttzs y where y.nspgajxxuuid = ? and nvl(y.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select a.nspgbguuid, b.zxbztzsuuid, c.nsqkzcbgbuuid, d.nszczxqkqrbuuid from np_nspgbg a, np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz b, np_nsqkzcbgb c, np_nszczxqkqrb d where a.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid(+) and a.nspgajxxuuid = c.nspgajxxuuid(+) and a.nspgajxxuuid = d.nspgajxxuuid(+) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.nspgajxxuuid = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC T WHERE T.LCSLID = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj1$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

select a.*, a.swjgjg || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号' as wszg, a.wfxwlx as zlxqgzsy, c.djxh from fz_sswfxwdj c, fz_zlxqgzxxb a where c.sswfxwdjuuid = a.sswfxwdjuuid and a.xgswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.lrr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.wszzrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.wszzrq < ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.zlxqgzzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.djxh = ?) and nvl(a.ywfl_dm, 'A12') = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?

SELECT T.XSDWCXQJGUUID, T.DJXH,T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC,T.SQSX,T.SQYJ_1,T.SQR_DM, T.SQRQ,T.ZSR_DM,T.ZSRQ_3,T.MSQSZUUID, T.SLFYMC,T.WSZG,T.SFSLBZ,T.FYSLRQ, T.LCSLID,T.HDSLID,T.SJSLID, T.LRR_DM,T.LRRQ,T.ZSTYBZ FROM FZ_XSDWCXQ_JG T WHERE T.XSDWCXQJGUUID = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select a.* from np_tbnsdcajxxb a where a.tbnsdcajbh = $uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_sjhcbgshb b where b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = ?

select t.jcckzhxkzmuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.jscxdw, t.jcry, t.jcrysl, nvl(t.jczhms, t.jczhm) jczhms, t.bcxckzhkhrmc, t.wszzrq, t.swjg_dm, t.swxzzfsqbuuid, t.cxnr, t.lcslid from jc_jcckzhxkzm t where t.jcckzhxkzmuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select j.* from jc_swjctzsy j where j.ywzjuuid = ? and j.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(j.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select b.ybhtjgfftzsuuid, a.yydjapajbh as ajbh, a.yydjapajmc as ajmc, a.yydjapaybh as aybh, a.apsyrqq as dcsjq, a.apsyrqz as dcsjz, a.yydjsxxxuuid as swsxuuid, a.djxh from np_yydjsxxx a, np_ybhtsqdjb b where b.ybhtsqdjbuuid = a.ybhtsqdjbuuid and a.djxh = $uuid$ and b.YBHTJGFFTZSUUID is not null and NVL(a.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select dqzbzlqdmxuuid, zbzlmc, t2.sl - t2.thzh sl, zlsssqq, zlsssqz, dw_1, dqthzbzllx_dm, t2.ys - t2.thys ys, bz from (select t1.dqzbzlqdmxuuid, t1.zbzlmc, t1.sl, t1.zlsssqq, t1.zlsssqz, t1.dw_1, t1.dqthzbzllx_dm, t1.ys, nvl(sum(thqd.ys), 0) thys, t1.bz, nvl(sum(thqd.sl), 0) thzh from (select mx.dqzbzlqdmxuuid, mx.zbzlmc, mx.sl, mx.zlsssqq, mx.zlsssqz, mx.dw_1, mx.dqthzbzllx_dm, mx.ys, mx.bz from jc_dqzbzlqd_mx mx, jc_dqzbzlqd dqqd where dqqd.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and mx.dqzbzlqduuid = dqqd.dqzbzlqduuid and dqqd.zfbz_1 = 'N' and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N') t1 left join jc_dqzbzlthmxqd thqd on t1.dqzbzlqdmxuuid = thqd.dqzbzlqdmxuuid and thqd.zfbz_1 = 'N' group by t1.dqzbzlqdmxuuid, t1.zbzlmc, t1.sl, t1.zlsssqq, t1.zlsssqz, t1.dw_1, t1.dqthzbzllx_dm, t1.ys, t1.bz) t2 where t2.sl > t2.thzh

select m.* from Np_Nspgbgsjskmx m where m.nspgbguuid in (select c.nspgbguuid from np_nspgbg c where c.nspgajxxuuid in (select a.nspgajxxuuid from np_nspgajxxb a, np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz b where a.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid and b.zxbztzsuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = $lcslid$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$) and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = $qrbz$)

select t.sdhzuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.hzbh, t.wssdfs_dm, t.hzzzrq, t.xhrq_1, t.wsssdrxm, t.wssddz, t.wssdrxm, t.dsr, t.dsly, t.jsly, t.jzrxm_1, t.wssdrq, t.xhr_dm, t.tfjg_dm, t.hdslid, t.lcslid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.hzdh from zh_sdhz t where t.lcslid =$lcslid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$

select b.gxssybtmxbuuid, b.tbnsdctztzsuuid, b.tbnsdcajxxuuid, b.zrdjtzynssrhsdetzsuuid, b.djxh, b.sz_dm, b.zspm_dm, to_date((to_char(b.ssnd)||'-01-01') ,'yyyy-mm-dd') skssqq, to_date((to_char(b.ssnd)||'-12-31') ,'yyyy-mm-dd') skssqz, b.yjse, b.yjse_2, b.ybtse, b.jslxqk, b.dzbzdszl_dm, b.yzpzxh, b.sjslid, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.jzlvadd5jslxqk, b.jzlljslxqk, b.lcslid, b.zxtzbz, b.tzdndks, b.yssr, b.dctzdsde, b.tzynssr, b.qysbynssde, b.zxtzdsde, b.sysl, b.sjynssde, b.mbyqndkse from np_gxssybtmxb b where b.yzpzxh = ? union all select s.gxssybtmxbuuid as gxssybtmxbuuid, s.yydjapbtsktzsuuid as tbnsdctztzsuuid, s.yydjsxxxuuid as tbnsdcajxxuuid, null zrdjtzynssrhsdetzsuuid, s.djxh, s.zsxm_dm as sz_dm , s.zspm_dm, s.skssqq, s.skssqz, s.yjse, s.yjse_2, s.ybtse, s.jslxqk, s.dzbzdszl_dm, s.yzpzxh, s.sjslid, s.lrr_dm, s.lrrq, null jzlvadd5jslxqk, null jzlljslxqk, null lcslid, null zxtzbz, null tzdndks, null yssr, null dctzdsde, null tzynssr, null qysbynssde, null zxtzdsde, null sysl, null sjynssde, null mbyqndkse from np_ssybtmxb s where s.yzpzxh = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.SWJCZBLSQBUUID, t.WSBH, t.SQJG, t.SQSJ, t.LCSLID, t.BZ_1,t.LRR_DM from jc_swjczblsqb t where t.LCSLID=$uuid$

select x.sztzxmbuuid, x.djxh, x.yydjsxxxuuid, x.tznd, x.jzje, x.qysbsde, x.tzdndkse, x.tzqynssde, x.tzhynssde, x.mbyqndkse, x.btsktzsuuid, x.lrr_dm, x.lrrq, x.sjgsdq from Np_Sztzxmb x where (1 = #macroparam# or x.sztzxmbuuid = ?) and x.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZFYTZBL T WHERE T.XZFYTZBLUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

SELECT FJMQYSWSXLLHUUID, WSZG, SDFSDZGSWJG_DM, NSRMC, JTFHNR, KJYWRSBH, KJYWRMC, ZFRQ, KJYWRSZDZGSWJG_DM, WSZZRQ, ZGSWJGYZBM, ZGSWJGDZ, ZGSWJGLXR_DM, ZGSWJGLXDH, ZGSWJGCZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, NSRSBH FROM ZH_FJMQYSWSXLLH WHERE FJMQYSWSXLLHUUID = $fjmqyswsxllhuuid$

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.dcxcuuid, t.rwbh, t.rwbh as tbnsdcaybh, t.djxh, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.ajmc, t.jcssqq, t.jcssqz, t.larq, t.jarq, t.sjgsdq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.jcry, t.jcjg_dm, t.dclx_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zjhsbz, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc from np_tbnsdcajxxb t where t.tbnsdcajzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.djxh = ?
update NP_GXSSYBTMXB g set g.yzpzxh ='',g.xgrq=?,xgr_dm=? where g.tbnsdctztzsuuid=?
select t.* from jc_lkcwpz t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select T.SSBQXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.YUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.DJCKJRJGMC, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.DJCKSJ, T.WSZZRQ, T.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, T.DJCKZHYE, T.QSRXM_1, T.YHQSRQ, T.QSDWQZRQ, T.DJCKXXJE, T.XQJNSKQX, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.CFKYRQ, T.BQBDWMC, T.BQCS, T.JCSSBQCSLY, T.JCDJCKRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SSBQFLYJ, T.BLJCCFKYSXSX, T.JCBZ, T.DJCKJE, T.DJCKDXJE, t.djckzh_1 from fz_ssbqxxb t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$
SELECT * FROM NP_DBYYDJAPQSSQB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or T.DBYYDJAPQSSQBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.LCSLID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
select NSPGBGSJSKMXUUID, NSPGBGUUID, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, PGSJSKJE, TZLDJE, YNSSDETZE, SSQQ, SSQZ, LCSLID, HDSLID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from np_nspgbgsjskmx where nspgbguuid =$nspgbguuid$
select * from np_tbnsdctztzs t where t.tbnsdctztzsuuid = $uuid$
update jc_swcljdqkb fb set fb.swcljdsuuid = null where fb.swcljdsuuid in (#macroparam#)
select q.* from np_fxyd_qtydczqkb q where q.bguuid = ?

select t.sdwsuuid as ywwsuuid, t.dzbzdszl_dm as dzbzdszlDm,t.wh,t.nh,n.csbuuid,n.zdmc,n.zdlx,n.zdzwmc,t.gywsuuid from zh_sdxx t,cs_jc_xgzdpzb n where t.dzbzdszl_dm=n.dzbzdszl_dm and t.dzbzdszl_dm in ('BDA1120032', 'BDA0710106') and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and ajxxuuid = $uuid$

select t.swsxtzsxjkjsyuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.swxzzfsqbuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.spswjg_dm, t.jdnr, t.djxmmc, t.djskje, t.djznjje_1, t.djfkje, t.djmsffsdje, t.jehj, t.qjje, t.bjqx, t.wszzrq, t.jkqx, t.swjg_dm from fz_swsxtzs_xjkjsy t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
SELECT T.DJZCLX_DM, T.DJZCLXMC, T.DLBZ, T.ZLBZ, T.SJDJZCLX_DM, T.XYBZ, T.YXBZ FROM DM_DJ_DJZCLX T WHERE T.DJZCLX_DM = ? START WITH T.DJZCLX_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR T.DJZCLX_DM = T.SJDJZCLX_DM
select t.tbnstzlasqbzbuuid, t.tbnsdclasqbuuid, t.gljylx_dm, t.gljyje, t.gljynd from np_tbnsdclasqb_zb t where t.tbnsdclasqbuuid =$uuid$

select distinct lh.lhqkdjbuuid,lh.qbbh,lh.lhf,lh.swrq,bw.fwzh_1,bw.fwmc_1,bw.yqhfrq,bw.bwqkdjbuuid,lh.hjclyj from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb left join np_lhqkdjb lh on qkb.lhqkdjbuuid = lh.lhqkdjbuuid left join np_bwqkdjb bw on lh.lhqkdjbuuid = bw.lhqkdjbuuid where qkb.czzt in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or lh.qbbh = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwzh_1 =#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwmc_1 =#macroparam#)

select t.* from NP_YNSSDETZXMB_ZB t where t.ynssdetzxmbuuid=$uuid$

select l.swcljdqkbuuid, l.jcajxxuuid, l.zsxm_dm, l.zspm_dm, l.skzzfs_dm, l.skssqq, l.skssqz, l.sldwse, l.wfwzlx_dm, l.yzpzxh, l.sjslid, l.ybtse, l.jdxz_dm, l.zgswskfj_dm, l.jsyjtzs, l.mbyqndks, l.nsqx, l.xxsetzse, l.xxsetjse, l.jxsetzse, l.jxsetjse, l.ldsetze, l.cbskhfkbguuid, l.lcslid, l.yzpzmxxh, l.yzpzxh, l.wfwzxw_dm, l.jsyjsbs, l.ynse_1, l.mswfsdje, l.zgswjg_dm, l.wfcy_dm, l.ncfbs, l.ncfje, l.xxsesbs, l.jxsesbs, l.ldsesbs, l.swcljdsuuid, l.sjtb_sj, l.zszm_dm, l.hy_dm, l.djxh, l.sshj_dm, l.cktsywlx, l.ywfl_dm, l.sfxcznjqs from jc_swcljdqkb l where l.cbskhfkbguuid = ? and nvl(l.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select tbnsdccbtzyjyyjlbuuid, tbnsdcajxxuuid, djxh, yytcrq, sdcbtzyjrq, jlrq, lrryssswjg_dm, lrr_dm, qyyynr from NP_TBNSDCCBTZYJYYJLB t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and t.yxbz='Y'
SELECT M.* FROM CS_FZ_FLFGWH M WHERE M.SYJUUID IS NULL
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAJXXB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJAJZT_DM = ?) AND T.DJXH = ? AND nvl(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
select y.tzyqsqdjbuuid, y.yjlx_dm, y.lcslid, y.hdslid, y.sqsx, y.sqrq, y.sqr, y.djr_dm, y.djrq, y.tzsqdjbuuid, y.sswfxwdjuuid from FZ_TZYQSQDJB y where y.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and NVL(y.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select nsr.nsrmc, sxxx.yydjapajbh as yydjapbh, zssq.sy, zssq.yj_1, zssq.sqrq, zssq.sqsx, sxxx.yydjaplx_dm as yydjaplx, sxxx.apsyrqq, sxxx.apsyrqz, glf.sjglfmc, glf.gjhdqmc as gjdq, zssq.ssxddyfswzgdjmc from np_yydjsxxx sxxx left join np_yydjapzssqdjb zssq on zssq.yydjsxxxuuid = sxxx.yydjsxxxuuid and sxxx.yydjapzssqdjbuuid = zssq.yydjapzssqdjbuuid left join dj_nsrxx nsr on nsr.djxh = sxxx.djxh left join np_sjglfxx glf on glf.yydjapzssqdjbuuid = zssq.yydjsxxxuuid where nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) = ? and sxxx.djxh=? and nvl(sxxx.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT SXFZAJQKDCBGUUID, JCAJXXUUID, WSBH, WFSS, CLQK, JBQK, WSZZRQ, SWJG_DM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, LCSLID, HDSLID, SJSLID, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, QTQKSM FROM JC_SXFZAJQKDCBG WHERE SXFZAJQKDCBGUUID = $uuid$

SELECT T.QYSSJCQKJJGFHUUID, T.HJXXBUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.QYSSJCQKJJGFHBH, T.BJCQYDJXH, T.JCAJBH, T.JCQKSM, T.YBTSEHJ, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ, T.LXR, T.LXDH, T.QFR, T.FHSWJG_DM, T.FHRQ_2 FROM ZH_QYSSJCQKJJGFH T WHERE T.QYSSJCQKJJGFHUUID = $uuid$
select t.* from fz_dbz t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

SELECT DJ.WFXWBH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, GZS.NCFJE, DJ.WFXWMC AS WFAJMC, SD.WSSDSJ, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AS WFAJUUID, DJ.DJXH, 'N' AS JCAJBZ, GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID GZSUUID, GZS.WSZG FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND TZ.TZZT != '4') AND DJ.DJJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '01' AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND GZS.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND SD.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' UNION SELECT JC.JCAJBH AS WFXWBH, JC.NSRSBH, JC.NSRMC, GZS.NCFJE, JC.AJMC AS WFAJMC, SD.WSSDSJ, JC.JCAJXXUUID AS WFAJUUID, JC.DJXH, 'Y' AS JCAJBZ, GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID GZSUUID, GZS.WSZG FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD, JC_AJXX JC WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = JC.JCAJXXUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND TZ.TZZT != '4') AND DJ.DJJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'Y' AND GZS.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND SD.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' UNION SELECT DJ.WFXWBH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, GZS.CFJE AS NCFJE, DJ.WFXWMC AS WFAJMC, SD.WSSDSJ, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AS WFAJUUID, DJ.DJXH, 'N' AS JCAJBZ, GZS.SBFXZCFSXGZSUUID GZSUUID, GZS.WSZG FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ DJ, FZ_SHBXFXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SBFXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_TZSQDJB TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFXWDJUUID = DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(TZ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND TZ.TZZT != '4') AND DJ.DJJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '01' AND DJ.SSWFXWCLZT_DM != '38' AND DJ.JCAJBZ = 'N' AND GZS.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SD.SDZT_DM = '03' AND SD.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.YJBM_DM, T.YJRY_DM, T.YJRQ, T.JSBM_DM, T.JSRY_DM, T.JSRQ, T.SWJG_DM, T.JCAJYJZLJJQDUUID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.SSHJ_DM, T.WSBH FROM JC_SWJCAJYJZLJJQD T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$

select t.SWJCGZDGUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SWJG_DM, t.JCRYQMRQ, t.BCDXDSRCSYJ, t.BCDXQZ, t.JBRQZRQ, t.JCRYQM_1, t.NSRJBRQZ, t.JCRQ_1, t.NRZY, t.SJSLID, t.ZFBZ_1, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.ys from jc_swjcgzdg t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

SELECT T.AJQKBGUUID, T.SSWFAJDBHUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.BSHJ, T.SARY, T.ZBGBT, T.JZQK, T.DYABGBLX_DM, T.SADQ, T.SASE, T.SAFPFS, T.AJFXRQ, T.FLZLMC, T.ZXQK, T.LXR_DM, T.LXDH, T.JARQ, T.JYAQ, T.CCQK, T.ZTBGNR, T.SLRQ, T.HDSLID, T.LCSLID, T.YBGCS, T.SWJG_DM, T.BGRQ_1, T.SCBGSJ, T.AJZBDW_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SJSLID, T.JSBMZ, T.JSRQM, T.WSZG, T.TBRQM, T.TBRQMRQ, T.JSBMMC, T.JSRMC, T.JSRQMRQ, T.TZBMZ FROM JC_AJQKBG T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.LCSLID = $uuid$
select s.sbzjwh, s.shr from np_jsssqbclqkb j, np_sjhcbgshb s where j.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = s.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid and j.lhqkdjbuuid = ?
select * from jc_ajxx t,jc_ayxx y where t.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and t.nsrsbh = ?

select t.yydjapuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.hzqdyydjapswjgmc, t.apsymynsndqxq, t.apsymynsndqxz, t.djyzyjsyj, t.ssxddyfqdrq, t.yydjapqddd, t.sxrq, t.zrdjff, t.qyfqzrzw, t.qyfqzrxm, t.tjzlmc, t.jstj, t.nsnd_1, t.sbhdwh, t.gjswjqdfqmrzw, t.gjswjqdfswjgmc, t.gjswjqdfqdrq, t.gjswjqdfqmrxm, t.dfswjqdfqmrxm, t.dfswjqdfqdrq, t.dfswjqdfqmrzw, t.dfswjqdfswjgmc, t.baswjgmc, t.barq, t.swjg_dm, t.lcslid, t.yydjapqdrq, t.zsr_dm, t.zssj, t.zstybz, t.sjglfmc, t.sjgljylx, t.qdaprq, t.tcxqsqqx, t.xyzxrqq, t.xyzxrqz, t.fjuuid, t.swjgmc,t.lrr_dm,t.lrrq from np_yydjap t where t.yydjsxxxuuid = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_CSSBBL T WHERE T.SJSLID = ?
select t.htyjsfyz,t.cshtrq,t.cshtdd,t.qyztryxm,t.dygfztr from np_cshtbwl t where t.cshtbwluuid=?

select t. XZFYGYXXBUUID, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. SQSXMC, t. SQR, t. SQRQ, t. FYSQCHRQ, t. SQCHYY, t. DJR_DM, t. DJRQ, t. JTXZXWMC, t. JTXZXWZCRQ, t. WSZG, t. SQLY, t. TZJTXZXWYY_DM, t. YQSFHL, t. SFDCHJXY, t. DCHJXYRQ, t. HJXYZYNR, t. TCHFXRQ, t. GFXWJWSZG, t. GFXWJMC, t. TQCLLY, t. FYYJHJYLXMC, t. SDJGBM, t. SDJGBMDZ, t. ZSRQ_3, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSTYBZ, t. SDR_DM, t. WSSDRQ, t. SFFH_1, t. FHLY, t. DJR, t. SFFK, t. CLJG, t. CLR_DM, t. CLRQ, t. FKRQ, t. DZBZDSZL_DM, t. LCSWSX_DM, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. GFXWJCLLY_DM, t. SFYSQ, t. FLYJ, t.sqsx from FZ_XZFYGYXXB t where t.XZFYGYXXBUUID = $uuid$

select c.swyttzsuuid, c.swjgjg, c.pgajbh, c.zg, c.nh, c.wh, c.djxh, c.ytsj, t.swytqrqkjlbuuid, t.ytgnsrwtdldhfzm, t.sfwtswdlr, t.swdlrxm, t.swdlrssdw, t.yqhytsj, t.qtqksm, t.ytqrfkjg_dm, t.jlr_dm, t.jlrq, t.nspgajxxuuid from NP_SWYTQRQKJLB t, np_swyttzs c where t.lcslid = ? and t.sjslid = ? and t.swyttzsuuid = c.swyttzsuuid and nvl(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select swyttzsuuid, swjgjg, pgajbh, zg, nh, wh, djxh, ytsj, swytqrqkjlbuuid, ytgnsrwtdldhfzm, sfwtswdlr, swdlrxm, swdlrssdw, yqhytsj, qtqksm, ytqrfkjg_dm, jlr_dm, jlrq, nspgajxxuuid from (select c.swyttzsuuid, c.swjgjg, c.pgajbh, c.zg, c.nh, c.wh, c.djxh, c.ytsj, t.swytqrqkjlbuuid, t.ytgnsrwtdldhfzm, t.sfwtswdlr, t.swdlrxm, t.swdlrssdw, t.yqhytsj, t.qtqksm, t.ytqrfkjg_dm, t.jlr_dm, t.jlrq, t.nspgajxxuuid from NP_SWYTQRQKJLB t, np_swyttzs c where t.lcslid = ? and t.sjslid = ? and t.lcslid = c.lcslid and t.swyttzsuuid is null and nvl(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' order by c.ytsj desc) where rownum = 1
select b.* from NP_YNSEHDTZS b where (1 = #macroparam# or b.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.ynsehdtzsuuid = ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT YJ.YJSKSYQKBUUID, YJ.YJSKUUID, YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID, YJ.JCAJXXUUID, YJ.LCSLID, YJ.SJSLID, YJ.ZSXM_DM, YJ.ZSPM_DM, YJ.ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, YJ.HY_DM, YJ.SKSSQQ, YJ.SKSSQZ, YJ.RKRQ, YJ.DJXH, YJ.SYJE, YJ.ZNJ, YJ.SYBZ, YJ.Yzpzxh, YJ.Yzpzmxxh, CL.Sz_Dm SKZZFS_DM, CL.Zspm_Dm ZSZSPM, yj.znjjkqx, cl.ssnd||'-01-01' qkbskssqq, cl.ssnd||'-12-31' qkbskssqz FROM JC_CBYJSYQKB YJ, np_gxssybtmxb CL, np_tbnsdctztzs ds WHERE YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID = CL.Gxssybtmxbuuid and cl.tbnsdctztzsuuid = ds.tbnsdctztzsuuid AND YJ.SYBZ = 'Y' and ds.tbnsdctztzsuuid = $uuid$

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid as swsxuuid, t.djxh, t.tbnsdcajbh as ajbh, t.ajmc, t.ydwtsjndq as dcsjq, t.ydwtsjndz as dcsjz from np_tbnsdcajxxb t where t.tbnsdcajbh is not null and t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.tbnsdcajbh = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajmc like #macroparam#)
select * from np_qykbxysfxrdb n where n.qykbxysfxrdbuuid = $uuid$

select t.FPHPZBKFPMXUUID, t.FPHPZUUID, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDSL, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDDJ, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDJE, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDSL_1, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDSE, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMMC, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDJLDWMC from jc_fphpz_bkfpmx t where t.FPHPZUUID = $uuid$

select y.yydjsxxxuuid, y.djxh, y.yydjapajbh, y.yydjapajmc, y.yydjapaybh, y.yydjajzt_dm, y.yydjaplx_dm, y.apsyrqq, y.apsyrqz, sq.yydjapzssqdjbuuid from np_yydjsxxx y, np_yydjapzssqdjb sq where y.yydjsxxxuuid = sq.yydjsxxxuuid and y.yydjajzt_dm != '500' and y.yydjsxxxuuid =? and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.sjswjg_dm, d.swjgbz, d.jgjc_dm, d.swjgjg from DM_GY_SWJG d where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' and d.sjswjg_dm = ?
select * from NP_YYDJAPXSJG T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SHBXFFZMXXXB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID IN (#macroparam#)
SELECT T.SWJG_DM, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.FYJG_DM CODE, T.FYJGMC CAPTION FROM CS_FZ_FYJGPZ T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM = ?

select f.zgswskfj_dm, f.djxh, f.yjskhj, q.hy_dm, q.zsxm_dm, q.zspm_dm, q.skssqq, q.skssqz, q.ybtse, q.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid qkbuuid, 'JC' bz, 'YBCF' yllx, 'jc' jcfzbz, q.cflx_dm, decode(q.cflx_dm, '105', '31', '32') skzl_dm, decode(q.cflx_dm, '105', '0503', '0501') sksx_dm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk q, jc_zfjgftmx f where q.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid = f.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid and f.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.swxzcfjdsuuid = ?

select t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.lcslid, t.sjgsdq, t.swjg_dm, t.ajlx_dm, t.dclx_dm, t.dlcadzjjgryxm, t.tbnstzssndq, t.tbnstzssndz, t.tzhyk, t.tzhnsqk, t.tzhykzt, t.tzhjrhlnd, t.qysdstzynse, t.zzstzynse, t.xfsyssre, t.xfstzynse, t.yystzynse, t.qtsyssre, t.qtstzynse, t.sjtb_sj, t.jasqrq, t.qysdsmbkse, t.qysdsdzynssde, t.zzsdzqkyssr, t.yysyssre, t.dcjljcbdzfajs, t.yxzcdzff, t.yxzcdndzjyje, t.wxzcdzff, t.wxzndzjyje, t.tglwdzff, t.tglwndzjyje, t.rtzjdzff, t.rtzjndzjyje,t.zjdljgmc, t.zjdljglxdh, t.zjdljgemail,t.lrr_dm,t.fjuuid,s.sfwzs from np_tbnsdcjasqb t,np_tbnsdcjashb s where t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid = s.tbnsdcjasqbuuid(+) and (t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $tbnsdcajxxuuid$ or 1 = $ajlxDm$) and (t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid = $tbnsdcjasqbuuid$ or 1 = $dclxDm$)
Select PZB.Xydjqdqxuuid,PZB.XYDJQDQXQ qsrq,PZB.XYDJQDQXZ zzrq From NP_XYDJQDQXPZB PZB Where PZB.PDLX='0' And PZB.ZGSWSKFJ_DM=?

select ZFJGFTMXUUID, NCBTSKHZBUUID, SWJCBGUUID, DJXH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, BLSL, YJSKHJ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, SWCLJDQKBUUID, SJSLID, JCAJXXUUID, SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID, ZFBZ_1 from jc_zfjgftmx where jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and zfbz_1 = 'N' and ncbtskhzbuuid is not null
select sdr_dm from zh_sdhz_sdr t where t.sdhzuuid = ?

SELECT T.AJQKBGUUID, T.SSWFAJDBHUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.BSHJ, T.SARY, T.ZBGBT, T.JZQK, T.DYABGBLX_DM, T.SADQ, T.SASE, T.SAFPFS, T.AJFXRQ, T.FLZLMC, T.ZXQK, T.LXR_DM, T.LXDH, T.JARQ, T.JYAQ, T.CCQK, T.ZTBGNR, T.SLRQ, T.HDSLID, T.LCSLID, T.YBGCS, T.SWJG_DM, T.BGRQ_1, T.SCBGSJ, T.AJZBDW_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SJSLID FROM JC_AJQKBG T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.Jcajxxuuid = $uuid$

select m.AYLYWSZG, m.AYDJJG_DM, m.AYDJBM_DM, m.AYDJR_DM, m.LRR_DM, m.ZFBZ_1, m.ZFR_DM, m.SJGSDQ, m.AYXXTGFMC, m.JCAYXXLY_DM from jc_ayxx_lymx m, jc_ayxx x where m.jcayxxuuid = x.jcayxxuuid and x.djxh = ?

select t. FCAJQCUUID, t. FCJHUUID, t. JCAJXXUUID, t. FCAJMC, t. FCAJBH, t. CZRQ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. WSBH, t. YAJBH, t. YAJMC, t. YAJCLDW_DM, t. NSRSBH, t. NSRMC, t. FCSJQ, t. FCSJZ, t. FCZYQM, t.djxh, t.sjskze, t.SJFKZE from JC_FCAJQC t,jc_ajxx a where t.fcjhuuid = $uuid$ and t.jcajxxuuid=a.jcajxxuuid
select t.* from jc_cbyjsyqkb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)

SELECT a.zsxm_dm,SUM(a.jsyjjctzse) AS jsyjjctzse,SUM(a.jsyjjctjse) AS jsyjjctjse,SUM(a.jsyjjctzje) AS jsyjjctzje,SUM(a.yjhkcejctzse) AS yjhkcejctzse,SUM(a.yjhkcejctjse) AS yjhkcejctjse,SUM(a.yjhkcejctzje) AS yjhkcejctzje,SUM(a.ybtse) AS ybtse,SUM(a.ncfje) AS ncfje FROM jc_sswfwtgjjsb_zb a WHERE a.sswfwtgjjsbuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY a.zsxm_dm ORDER BY a.zsxm_dm
select t.yjskuuid,sum(t.syje) as syje from jc_cbyjsyqkb t where t.sjslid in (#macroparam#) group by yjskuuid

select t.tbnsdcjajlzfqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.bcyj, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid,a.tbnsdcajbh,a.jarq from np_tbnsdcjazfqkb t,np_tbnsdcajxxb a where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid(+)

select b.dzbzdszl_dm, b.zdmc, b.bmc, b.ywzj, a.sdwsuuid,b.csbuuid,b.bz_1,b.zdlx,b.zdzwmc from zh_sdxx a, cs_jc_xgzdpzb b where a.dzbzdszl_dm = b.dzbzdszl_dm and a.ajxxuuid = ? and (a.zfbz_1 is null or a.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.zdswajsljyuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.ydrs, t.sdrs, t.slwyhzcr_dm, t.slwyhcy, t.swhszswjg_dm, t.swhslrq, t.swhslyjlx_dm, t.nzccljdnr, t.nzccfjdnr, t.slwyhcyqm, t.slwyhcyqzrq, t.jlr, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.dsrwfss, t.clyj_1, t.qfrq, t.zcrxm, t.ajjbqk, t.jdyjnr, t.qtqksm, t.slwyhzcrxm, t.qxrxm, t.lxrxm_1, t.fsdw, t.qfr, t.wsbh, t.cxrmc from Fz_Zdswajsljy t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.wszg ,t.bzclbcdctzsuuid ,t.lrrq,t.bzclbcdcjzrq from jc_bzclbcdctzs t where t.jcajxxuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$ and t.sjslid is not null and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc

select t. SSSXNBYSJFKBUUID, t. UUID, t. DJXH, t. AJBH_1, t. NSRSBH, t. NSRMC, t. SCJYDZ, t. LXDH, t. JSBM_DM, t. NBYSSSSXLX_DM, t. CZYD, t. QTSM, t. FPSHJCBZ, t. YJR_DM, t. YJRQ, t. YJBM_DM, t. FKBM_DM, t. FKRQ, t. FKNR, t. CLBZ, t. CLRQ, t. CLJG, t. FKDJR_DM, t. FKDJRQ, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. ZSTYBZ, t. HDSLID, t. LCSLID, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. LCSWSX_DM, t. FLCSLID, t. QDR_DM, t. QDRQ, t. QDSWJG_DM from ZH_SSSXNBYSJFKB t where t.SSSXNBYSJFKBUUID = $uuid$

select distinct lh.lhqkdjbuuid,lh.qbbh,lh.lhf,lh.swrq,bw.fwzh_1,bw.fwmc_1,bw.yqhfrq,bw.bwqkdjbuuid,lh.hjclyj from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb left join np_lhqkdjb lh on qkb.lhqkdjbuuid = lh.lhqkdjbuuid left join np_bwqkdjb bw on lh.lhqkdjbuuid = bw.lhqkdjbuuid where qkb.czzt in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or lh.qbbh =#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwzh_1 =#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwmc_1 =#macroparam#)

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM FROM JC_AJXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.AJJCZT_DM NOT IN ('500','501','502','503') AND nvl(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdcjashbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.shyjsm, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.shrq, t.sfwzs, t.ajxtry, t.sfwzdaj, t.sjtb_sj, t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid, t.shyj_dm from np_tbnsdcjashb t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.hdslid = $hdslid$

SELECT XZFYGYWSUUID, XZFYSQDJBUUID, DJXH, NSRMC, NSRSBH, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, XZFYJG_DM, XZFYJGMC, SLSWJG_DM, TZZCRXM, TZSJ, TZDD, BXWDCRXM, DJXYNR, SQR, SLFYRQ, SWJG_DM, WSZZRQ, TZSUUID, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ_3, DZBZDSZL_DM, LCSWSX_DM, LCSLID, HDSLID, SJSLID, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFBZ_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, XZFYGYXXBUUID, ZSTYBZ, SJTB_SJ, SQRMC, FLYJ, TZZCRZGZSHM, XZFYZZYYLX_DM_1, XZFYZZYYLX_DM, WSZG, WFSSHSHSX, PBXWT, GJJY, XZJGMC, WFGDXW, CFJY, ZCXZFYJDJZRQ, TZZXJTXZXWRQ, TZZXLY, SFFK, FKRQ, FKYJ, CLJG, DJR_DM, DJRQ FROM FZ_XZFYGYWS WHERE XZFYGYXXBUUID = $xzfygyxxbuuid$ AND DZBZDSZL_DM != 'BDA1220028' AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT FP.DZBZDSZL_DM FROM ZH_FJ_FPQD FP WHERE FP.SSWFAJXCHUUID = ? UNION SELECT 'BDA1320206' AS DZBZDSZL_DM FROM ZH_FJ_TYXCYQ_FZZSDKPZ PZ WHERE PZ.SSWFAJXCHUUID = ? UNION SELECT 'BDA1320207' AS DZBZDSZL_DM FROM ZH_YZSXKTZD TZ WHERE TZ.SSWFAJXCHUUID = ?

select t.jcajxxuuid, t.jcajbh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.ajmc, t.jarq from jc_ajxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jarq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jarq <= ?) and t.ajszjg_dm=? and t.AJJCZT_DM = ?
select t.jgznxh from qx_swjg_zns t where t.zn_dm = $sjgsdq$ and t.swjg_dm = $uuid$ and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.ywzjuuid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.dzbzdszlmc, t.ywuuid from np_zdydsjxx t where t.ywuuid = (select n.tbnsdcajxxuuid from np_tbnsdctztzs n where n.tbnsdctztzsuuid = $tbnsdctztzsuuid$) and t.dzbzdszl_dm in ('BDA1020093', 'BDA1020094')
select s.* from DM_GY_SWJG s where s.xzqhsz_dm = ? and s.Ghbz = ? and s.yxbz = ?
delete from zh_sdhz_sdr s where s.sdhzuuid in (#macroparam#)

select t.tbnsdcjazjhsfsbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.zjzcy, t.fsr_dm, t.fsyj, t.hsjzrq, t.hsyjsm, t.fszt_dm, t.hsfsrq from np_tbnsdcjazjhsfsb t where t.tbnsdcjazjhsfsbuuid = $uuid$
DELETE FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC_ZB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = ? AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?

SELECT T.PMBMGYXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.YUUID, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.PMBMSWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.SY, T.YJ_1, T.FLYJ, T.JDNR, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.WSZZRQ, T.DWMC, T.JDSMC, T.PMBMRQ, T.PMBMDD, T.BLQX, T.GGNR, T.FYJE, T.PMBMSDJE, T.PMBMSRJE, T.XGFYJE, T.DJSKJE, T.DJZNJJE_1, T.DJFKJE, T.DJMSWFSDJE, T.RQJE, T.FHSPHWHZQTCCLY, T.FHCWSWJG_DM, T.YXDDZLMC, T.PGJDYJ, T.PGJDWTLX_DM, T.PGJDSTLX_DM, T.HCR_DM, T.HCRQ, T.HTH, T.WTPMBMHTNR, T.WTHTQDRQ, T.WTDWFDDBRXM, T.WTDWFDDBRZW, T.STRXM, T.STRGZDW, T.STRZW, T.STRZJLX_DM, T.STRZJHM, T.DLQX, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.WSZG, T.JDPGJGMC, T.PMBMJDSWSZG, T.PGJDBGMC, T.WTDWMC, T.PMBMCCMC, T.PZZL_DM, T.SPHM, T.TFRQ, T.SJJE, T.ZSXM_DM FROM FZ_PMBMGYXXB T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.PMBMGYXXBUUID = $uuid$
select t.basically_info as jbqk, t.trial_idea as slyjms, t.other as qtqksm from TRIAL_REPORT_NEW t where t.case_id = ?

select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz from (select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and (nspg.YDCZRY_DM is null) union all select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM is not null and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM LIKE ?) nspg order by nspg.scsj asc
select t.swjg_dm, t.sfqdlc from cs_fz_qdwfxwcllcpz t where t.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT T.YQHZFQSQYQXXBUUID, T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBUUID, T.XH, T.SQYQJNFKJE, T.SQYQJNFKQX, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SQYQJNFKJZRQ, NVL(T.PZZHJNFKJE, T.SQYQJNFKJE) AS PZZHJNFKJE, NVL(T.PZZHJNFKQX, T.SQYQJNFKJZRQ) AS PZZHJNFKQX, T.FKXXUUID FROM FZ_YQHZFQSQYQXXB T WHERE T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBUUID = $UUID$
SELECT T.LCSWSX_DM, T.SWXZZFTSXW_DM, T.SWZFXWNSYWS, T.XYBZ, T.YXBZ, T.LCSWSXMC FROM CS_FZ_SWXZZFSQCSWSDZB T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.LCSWSX_DM = ?

select t.nsdbsuuid,t.lcslid,t.zfbz_1,t.ajxxuuid,t.bh,t.nsdbrdjxh,t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc,t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm,t.nsdbrdz,t.nsdbrlxdh,t.nsdbrkhyh_dm,t.nsdbxs,t.dbsehj,t.nsdbrkhyhzh,t.nsdbccmc, t.nsqx,t.dbccmc,t.nsdbnsqx,t.dbccsl,t.dbcczmmc,t.dbdcczmfs,t.nsdbrfzr,t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc,t.nsdbrsfzjhm,t.sfzjlx_dm, t.nsdbrqsrq,t.nsrfzrqz,t.nsrfzrqzrq,t.swjgjbr_dm,t.swjgjbrqzrq,t.dbccbdcjzgj,t.dbccdqtccjz,t.wszzrq,t.dbccdcjzgj ,t.dbcczjzgj, t.yjshbxfje,t.shbxfglm,t.sfzjzl_dm,t.sfzjhm from fz_nsdbs t where t.lcslid=?

SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAJXXB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJAPAYBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJAPAJBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJAJZT_DM = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_PMBMGYXXB T WHERE T.PMBMGYXXBUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select * from fz_xzfygyws t where t.xzfysqdjbuuid = $uuid$ and t.wszzgz_dm = $value1$ and NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. FCGZDGUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. DCHSLCXQK, t. DCHSLCXQKBZ, t. RDSSZJSJQK, t. RDSSZJSJQKBZ, t. FLYJQK, t. FLYJQKBZ, t. DXCLQK, t. DXCLQKBZ, t. SWCLJDZXQK, t. SWCLJDZXQKBZ, t. SWWSSYQK, t. SWWSSYQKBZ, t. QTXMQK, t. QTXMQKBZ, t. YAJCLDWYJ, t. YAJCLDWFZRQZRQ, t. FCGZDGBH, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJSLID, t. YJCAJXXUUID, t. SJGSDQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1 from JC_FCGZDG t where t.FCGZDGUUID=$uuid$
select lhqkdjbuuid,swrq,lhrq,lhf,gnlhdw,lhzl, wflhckh,yfcqbbh,sffwfkqb, nrzy,qbbh,hjclyj, bz,djrq,djbm,lrr_dm from np_lhqkdjb where lhqkdjbuuid=?
select T.KJSSKXTZSZBUUID, T.KJSSKXTZSUUID, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG, T.SPHM from FZ_KJSSKXTZSZB T WHERE T.KJSSKXTZSUUID = $uuid$

select d.gjssqbdjbuuid, d.qbbh, d.qblx, d.czzt, d.swjgmc, d.swjg_dm, d.djry, d.djrq, d.sfht as sfth from np_gjssqbdjb d, np_ssqbsbqkb s where d.gjssqbdjbuuid = s.gjssqbdjbuuid and d.czzt in (#macroparam#) and s.sbdw = ?
update jc_dykbfpsj_zb t set t.thbz = 'N' where t.dykbfpsjuuid =?
select s.gwfhqkdjbuuid,s.gjssqbdjbuuid,s.wfqhckh,s.hsrq_2,s.fhjfrq_1,s.jfr,s.mdg,s.nhry,s.bz,s.tbry,s.tbrq from np_gwfhqkdjb s where s.gjssqbdjbuuid=?

select t.xhxscxyysqbuuid, t.sqrlxdh, t.cz, t.dzxx, t.sqrzzgdzgswjg_dm, t.ssyly, t.sqrq, t.xhxscxsqxxbuuid, t.sqyj, t.sqyj_1, t.sbrq_2, t.jssj_1, t.slyysqslr from FZ_XHXSCXYYSQB t where t.xhxscxyysqbuuid = $uuid$

select zxbztzsuuid, nspgajxxuuid, bzqx, slswjg_dm, wtms, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, wszzrq, qrbz, lcslid, sy, yj_1, bsqx, qtsm from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz where lcslid = $lcslid$ and sjslid = $sjslid$ and nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_zjhcbgshb b where b.lhqkdjbuuid = ?

SELECT T.AJQKBGUUID, T.SSWFAJDBHUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.BSHJ, T.SARY, T.ZBGBT, T.JZQK, T.DYABGBLX_DM, T.SADQ, T.SASE, T.SAFPFS, T.AJFXRQ, T.FLZLMC, T.ZXQK, T.LXR_DM, T.LXDH, T.JARQ, T.JYAQ, T.CCQK, T.ZTBGNR, T.SLRQ, T.HDSLID, T.LCSLID, T.YBGCS, T.SWJG_DM, T.BGRQ_1, T.SCBGSJ, T.AJZBDW_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SJSLID FROM JC_AJQKBG T WHERE T.Jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)

SELECT T.XZZXTZSGSUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.JDSUUID, T.TZSUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.XZZXJGMC, T.XZZXCCMC, T.FLYJ, T.XZZXTZSGS1UUID, T.QDDCHBDCCQDMSRMC, T.WSZZRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.XZZXTZSGSUUID = $xzzxtzsgsuuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = $zfbz1$
select * from np_yqbgyydjapszxbhqkdjb y where y.yqbgyydjapszxbhqkdjbuuid = ?

ZFBZ_1, T. ZFR_DM, T. ZFRQ_1, T. ZSR_DM, T. ZSRQ_3, T. ZSWSBH, T. NCQDJSSD, T. ZSTYBZ, T. SWXZZFTSXW_DM from JC_JCDZXXXTSP T WHERE T.JCDZXXXTSPUUID= $uuid$

select sjjdyjclzbuuid,ywzjuuid,zspm_dm,skssqq,skssqz,lcslid,dzbzdszl_dm,zsxm_dm, jdyjzsskje,jdyjzsznjje,yzpzxh,jsyj,sldwse,jsyj_1 from fz_sjjdyjclzb where ywzjuuid=$uuid$

select jl.ssfxydbguuid,jl.bguuid,jl.rwuuid,jl.sjslid,jl.lcslid,jl.jcrq_1,jl.jcssqq,jl.jcssqz,jl.zjcry,jl.fjcry, jl.ytrxm,jl.ytnr,jl.ytrq,jl.ytqywtsm,jl.ytzdsyry,jl.ytzdzcshry,jl.zcshjl, jl.syjg,jl.syrq,jl.zsyr,jl.fsyr,jl.syfs,jl.syyj,jl.lrr_dm,jl.lrrq, b.fxydxh, b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.djxh,b.shyj_dm, b.shr_dm,b.ydczswjg_dm,b.rwwcsx,b.atshhsyj,b.atshhsr,b.atshhsyjsm,b.atshzsyj, b.atshzsr,b.atshzsyjsm,b.ytfs,b.ytjhsjq,b.ytjhsjz,b.zytrxm,b.fytrxm, b.pgssqq,b.pgssqz,b.ajzt_dm,b.ydbm_dm,b.ydczry_dm,b.ydxfswjg_dm,b.ydxfsj,b.ydxfph,b.shsfxyzs,b.pgajbh,b.fxydfkuuid from NP_SSFXYDBG b, NP_SSFXYDBGJL jl where b.bguuid=jl.bguuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and jl.sjslid =?
