select t.xhjluuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.ssxddyfswzgdjmc, t.qdxhxssqbh, t.ssxddyfsfxrzw, t.ssxddyfsfxrdz, t.ssxddyfsfxrdzyx, t.ssxddyfsfxrq, t.shbh, t.xhwlsxh, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.fsxry_dm, t.fsxrzw, t.fsxrdz, t.fsxrdzyx, t.fsrq_2, t.sjtb_sj, t.xhjl, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid,t.fjuuid from np_xhjl t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.sjslid = $sjslid$

select SSWFLX_DM, SSWFSD_DM WFSD_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZS_ZSPM_DM zszspmdm, SSSQ_Q skssqq, SSSQ_Z skssqz, CFJE_XS cfjesx, CFJE_SS cfjess, CFJE nfkje, MSWFSD msffsdje from YW_WFWZ_CFJG_MX where DB_ID = ?
update np_ssybtmxb j set j.yzpzxh = null, j.xgr_dm = ?, j.xgrq = sysdate where j.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.yydjapbtsktzsuuid in (#macroparam#)
update jc_swjcslbg t set t.yxbz = 'N' where t.jcajxxuuid = ?

select sum(l.sl) as ybtse, max(l.jcajbh) as jcajbh, max(jcajxxuuid) as jcajxxuuid, max(jcayxxuuid) as jcayxxuuid, max(ajmc) as ajmc, max(slbm_dm) as slbm_dm, max(yjfkje) as yjfkje, max(djxh) as djxh, max(nsrsbh) as nsrsbh, max(nsrmc) as nsrmc from (select ajxx.jcajxxuuid as jcajxxuuid, ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid as jcayxxuuid, qkb.lcslid as lcslid, ajxx.jcajbh as jcajbh, ajxx.ajmc as ajmc, jl.swjg_dm as slbm_dm, qkb.ybtse as sl, cfjds.yjfkje as yjfkje, ajxx.djxh as djxh, ajxx.nsrsbh as nsrsbh, ajxx.nsrmc as nsrmc from jc_ajxx ajxx, jc_ayxx_lymx ayxxlymx, JC_AYXX ayxx, jc_swcljdqkb qkb, fz_swxzcfjds cfjds, jc_swjcjl jl where ajxx.ajjczt_dm in (#macroparam#) and ajxx.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and ayxx.jcajxxuuid = ajxx.jcajxxuuid and ajxx.jcajxxuuid = cfjds.SSWFXWDJUUID(+) and ayxx.jcayxxuuid = ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid and ajxx.jcajxxuuid = qkb.jcajxxuuid(+) and jl.jcajxxuuid = ajxx.jcajxxuuid(+) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.djzclx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ayxxlymx.jcayxxly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.hy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jl.swjg_dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qkb.ybtse = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR cfjds.yjfkje = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.larq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.larq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (ajxx.zfbz_1 is null OR ajxx.zfbz_1 = 'N') union select ajxx.jcajxxuuid as jcajxxuuid, ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid as jcayxxuuid, qkb.lcslid as lcslid, ajxx.jcajbh as jcajbh, ajxx.ajmc as ajmc, jds.swjg_dm as slbm_dm, qkb.ybtse as sl, cfjds.yjfkje as yjfkje, ajxx.djxh as djxh, ajxx.nsrsbh as nsrsbh, ajxx.nsrmc as nsrmc from jc_ajxx ajxx, jc_ayxx_lymx ayxxlymx, JC_AYXX ayxx, jc_swcljdqkb qkb, fz_swxzcfjds cfjds, jc_swcljds jds where ajxx.ajjczt_dm in (#macroparam#) and ajxx.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and ayxx.jcajxxuuid = ajxx.jcajxxuuid and ajxx.jcajxxuuid = cfjds.SSWFXWDJUUID(+) and ayxx.jcayxxuuid = ayxxlymx.jcayxxuuid and ajxx.jcajxxuuid = qkb.jcajxxuuid(+) and jds.jcajxxuuid = ajxx.jcajxxuuid(+) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.djzclx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ayxxlymx.jcayxxly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ajxx.hy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jds.swjg_dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qkb.ybtse = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR cfjds.yjfkje = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.larq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.larq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (ajxx.zfbz_1 is null OR ajxx.zfbz_1 = 'N') ) l group by l.jcajxxuuid

select t.tqdxyyzzxxbuuid,t.sswfxwdjuuid,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.nh,t.wh,t.gsxzgljgmc,t.djxh,t.gsdjrq,t.yyzzhm,t.wszzrq, t.tqswjg_dm,t.zstybz,t.zsr_dm,t.zsrq_3,t.gsjgmc,t.sfdx,t.dxrq,t.fkyj,t.fkrq,t.djr_dm,t.djrq,t.tqswjgmc,t.gsxzgljg_dm,t.wszg from fz_tqdxyyzzxxb t where lcslid=$uuid$

SELECT CL.NCBTSKHZBUUID AS SWCLJDQKBUUID, BG.JCAJXXUUID, CL.WFWZLX_DM, CL.WFWZLX_DM AS SSWFLX_DM, SD.SSWFSDMC, LX.SSWFLXMC, XM.ZSXMMC, CL.WFWZXW_DM, CL.ZSXM_DM, CL.ZSPM_DM, CL.SKSSQQ, CL.SKSSQZ, CL.Sl_1 AS SLDWSE, CL.SJSLID, CL.YBTSE, CL.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, CL.JSYJTZS, CL.MBYQNDKS, CL.XXSETZSE, CL.XXSETJSE, CL.JXSETZSE, CL.JXSETJSE, CL.LDSETZE, CL.LCSLID, CL.HDSLID, CL.JSYJSBS, CL.MSWFSDJE, CL.ZGSWJG_DM, CL.NCFBS, CL.NCFJE, CL.XXSESBS, CL.JXSESBS, CL.LDSESBS FROM JC_SWJCBG BG, JC_NCBTSKHZB CL, DM_GY_SSWFSD SD, DM_GY_SSWFLX LX, DM_GY_ZSXM XM WHERE BG.JCAJXXUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND nvl(BG.Zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' AND nvl(CL.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND nvl(BG.YXBZ, 'Y') = 'Y' AND BG.SWJCBGUUID = CL.SWJCBGUUID AND CL.WFWZXW_DM = SD.SSWFSD_DM AND CL.WFWZLX_DM = LX.SSWFLX_DM AND CL.ZSXM_DM = XM.ZSXM_DM

SELECT T.YYDJAPZSSQDJBUUID,T.YYDJSXXXUUID,T.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, T.YDDH,T.JSSQRQ,T.ZLFS,T.SBZLMC, T.SJGSDQ,T.LXR,T.LXDH,T.SY, T.YJ_1,T.SQRQ,T.SQSX,T.DJR_DM, T.YS FROM NP_YYDJAPZSSQDJB T WHERE T.YYDJSXXXUUID = $uuid$
SELECT T.CZLX_1, T.BMC, T.CXTJ, T.TJLZ, T.PDXL, T.DMLB, T.CXRQQTJLMC FROM CS_JC_LCPLCZPZB T WHERE T.LCSWSX_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select t.* from np_skjsb t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.dzbzdszl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ynsehdtzsuuid = ?)

select s.sqswryhbcluuid, s.sqrq, s.sqsx, s.sqhbnr, s.sqhbyy, s.yjlx_dm, s.djr_dm, s.djrq, s.slbz, s.sjly, s.lcslid, s.lrr_dm, s.lrrq, s.xgr_dm, s.xgrq, s.sjgsdq, s.zfbz_1, s.zfr_dm, s.zfrq_1, s.ajxxuuid, s.ajly, s.sqr, s.sfjcjjz from fz_sqswryhbcl s where 1 = 1 and (s.zfbz_1 = 'N' or s.zfbz_1 is null) and s.sqswryhbcluuid = $uuid$

select b.bzclbcdctzsuuid, b.wszg, b.tqdwmc, b.tqdw_dm, b.jcajxxuuid, b.ajmc, b.jcajbh, b.jshslrwy, b.jshslrwe, b.bzclbcdcjzrq, b.slbm_dm, b.slbmmc, b.slrq, b.dzbzdszl_dm, b.lcslid from jc_bzclbcdctzs b where b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.sjslid =$uuid$

select b.pgajbh, t.nspgytqkbuuid, t.nspgajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.bytrxm, t.bytrzw, t.bytrzznx, t.swdlrxm, t.swdlrdwmc, t.ytr, t.ytsj, t.ytdd, t.jlr_dm, t.ytnr, t.nspgjy_dm, t.pgfxry_dm, t.pgjyrq from NP_NSPGYTQKB t, NP_NSPGAJXXB b where t.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid and t.lcslid=? and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' order by t.lrrq desc
select t.* from jc_swcljds t where t.swcljdsuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SHBXFXZCFSCBG T WHERE T.SHBXFXZCFSCBGUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_zrdjtzynssrhsdetzs t where t.zrdjtzynssrhsdetzsuuid = $uuid$

select jds.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid qkbuuid, jds.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid, '30501' zsxm_dm, '305010100' zspm_dm, '305010100' zszspm_dm, d.ssqjq_1 skssqq, d.ssqjz_1 skssqz, jds.cfje ybtse, '32' skzl_dm, '0501' sksx_dm, 15 + sysdate jkqx, jds.lcslid, 'FZJYSBF' bz, 'JYCF' yllx, 'fz' jcfzbz, '106' cflx_dm, 0 msffsdje from fz_shbxfxzcfjdsjy jds, fz_sswfxwdj d where jds.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(jds.yzpzxh, 0) = 0 and nvl(jds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid = $uuid1$ union all select j.swxzcfjdsjyuuid qkbuuid, j.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid, '30501' zsxm_dm, '305010100' zspm_dm, '305010100' zszspm_dm, d.ssqjq_1 skssqq, d.ssqjz_1 skssqz, j.fk_1 ybtse, '32' skzl_dm, '0501' sksx_dm, 15 + sysdate jkqx, j.lcslid, 'FZJY' bz, 'JYCF' yllx, 'fz' jcfzbz, '106' cflx_dm, 0 msffsdje from fz_swxzcfjds_jy j, fz_sswfxwdj d where j.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(j.yzpzxh, 0) = 0 and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.swxzcfjdsjyuuid = $uuid2$
select t.* from jc_swjcjl t where t.jcajxxuuid= $uuid$
select t.szmxuuid,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm,t.xmsssqq ,t.xmsssqz,t.dbskznjqsrq ,t.dbskynse from fz_szmx t where t.ywzjuuid=?
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPYSQ_FSZLQK T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.FJUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
select t.lcslid from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select ajxx.tbnsdcajbh, ajxx.ajmc as tbnsdcajmc, djb.yqtgxgzljzrq from np_tbnsdcajxxb ajxx, np_zrdjdcyqtgxgzlsqdjb djb where ajxx.tbnsdcajxxuuid = djb.tbnsdcajxxuuid and ajxx.djxh = ? and ajxx.sjgsdq=? and ajxx.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.* from jc_swcljds t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select a.tbnsdcajxxuuid, a.ydwtsjndq, a.tbnsdcajbh, a.ydwtsjndq from np_tbnsdcajxxb a where a.djxh = ? and a.lrrq >=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.lrrq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

select t. XZFYTZBGUUID, t. XZFYTZBLUUID, t. SLBMMC, t. SHR, t. TZQK, t. TZCLYJ, t. WSZZRQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. TZSJ, t. TZDD, t. TZZCR from fz_xzfytzbg t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select t.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.sxry_dm, t.sxryssswjg_dm, t.sxrq_1, t.dclx_dm, t.sfzb, t.zbyj, t.cbdw_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.ayxxly, t.tbnsdcaybh,t.zybsxy from np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb t, np_tbnsdcajxxb a where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and t.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid =$uuid$

SELECT TZZCSQWTSUUID, SSWFXWDJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, TZZCR, WSZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, HDSLID, LCSLID, SJGSDQ, SQSWJG_DM_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SJSLID, SQRMC, YXBZ, SWJG_DM FROM FZ_TZZCSQWTS WHERE SJSLID = $sjslid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select nsqkzcbgbuuid,djxh,swytrq,tbrq,ybskhj,yjznjhj,qysdstzynssde,qysdstzynse,zzstzlds,sbjnrq,fddbrhfzrhyzxm,zcsm,tzjl,tbr_dm,lcslid from np_nsqkzcbgb where lcslid=$lcslid$ and sjslid=$sjslid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_gxssybtmxb g where g.tbnsdctztzsuuid = $uuid$
select distinct d.zcbsdzbuuid, d.zxbztzsuuid, d.yzpzxh from np_zcbsdzb d where d.zxbztzsuuid = ?

select t.YBHTSHYJZFQKBUUID, t.YYDJSXXXUUID, t.YYDJAPAYBH, t.DJXH, t.BCYJ, t.ZFR_DM_2, t.ZFRSSSWJG, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.SJTB_SJ, t.ZFRQ_2 from NP_YBHTSHYJZFQKB t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.hdslid = $hdslid$

select distinct fb.yzpzxh, fb.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid qkbuuid from fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb, fz_sswfxwxzcfscbg bg, fz_swxzcfjds jds where bg.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid = fb.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid and jds.sswfxwdjuuid = bg.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.lcslid = bg.lcslid and fb.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid in (#macroparam#) union all select distinct t.yzpzxh, t.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid qkbuuid from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk t, fz_swxzcfjds jds, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf a where jds.sswfxwdjuuid = a.jcajxxuuid and t.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = a.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and jds.lcslid = a.lcslid and t.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.tqswjg_dm swjgDm, t.tqswjgmc swjgmc from NP_TBNSDCZJSP t group by t.tqswjg_dm, t.tqswjgmc
select c.dzbzdszl_dm,c.dzbzdszlmc,c.qzfwname from cs_np_zdydsj c where c.xtgn_dm=? and c.yxbz='Y' order by c.xh asc
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWZXBG T WHERE T.SSWFXWZXBGUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
delete from NP_ZCBSDZB where yzpzxh = ? and zxbztzsuuid = ?

select ynssdetzxmbuuid, tbnsdctztzsuuid, zrdjtzynssrhsdetzsuuid, djxh, tzndq, tzndz, jzje, qysbsde, zckjsbgynssde, swjgndhsqjynssde, qtsjtzhynssde, tbnstzhynssde, zrdjsjtzhynssde, swsjjcgyqm, lrrq as tbrq from NP_YNSSDETZXMB t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPCXZXQKDJYZQBYZQ A WHERE A.YYDJAPAYBH=? AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1,'N')=?

SELECT T.SPHWHZQTCCZBUUID, T.YWZJUUID, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SPHWHZQTCCMC, T.JLDW_DM, T.SL, T.DJ, T.JE, T.BZ, T.CSSL, T.BZXRSYSL, T.CQZSWH, T.ZLJDJG, T.TYPMBMSL, T.SHPMDSCWSL, T.PGJG, T.PGJZ, T.BFSL, T.BFCWPGJG, T.BFDSCWYZ, T.BFDSCWCYJZ, T.FHZDYWQSMC, T.CPGG FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC_ZB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = ?
select*from td_fxmx_nspgb where fxydxh=? order by ydlx_bj desc
select t.dzbzdszl_dm code, t.lrr_dm, nvl(nvl(t.wsbh, t.wszg),'无') wh, t.lrrq mlrq, t.lcslid, t.uuid FROM gy_ws_wszb T where t.lcslid in (#macroparam#) and t.zfr_dm is null
select t.sphwhzqtccuuid,t.zxr,t.zxrq_1,t.bzxrmc,t.cfbcgyy from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and sfcf=$value1$

select t.FXMXXH, t.DJXH, t.NSRSBH, t.NSRMC, t.NSRSSSWJG_DM, t.NSRSSSWJGMC, t.TSFXXH, t.SMSLXH, t.ZB_DM_1, t.ZBMC_2, t.TSXX, t.SJXX, t.TSZQ, t.YXBZ, t.MXLYLX, t.SCSJ, t.SCRY_DM, t.SCRYXM, t.SCBM_DM, t.SCBMMC, t.SCSWJG_DM_1, t.SCSWJGMC, t.CLZT, t.CLSJ, t.SJJHCGBZ, t.SJJHSJ from TD_FXMX_TBNSTZXAB t where t.nsrssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (t.clzt = '0' or t.clzt is null)

select t.swxzpcuuid, t.pcajbh, t.ajmc, t.pcqqrlx_dm, t.djxh, t.dwdz, t.lxdh, t.yzbm, t.fddbr, t.zw, t.xm, t.xb_dm, t.gzdw, t.nl, t.mz_dm, t.zz, t.qqrsfzjhm, t.wtdlrxm, t.wtdlrxb_dm, t.dlrzw, t.wtdlrgzdwmc, t.wtdlrzz, t.wtdlrsfzjhm, t.jtxzxwmc, t.jtxzxwzcrq, t.xzjjsqfs_dm, t.pcywjgmc, t.ssyly, t.pcqqdjtnr, t.sqpcdlygj, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, t.djry_dm, t.pcsqdjsj, t.pcajzt, t.scyj, t.sfpc, t.pcje, t.sfzc, t.zcje, t.slry_dm, t.slrq_1, t.pcjdswszg, t.pcywjgfddbrxm, t.pcywjgpcyj, t.flyj, t.jdnr, t.fyjg_dm, t.pcjdswszzrq, t.lcslid, t.ajxxuuid, t.ajly, t.swjg_dm, t.wtdlrnl from fz_swxzpc t where t.lcslid = $uuid$

SELECT t.XHXSCXYYSQBUUID, t.SQRLXDH, t.CZ, t.DZXX, t.SQRZZGDZGSWJG_DM, t.SSYLY, t.SQRQ, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFBZ_1, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.XHXSCXSQXXBUUID, t.SJTB_SJ, t.SQYJ, t.SQYJ_1, t.SBRQ_2, t.JSSJ_1, t.SLYYSQSLR FROM FZ_XHXSCXYYSQB t WHERE t.XHXSCXSQXXBUUID = $uuid$ AND t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select s.* from Fz_Sswfxwxzcfscbg s where s.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and s.cbskhfkbguuid is null and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select b.bguuid,b.zfbz_1,b.rwuuid,b.fxydxh,b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.djxh,b.shyj_dm,b.atshyjsm, b.shr_dm,b.ydczswjg_dm,b.rwwcsx,b.atshhsyj,b.atshhsr,b.atshhsyjsm,b.atshzsyj, b.atshzsr,b.atshzsyjsm,b.ytfs,b.ytjhsjq,b.ytjhsjz, b.zytrxm,b.fytrxm,b.jcrq_1,b.jcssqq,b.jcssqz, b.zjcry,b.fjcry,b.pgssqq,b.pgssqz,b.ajzt_dm,b.ydbm_dm,b.ydczry_dm,b.ydxfswjg_dm,b.ydxfsj, b.ydxfph, b.shsfxyzs,b.pgajbh,b.lrr_dm,b.lrrq,b.pgssqq,b.pgssqz,b.fxydfkuuid from NP_SSFXYDBG b where nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.rwuuid=?

SELECT FPQDUUID, SSWFAJXCHUUID, AJBH_1, XH, PJLB_DM, FPWTLX_DM, LC_DM, FP_DM, FPHM, KPRQ, PM, DJ, SL, JE, SL_1, SE, KPR_DM, KPRXM, ZGSWJG_DM, XHFDZ, XHFDJXH, XHFYHZH, XHFLXDH, GHFDZ, GHFYHZH, GHFLXDH, XHFKHYH_DM, GHFDJXH, GHFKHYH_DM, XHFNSRMC, XHFNSRSBH, GHFNSRMC, GHFNSRSBH, XCYY, ZZR_DM, ZZRQ_2, DZBZDSZL_DM, SHRDJXH, FHRDJXH, CYFDJXH, SHRNSRMC, SHRNSRSBH, FHRNSRMC, FHRNSRSBH, CYRNSRMC, CYFNSRSBH, DKPDW_DM, DKKJSE, DKSL_1, DKWSPZHM, YFJE, GHDW, BHSJ, CLDW, CLXCRS, CLLX_DM, CLCPXH, CD, HGZH, JKZMSH, SJDH, FDJHM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_FJ_FPQD WHERE SSWFAJXCHUUID = ? AND DZBZDSZL_DM = ?
SELECT T.SQSWRYHBCLUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.SQSX, S.NSRSBH, S.NSRMC,S.DJXH FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ S, FZ_SQSWRYHBCL T WHERE S.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND T.SQSWRYHBCLUUID = $UUID$

SELECT a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.skssqq,a.skssqz,SUM(a.jsyjjctzse) AS jsyjjctzse,SUM(a.jsyjjctjse) AS jsyjjctjse,SUM(a.jsyjjctzje) AS jsyjjctzje,SUM(a.yjhkcejctzse) AS yjhkcejctzse,SUM(a.yjhkcejctjse) AS yjhkcejctjse,SUM(a.yjhkcejctzje) AS yjhkcejctzje,SUM(a.ybtse) AS ybtse,SUM(a.ncfje) AS ncfje FROM jc_sswfwtgjjsb_zb a WHERE a.sswfwtgjjsbuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.skssqq,a.skssqz ORDER BY a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.skssqq,a.skssqz

select * from jc_sswfwtgjjsb_zb a, jc_sswfwtgjjsb b where a.sswfwtgjjsbuuid = b.sswfwtgjjsbuuid and b.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and a.zsxm_dm = $value1$ and a.zspm_dm = $value2$ and a.skssqq = to_date($value3$, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.skssqz = to_date($value4$, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select bw.fwzh_1,jd.bwzh,fkb.nsrsbh,fkb.nsrmc,fkb.sz_dm,fkb.bsse,fkb.znj,fkb.fk_1,fkb.hcjgsm,jd.yqhfrq,fkb.sjsbrq,fkb.fj,fkb.bz from np_ssqbhcjgfkb fkb,np_bwqkdjb bw, np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb jd where fkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = jd.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid and fkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid and fkb.jsssqbclqkbuuid = ?

select T.* from ZH_SHGLXXB t where level = ? start with SHGLXXBUUID in (SELECT t.SHGLXXBUUID FROM ZH_SHGLXXB T WHERE T.HJZT_DM in (#macroparam#)) connect by prior yhjuuid = SHGLXXBUUID AND T.NFPCBDW_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.HJBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FHSWJG_DM = ?) union all SELECT T.* FROM ZH_SHGLXXB T WHERE T.HJZT_DM in (#macroparam#) AND T.NFPCBDW_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.HJBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.FHSWJG_DM = ?)
select g.* from NP_SSFXYDBG g where (1 = #macroparam# or g.bguuid = ? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.fxydxh =?) and nvl(g.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

SELECT SWWFSSBCLTZSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_SWWFSSBCLTZS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(SHBXFBZ, 'Y') = 'Y' AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT BYSWXZCFJDSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_BYSWXZCFJDS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(SHBXFBZ, 'Y') = 'Y' AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT SHBXFXZCFJDSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_SHBXFXZCFJDS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select count(t.sswfxwdjuuid) sl from fz_sswfxwdj t where t.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Ssqjq_1 >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Ssqjz_1 < (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Sswflx_Dm in (#macroparam#)) AND nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.AJFZZCCYJLBUUID, T.AJCYHZCFZUUID, T.SWJCAJUUID, T.SQLX, T.CYHZCFZR, T.CYHZCFZRQ, T.AJGLR_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.WSBH FROM JC_AJFZZCCYJLB T WHERE T.AJCYHZCFZUUID = $uuid$

select t.xsnrjluuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.fjuuid, t.djxh, t.lrrq, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.swztry_dm, t.qyztry, t.swcxrydm, t.qycxryxm, t.xsdd, t.xssj, t.jlr, t.dcryqrba, t.qysftydcfa, t.xscs, t.tbnsdcsyjdlx_dm, t.ys, t.ym, t.xsjl, t.sjtb_sj, a.tbnsdcajxxuuid, a.ajmc, a.tbnsdcajbh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc from NP_XSNRJL t, np_tbnsdcajxxb a where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and t.xsnrjluuid = $uuid$
select * from np_swsxqfb s where s.lhqkdjbuuid=?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC_ZB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = $value2$
select b.* from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz b where b.nspgajxxuuid = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N')='N'

select t.tbnsdclashbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.shyj, t.shyjsm, t.shr, t.shrq, t.sfwzs, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsdclashb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $uuid$ order by shrq

select t.DYKBFPSJZBUUID, t.DYKBFPSJUUID, t.DYFPZL_DM, t.DYFPMC, t.DYFP_DM, t.DYFPQSHM, t.DYFPZZHM, t.DYFPFS, t.BDYFPQKBZ, t.THBZ, t.FPDYQKBZ from jc_dykbfpsj_zb t where (t.thbz is null or t.thbz = 'N') and t.dykbfpsjuuid in (select y.dykbfpsjuuid from jc_dykbfpsj y where y.zfbz_1 = 'N' and y.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$)

select w.xzfygywsuuid,w.wszg,w.xzfysqdjbuuid,x.sffh_1,x.xzfygyxxbuuid,d.ajbh_1,d.ajmc from FZ_Xzfygyws w, fz_xzfygyxxb x, fz_xzfysqdjb d where d.xzfysqdjbuuid = w.xzfysqdjbuuid and w.xzfygyxxbuuid = x.xzfygyxxbuuid and x.sffh_1 = 'N' and d.xzfysqdjbuuid = ?

SELECT T.SSBQXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.YUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.DJCKJRJGMC, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.DJCKSJ, T.DJCKZH, T.DJCKJE, T.WSZZRQ, T.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, T.DJCKZHYE, T.QSRXM_1, T.YHQSRQ, T.QSDWQZRQ, T.DJCKXXJE, T.XQJNSKQX, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.CFKYRQ, T.BQBDWMC, T.JCSSBQCSLY, T.JCDJCKRQ, T.BLJCCFKYSXSX, T.JCBZ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SFTJ, F.WFXWBH AJBH, F.WFXWMC AJMC, F.DJXH, F.NSRSBH, F.NSRMC, '法制' AJLX FROM FZ_SSBQXXB T, FZ_SSWFXWDJ F WHERE F.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND NVL(F.JCAJBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(F.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = 'BDA1220101' AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(T.JCBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(T.SFTJ, 'N') = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_SSBQYQXXB Y WHERE NVL(Y.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND Y.YXBZ = 'Y' and T.SSBQXXBUUID = Y.SSBQXXBUUID) AND T.CFKYRQ + ? <= SYSDATE UNION SELECT B.SSBQXXBUUID, B.AJXXUUID, B.YUUID, B.SWJG_DM, B.SWJGJG, B.ZG, B.NH, B.WH, B.DJCKJRJGMC, B.SPSWJG_DM, B.DJCKSJ, B.DJCKZH, B.DJCKJE, B.WSZZRQ, B.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, B.DJCKZHYE, B.QSRXM_1, B.YHQSRQ, B.QSDWQZRQ, B.DJCKXXJE, B.XQJNSKQX, B.FYJG_DM, B.FYJGMC, B.CFKYRQ, B.BQBDWMC, B.JCSSBQCSLY, B.JCDJCKRQ, B.BLJCCFKYSXSX, B.JCBZ, B.DZBZDSZL_DM, B.LCSLID, B.HDSLID, B.SJSLID, B.ZFRQ_1, B.ZFR_DM, B.ZFBZ_1, B.LRRQ, B.LRR_DM, B.XGRQ, B.XGR_DM, B.SJGSDQ, B.SFTJ, J.JCAJBH AJBH, J.AJMC, J.DJXH, J.NSRSBH, J.NSRMC, '稽查' AJLX FROM FZ_SSBQXXB B, JC_AJXX J WHERE J.JCAJXXUUID = B.AJXXUUID AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND B.DZBZDSZL_DM = 'BDA1220101' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.JCBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.SFTJ, 'N') = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FZ_SSBQYQXXB Y WHERE NVL(Y.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND Y.YXBZ = 'Y' and B.SSBQXXBUUID = Y.SSBQXXBUUID) AND B.CFKYRQ + ? <= SYSDATE
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPCXZXQKDJYZQBYZQ A WHERE A.YYDJAPAJBH=? AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1,'N')=?

select y.yydjsxxxuuid, y.djxh, y.yydjapajbh, y.yydjapajmc, y.yydjapaybh, y.yydjajzt_dm, y.yydjaplx_dm, sq.yydjapzssqdjbuuid from np_yydjsxxx y, np_yydjapzssqdjb sq where y.yydjsxxxuuid = sq.yydjsxxxuuid and y.yydjajzt_dm != '500' and y.yydjapajbh =? and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. GFJCCLJDSUUID, t. GFJCAJXXUUID, t. SWJGJG, t. ZG, t. NH, t. WH, t. ZCYJ, t. CLJD, t. WSZZRQ, t. LCSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t.yzpzxh from JC_GFJCCLJDS t where t.GFJCCLJDSUUID = $uuid$

select t.bznr, t.nsrmc, t.blsx, t.tzsuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.dydjh, t.tzszl_dm, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.tznr_1, t.byslly, t.fyjg_dm, t.qsrq, t.dyrq, t.dyry_dm, t.dycgbz, t.djbs, t.sxxxuuid, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.mbbh, t.businesscontent, t.dybz, t.fyjgmc, t.ajbh_1, t.fjuuid, t.lcswsx_dm, t.fhzt, t.fssbyy, t.dzwjsy, t.slswsx_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.sxxxuuid from zh_tzsxx t where t.tzsuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. xzfysqdjbuuid, t. ajxxuuid, t. ajly, t. ajbh_1, t. ajmc, t. djxh, t. nsrsbh, t. nsrmc, t. xzjjsqfs_dm, t. sqrlb_dm, t. sqrxm, t. sqrsfzjhm, t. sqrxb_dm, t. sqrnl, t. sqrmzmc, t. sqrjg, t. sqrzs, t. sqryzbm, t. sqrlxdh, t. sqrgzdwmc, t. sqrzw, t. sqrfrhqtzzmc, t. sqrfrhqtzzlxdh, t. sqrfrhqtzzdz, t. sqrfrhqtzzyzbm, t. sqrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrxm, t. sqrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrzw, t. sqrdlrmc, t. sqdlrxb_dm, t. sqdlrnl, t. sqrdlrzz, t. sqrdlrgzdwmc, t. sqrdlrzw, t. dsrlx_dm, t. dsrxm_1, t. dsrsfzjhm, t. dsrxb_dm, t. dsrnl, t. dsrmzmc, t. dsrjg, t. dsrzs, t. dsryzbm, t. dsrlxdh, t. dsrgzdwmc, t. dsrzw_1, t. dsrfrhqtzzmc, t. dsrfrhqtzzlxdh, t. dsrfrhqtzzdz, t. dsrfrhqtzzyzbm, t. dsrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrxm, t. dsrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrzw, t. dsrdlrmc, t. dsrdlrxb_dm, t. dsrdlrnl, t. dsrdlrzz, t. dsrdlrgzdwmc, t. dsrdlrzw, t. bsqrmc_1, t. bsqrfzrxm, t. bsqrdz, t. bsqryzbm, t. bsqrlxdh, t. fysqdyjtxzxwmc, t. jtxzxwzl, t. fysqdyjtxzxwwszg, t. fysqdyjtxzxwzcrq, t. fysqdyjtxzxwzcyj, t. fyqq, t. zysshly, t. xzfyjg_dm, t. xzfyjgmc, t. xzfyjgdz, t. sqrq, t. sdfysqrq, t. sfyqtjgyfzs, t. ajlylx_dm, t. yajbh, t. yajmc, t. zsjgmc_1, t. zsrq_1, t. djr, t. djrq, t. sqr, t. lcslid, t. hdslid, t. sjslid, t. zfr_dm, t. zfrq_1, t. zfbz_1, t. lrrq, t. lrr_dm, t. xgrq, t. xgr_dm, t. sjgsdq, t. sfjgfyjd, t. sshj_dm, t. fyajzt, t. bhfysqzt, t. tszt, t. zlslzt from fz_xzfysqdjb t where t.bhfysqzt='0' and t.fyajzt='3'and t.xzfyjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

select t.xzfygywsuuid, t.xzfysqdjbuuid, t.xzfygyxxbuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.nsrsbh, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.xzfyjg_dm, t.xzfyjgmc, t.slswjg_dm, t.tzzcrxm, t.tzsj, t.tzdd, t.bxwdcrxm, t.djxynr, t.sqr, t.slfyrq, t.swjg_dm, t.wszzrq, t.tzsuuid, t.zsr_dm, t.zsrq_3, t.zstybz, t.dzbzdszl_dm from fz_xzfygyws t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.xzfysqdjbuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$
select t.* from fz_bkcktzs t where t.bkckgluuid = $value1$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_TQYXSLTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJAPAYBH = ?

select t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.djxh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.dbsehj, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbxs, t.swjg_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.swdbgzjsqlcslid, t.lrr_dm from fz_nsdbs t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.nsdbsuuid = $uuid$
select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid ,t.ywzjuuid,t.dzbzdszl_dm,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je,t.zljdjg,t.typmbmsl from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_Zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$

with a as (select swjg_dm from fz_swxzcfjds where swxzcfjdsuuid=$uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a,fz_swxzcfjds b where b.swjg_dm=a.swjg_dm and b.wh=$value1$ and b.nh=$value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select d.ajbh_1 as ajbh, d.ajmc, d.xzfysqdjbuuid as ajuuid, d.fyqq, d.fysqdyjtxzxwmc as yjtxzxw, d.fysqdyjtxzxwwszg as yjtxzxwwszg, d.fysqdyjtxzxwzcrq as yjtxzxwzcrq, d.fysqdyjtxzxwzcyj, d.zysshly, d.xzfyjg_dm as zcyjtxzxwswjgDm, g.xzfygywsuuid as jdbuuid, g.wszg as cxzcjtxzxwyjwszg, g.jdnr, g.djxh, '行政复议决定书' as cxzcjtxzxwyj from fz_xzfysqdjb d, fz_Xzfygyws g where d.xzfysqdjbuuid = g.xzfysqdjbuuid and g.xzfyyjlx_dm in ('3', '4', '5', '6') and (d.zfbz_1 is null or d.zfbz_1 = 'N') and (g.zfbz_1 is null or g.zfbz_1 = 'N') and d.djxh = ?
select t.swcljdqkbuuid from jc_swcljdqkb t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.jcajxxuuid=? and t.sshj_dm=?

SELECT XCYQPFUUID, STXCYQUUID, WSSYYJ_DM, PFYJSM, YQJZRQ, QTSX, PFR_DM_1, PFRQ, PFSWJG_DM_1, LCSLID, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, WSZG, XCYQSQWSZG FROM ZH_XCYQPF_WTXC WHERE XCYQPFUUID = $xcyqpfuuid$
select t.* from jc_sswfxwjjcbjgfkd t where t.sswfxwjjcbjgfkduuid = $uuid$

select t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.bh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm, t.nsdbrdz, t.nsdbrlxdh, t.nsdbccmc, t.nsdbrkhyh_dm, t.nsdbxs, t.dbsehj, t.nsdbrkhyhzh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.hdslid, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.sjgsdq, t.dbccbdcjzgj, t.dbccdcjzgj, t.dbccdqtccjz, t.dbcczjzgj, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.dbccmc, t.dbccsl, t.dbcczmmc, t.dbdcczmfs, t.nsdbrfzr, t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc, t.nsdbrsfzjhm, t.nsdbrqsrq, t.nsrfzrqz, t.nsrfzrqzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.jfrsbh, t.yjshbxfje, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.shbxfbz, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.wszzrq, t.jcnsdbtzsuuid, t.tzsuuid, t.zfr_dm, t.ajly from fz_nsdbs t left join fz_nsdbjccl a on t.nsdbsuuid = a.nsdbsuuid where t.djxh = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.nsdbsuuid is null

select thmx.DQZBZLTHMXQDUUID, thmx.DQZBZLTHQDUUID, thmx.DQZBZLQDMXUUID, thmx.ZLSSSQQ, thmx.ZLSSSQZ, thmx.DW_1, thmx.SL, thmx.YS, thmx.ZBZLMC, thmx.DQTHZBZLLX_DM, thmx.bz from jc_dqzbzlqd dqqd, jc_dqzbzlqd_mx dqmx, jc_dqzbzlthmxqd thmx where dqqd.dqzbzlqduuid = dqmx.dqzbzlqduuid and dqmx.dqzbzlqdmxuuid = thmx.dqzbzlqdmxuuid and thmx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and dqqd.dqzbzlqduuid = $uuid$

select t.* from fz_zdswajsmslyjb t, fz_zdswajsmsltzs z where t.jcajxxuuid = z.jcajxxuuid and t.sjslid = z.sjslid and t.flcslid = z.lcslid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(z.sfyfqzahq, 'Y') = 'Y' and t.clwbbz = 'Y' and t.jcajxxuuid = ? and t.flcslid = ? and t.sjslid = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SHBXFFZMXXXB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID in (#macroparam#)

select zjbhuuid, sjslid, uuid, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, zjswjg_dm, jsswjg_dm, zbsx, hfjzrq, wszzrq, sfxyhf, dz, lxry, lxdh, dzbzdszl_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm from jc_zjbh where lcslid = $lcslid$ and zfbz_1 <> 'Y'

SELECT DM.DZBZDSZLMC, DM.DZBZDSZL_DM, LJ.XMLZHBEANLLJ, LJ.YWBDSJLJ, ZB.XMLLSH, ZB.YWWSUUID, ZB.UUID, LJ.BDLJMC, LJ.CSDMZ_1, ZB.LCSLID, ZB.wszg wh, ZB.LRR_DM zrrxm FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ LJ, GY_WS_WSZB ZB, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL DM WHERE LJ.DZBZDSZL_DM = ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM = DM.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.UUID = $uuid$ AND ZB.ZFR_DM IS NULL

select lh.lhqkdjbuuid, lh.qbbh, lh.lhf, lh.swrq, bw.fwzh_1, bw.fwmc_1, bw.yqhfrq, bw.bwqkdjbuuid, qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid, qkb.jsssqbclqkbuuid, lh.lhzl from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb, np_lhqkdjb lh, np_bwqkdjb bw where qkb.lhqkdjbuuid = lh.lhqkdjbuuid and qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid and qkb.czzt in (#macroparam#) and lh.hjclyj = '01' and (1 = #macroparam# or lh.qbbh = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwzh_1 = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwmc_1 = #macroparam#) and (qkb.jsswjg_dm = ? or qkb.clswjg_dm = ?)

select nspgajxxuuid, pgajbh, djxh, ydwtfx, pgxmmc, pgssqq, pgssqz, xmsssj, pgfxrq, pgfxry_dm, fxydxh, sdhcbz, nspgjy_dm, nspgcljy_dm, lcslid, hdslid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjly_dm, ajzt_dm, ytpgjy_dm from np_nspgajxxb where lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.sdwsuuid, a.wssdsj from zh_sdxx a where a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from ps_splb
select t.swjcbguuid from jc_swjcbg t where t.jcajxxuuid in (select j.jcajxxuuid from jc_swjcbg j where j.swjcbguuid = ?) and t.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' order by t.lrrq desc

select t.cshtbwluuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.zgswjg_dm, t.csnr, t.cbyzyjhzhychtjsrq, t.cshtrq, t.cshtdd, t.qyztryxm, t.qyztryzw, t.ssxddyfqtryxm, t.dygfztr, t.dygfztrzw, t.dygfzqtryxm, t.zgswjgztryxm, t.zgswjgztryzw, t.zgswjgqtryxm, t.ssxddyfztrqm, t.qdxhxssqbh, t.qtryxm, t.jlrxm, t.csyj_dm, t.sjslid, t.lcslid,t.fjuuid from np_cshtbwl t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.sjslid = $sjslid$

SELECT D.DJXH, M.XZ ZSXM_DM, M.ZSPM_DM, M.SSSQQ SKSSQQ, M.SSSQZ SKSSQZ, M.FXZCFJE FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ D, FZ_ZLXQJNSFK Z, FZ_SHBXFFZMXXXB M WHERE D.SSWFXWDJUUID = Z.SSWFXWDJUUID AND Z.ZLXQJNSFKUUID = M.YWZJUUID AND NVL(D.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(Z.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND D.DJXH = $value1$ AND M.SSSQQ > = TO_DATE($value2$, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.SSSQZ < (TO_DATE($value3$, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPSQXQ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

select t.swjcbguuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.bcdxdjbqk, t.jcqkjfxwt, t.clyjjjy, t.bgrq_1, t.swjg_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.sjslid, t.jcryqm_1, t.wsbh, t.jcbmfzrqm, t.qtqksm, t.wszzrq, t.yxbz from JC_SWJCBG t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
SELECT T.SWJG_DM, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.FYJG_DM CODE, T.FYJGMC CAPTION FROM CS_FZ_FYJGPZ T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM = ?
SELECT * FROM jc_sswfwtgjjsb a WHERE a.sjslid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM FROM JC_AJXX T WHERE T.DJXH in(#macroparam#) AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.AJJCZT_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#)
select t.* from jc_swjcjl t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
SELECT T.* FROM CS_FZ_FLFGWH T WHERE T.SYJUUID = ? ORDER BY T.LBCJ_DM, TO_NUMBER(FDMC_1) ASC

select t.*, nsr.zgswskfj_dm from fz_sswfxwdj t, dj_nsrxx nsr where (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfxwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.rgdjbz, 'N') = ? and t.djxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and ((t.sswfxwclzt_dm not in ('38', '01') and t.lcslid is null) or t.sswfxwclzt_dm in ('01')) and t.jcajbz = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjq_1 >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ssqjz_1 <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajly in (#macroparam#))
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAJXXB T WHERE T.YYDJAJZT_DM = ? AND T.YYDJAPAJBH = ? AND nvl(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
select t.* from fz_pmbmgyxxb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = $djxh$ and (1 = $tj1$ or t.pmbmgyxxbuuid = $uuid$) and (1 = $tj2$ OR t.sjslid = $ywzjuuid$)
select t.* from jc_zdswajslajjjd t where t.zdswajslajjjduuid = $uuid$

select t.tbnsdcajglcbyjbuuid, t.cbyj, t.sfzb, t.zbyj, t.cbdw_dm from np_tbnsdcajglcbyjb t, NP_TBNSTCAJGLYDQYFXDCQKDJB a where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and a.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid = $uuid$

select t.GFJCJCXXUUID, t.GFJCAJXXUUID as ajxxuuid, t.YJFEHJ YNSE , t.YJFEHJ_1 YJSE, t.QJFEHJ YBTSE, t.LCSLID, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.DJXH, 15 + sysdate jkqx from JC_GFJCJCXX t where GFJCAJXXUUID in ( select t.GFJCAJXXUUID from JC_GFJCCLJDS t where t.GFJCCLJDSUUID = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.yzpzxh,0) = 0)

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from zh_sdxx a where a.sdwsuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
delete from Fz_Szmx t where t.ywzjuuid=?
SELECT T.SWJCAJSLQKBABUUID, T.AJQKBGUUID, T.AJMC, T.JCAJBH, T.NCBSKZNJFKJE, T.BGRQ_1, T.YJZNJ, T.YJFKJE FROM JC_SWJCAJSLQKBAB T WHERE T.AJQKBGUUID = $uuid$

select t.uuid, t.fxydxh, t.pgajbh, t.sjslid, t.bguuid, t.rwuuid, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.djxh, t.yqyy, t.bmyj, t.bmldqz, t.swryqzrq, t.jzyj, t.jzqz, t.qzrq, t.rwwcsx, t.sqyqjzrq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.lcslid, t.sqyqyy from NP_YQSPB t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.uuid = ?) and t.bguuid = ? and t.lcslid = ?
select * from JC_LASQB where swjclasqbuuid = $uuid$
select * from np_qykbxysfxrdb_zb n where n.qykbxysfxrdbuuid = $uuid$

SELECT AY.JCAYXXUUID, AY.JCAYBH, AY.DJXH, AY.ZCAJBH, AY.ZCAJMC, AY.AYSZJG_DM, AY.AYSZBM_DM, AY.LCSLID, AY.ZFBZ_1, AY.ZFRQ_1, AY.ZFR_DM, AY.AJLX_DM, AY.AYNCLYJSM, AY.WSBH, AY.XGCL, AY.ZYNR, AY.JLR_DM, AY.JLRQ, AY.NCLCBDW, AY.NCLCBRQ, AY.NCLYHFRQ, AY.QDTJ, AY.SSWFLX_DM, AY.AJCLYJ_DM, AY.QDSX, AY.JCAJXXUUID, AY.BABZ, AY.NSRSBH, AY.NSRMC, AY.HY_DM, AY.DJZCLX_DM, AY.ZGSWJG_DM, AY.SWJCAYZT_DM, SQB.JCAYXXUUID, SQB.SWJCLASQBUUID, SQB.LASQR_DM, SQB.XARQ, SQB.WFWZLX_DM, SQB.WSZT_DM, SQB.SWJG_DM, SQB.ZFBZ_1, SQB.ZFRQ_1, SQB.ZFR_DM, SQB.XAFXJLAYJ, SQB.SFDYA, SQB.JCLX_DM, SQB.JCJG_DM, SQB.JCBM_DM, SQB.WFWZXW_DM, SQB.SXSSWFXW, SQB.JBR_DM, SQB.JBRQ, SQB.AJMC, SQB.JCSSQJQ, SQB.JCSSQJZ, SQB.ZSR_DM, SQB.ZSRQ_3, SQB.ZSTYBZ, SQB.WSBH, SQB.RWXPFS_DM, SQB.XAFS_DM FROM JC_LASQB SQB, JC_AYXX AY WHERE AY.JCAYXXUUID = SQB.JCAYXXUUID AND SQB.SWJCLASQBUUID = ?

select t. FCJHUUID, t. FCSJQ, t. FCSJZ, t. FCGZJHNR, t. WSZZRQ, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. WSZT_DM, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. WSBH, t. ZSTYBZ, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. FCZZQM, t. FCZYQM from JC_FCJH t where t.SWJG_DM = $uuid$ and t.LRR_DM=$value1$ and t.WSZT_DM=$value2$ and (t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR t.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)

select qkb.swcljdqkbuuid as uuid, 'BDA1120141' as dzbzdszlDm, qkb.sshj_dm from jc_swcljdqkb qkb where qkb.jcajxxuuid = ? and qkb.lcslid = ? and (qkb.zfbz_1 is null or qkb.zfbz_1 = 'N') union all select cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid as uuid, 'BDA1120142' as dzbzdszlDm, jccf.sshj_dm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jccf, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk cfb where jccf.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and jccf.jcajxxuuid = ? and jccf.lcslid = ? and (jccf.zfbz_1 is null or jccf.zfbz_1 = 'N' )
select distinct d.djjg_dm from fz_sswfxwdj d where d.rgdjbz = ? and d.sswflx_dm = ? and d.sswfsd_dm = ? and d.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.nspgajxxuuid, t.pgajbh, t.djxh, t.ydwtfx, t.pgxmmc, t.pgssqq, t.pgssqz, t.xmsssj, t.pgfxrq, t.pgfxry_dm, t.sjly_dm, t.fxydxh, t.sdhcbz, t.nspgjy_dm, t.nspgcljy_dm, t.ajzt_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.ytpgjy_dm, b.nspgbguuid, b.pgjbqk, b.rdjl, b.pgssrq, b.cljyfxpgrq, b.cljyfxpgry_dm, b.zgjy, b.zgjyfxpgrq, b.zgjyfxpgry_dm from np_nspgajxxb t, np_nspgbg b where t.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.pgajbh = ?

with sygshglxxb as( select * from ZH_SHGLXXB where level = 2 start with SHGLXXBUUID = $shglxxbuuid$ connect by prior yhjuuid = SHGLXXBUUID), xygshglxxb as( select * from ZH_SHGLXXB where level = 2 start with SHGLXXBUUID = $shglxxbuuid$ connect by prior SHGLXXBUUID =yhjuuid order by lrrq desc ), ksshglxxb as(select * from ZH_SHGLXXB where connect_by_isleaf = 1 start with SHGLXXBUUID = $shglxxbuuid$ connect by prior yhjuuid = SHGLXXBUUID) SELECT b.SHGLXXBUUID, b.FHYWZJUUID, b.YHJUUID, b.JCAJXXUUID, b.HJBH, b.JSR_DM, b.JSRQ, b.DJXH, b.NSRSBH, b.NSRMC, b.AJBH_1, b.AJMC, b.HHJZRQ, b.SQYQJZRQ, b.FHSWJG_DM, b.FHRY_DM, b.DZBZDSZL_DM, b.NFPCBDW_DM, b.NFPCBRY_DM, b.SFXYFH, b.NFPFHRY_DM, b.SHR_DM, b.SHRQ, b.SHSWJG_DM, b.SHYJSM, b.WSSYYJ_DM, b.LCSLID, b.LRR_DM, b.LRRQ, b.XGR_DM, b.XGRQ, b.SJGSDQ, b.HJZT_DM, b.SJTB_SJ, b.JSSWJG_DM, b.ZZCBJGBZ, ks.shglxxbuuid ksshglxxbuuid, ks.fhywzjuuid ksfhywzjuuid, ks.fhswjg_dm ksfhswjg_dm, ks.fhry_dm ksfhry_dm, ks.dzbzdszl_dm ksdzbzdszl_dm, ks.nfpcbdw_dm kfnfpcbdw_dm, ks.lcslid kslcslid, syg.shglxxbuuid sygshglxxbuuid, syg.fhywzjuuid sygfhywzjuuid, syg.fhswjg_dm sygfhswjg_dm, syg.fhry_dm sygfhry_dm, syg.dzbzdszl_dm sygdzbzdszl_dm, syg.nfpcbdw_dm sygnfpcbdw_dm, syg.lcslid syglcslid, syg.hjzt_dm syghjzt_dm, xyg.shglxxbuuid xygshglxxbuuid, xyg.fhywzjuuid xygfhywzjuuid, xyg.fhswjg_dm xygfhswjg_dm, xyg.fhry_dm xygfhry_dm, xyg.dzbzdszl_dm xygdzbzdszl_dm, xyg.nfpcbdw_dm xygnfpcbdw_dm, xyg.lcslid xyglcslid, xyg.hjzt_dm xyghjzt_dm FROM ZH_SHGLXXB b, ksshglxxb ks , sygshglxxb syg,xygshglxxb xyg WHERE b.hjbh = ks.hjbh(+) and b.hjbh = syg.hjbh(+) and b.hjbh = xyg.hjbh(+) and b.SHGLXXBUUID = $shglxxbuuid$

SELECT A.WFXWBH, A.WFXWMC, A.DJXH, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC, A.SSWFLX_DM WFXWLX, A.WFSS, A.SSQJQ_1 SSSQQ, A.SSQJZ_1 SSSQZ, A.SSWFXWCLZT_DM WFXWCLZT, D.WSZG, D.JKQX, D.CFJE, D.SDSJ, D.FHM, D.CLJGMC FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ A LEFT JOIN (SELECT C.SSWFXWDJUUID, C.SWJGJG, C.ZG, C.NH, C.WH, C.SWJGJG || C.ZG || '〔' || C.NH || '〕' || C.WH || '号' WSZG, C.JKQX, C.YJFKJE CFJE, S.WSSDSJ SDSJ, S.DZBZDSZL_DM FHM, Z.DZBZDSZLMC CLJGMC FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS C, ZH_SDXX S, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL Z WHERE C.SWXZCFJDSUUID = S.SDWSUUID AND S.DZBZDSZL_DM = Z.DZBZDSZL_DM AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(S.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') D ON A.SSWFXWDJUUID = D.SSWFXWDJUUID WHERE NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND A.DJXH = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.SJGSDQ = ?)

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid(+) and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwslcslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
select z.* from fz_zlxqgzxxb z, fz_sswfxwdj d where z.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and d.djxh = ? and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.zlxqgzzt_dm = ?
select * from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz where lcslid = $lcslid$ and nspgbguuid = $sjslid$ and nvl(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
select t.bkckgluuid, t.bgnr, t.bgjg_dm, t.bgrq_1 from fz_bkckgl t where t.bkckgluuid = $uuid$
SELECT DJ.SQR, DJ.SQSX, DJ.SQRQ, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID FROM FZ_TZSQDJB DJ WHERE DJ.Swjg_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND DJ.TZZT NOT IN ('0', '5')

select t.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.rwbh rwbh, t.djxh, t.sxry_dm, t.sxryssswjg_dm, t.sxrq_1 sxrq, t.dclx_dm, t.sfzb, t.zbyj, t.cbdw_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.zybsxy, t.AYXXLY, t.dclx_dm, t.tbnsdcaybh, a.tbnsdcajzt_dm, a.tbnsdcajbh, a.ajmc, a.larq, a.jarq, s.dcssrqq, s.dcssrqz, s.swjg_dm, s.zjdljgmc, s.zjdljglxdh, s.zjdljgemail, s.dlcadzjjgryxm,s.tbnsdclasqbuuid from np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb t, np_tbnsdcajxxb a, np_tbnsdclasqb s where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and a.tbnsdcajxxuuid = s.tbnsdcajxxuuid(+) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.cbdw_dm = ?) and a.tbnsdcajzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh =?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.rwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tbnsdcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(t.SXRQ_1,'yyyy-mm-dd')= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.jcry = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

SELECT TZZCSQWTSUUID, SSWFXWDJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, TZZCR, WSZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, HDSLID, LCSLID, SJGSDQ, SQSWJG_DM_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SJSLID, SQRMC, YXBZ, SWJG_DM FROM FZ_TZZCSQWTS WHERE TZZCSQWTSUUID = $tzzcsqwtsuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.SWJCAJUUID, t.LJSWJG_DM, t.AJJS, t.JM, t.LJR_DM, t.LJRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SJSLID, t.AJBH, t.JS, t.AJBGQX, t.MJ_DM, t.YS, t.QZH, t.MLH, t.AJH, t.SFFJ, t.QTJYHQKSM, t.BJQKSM, t.LJRQM, t.JCRQM, t.AJLB from jc_swjcaj t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and t.sffj ='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select distinct t.yzpzxh, t.swcljdsuuid, t.jcajxxuuid from jc_swcljdqkb t where t.swcljdsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yzpzxh is not null

select distinct d.wfxwbh, d.wfxwmc, d.sswfxwdjuuid, d.djxh,d.nsrsbh,d.nsrmc from fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_swxzcfjds_jy jy where jy.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and jy.yzpzxh = ? union all select distinct d.wfxwbh, d.wfxwmc, d.sswfxwdjuuid, d.djxh,d.nsrsbh,d.nsrmc from fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb where fb.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and fb.yzpzxh = ? union all select distinct j.jcajbh as wfxwbh, j.ajmc as wfxwmc, j.jcajxxuuid as sswfxwdjuuid, j.djxh, j.nsrsbh, j.nsrmc from jc_ajxx j,Fz_Swxzcfqkb_Jccf cf,fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk qk where j.jcajxxuuid = cf.jcajxxuuid and cf.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = qk.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and qk.yzpzxh = ?

SELECT SWXZCFTZTZSUUID, TZZCSQWTSUUID, SSWFXWDJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, TZSJ, TZDD, TZZCR, WSZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, HDSLID, LCSLID, SJGSDQ, ZJBZ, ZZBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SJSLID, SHBXFBZ, YXBZ, SWJG_DM FROM FZ_SWXZCFTZTZS WHERE SWXZCFTZTZSUUID = $swxzcftztzsuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT YJ.YJSKSYQKBUUID, YJ.YJSKUUID, YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID, YJ.JCAJXXUUID, YJ.LCSLID, YJ.SJSLID, YJ.ZSXM_DM, YJ.ZSPM_DM, YJ.ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, YJ.HY_DM, YJ.SKSSQQ, YJ.SKSSQZ, YJ.RKRQ, YJ.DJXH, YJ.SYJE, YJ.Yzpzxh, YJ.Yzpzmxxh, YJ.ZNJ, YJ.SYBZ, CL.SKZZFS_DM, CL.ZSPM_DM ZSZSPM, CL.ZGSWSKFJ_DM FROM JC_CBYJSYQKB YJ, JC_SWCLJDQKB CL, jc_swcljds ds WHERE YJ.SWCLJDQKBUUID = CL.SWCLJDQKBUUID and cl.swcljdsuuid = ds.swcljdsuuid AND YJ.SYBZ = 'Y' and nvl(cl.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(ds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and ds.swcljdsuuid in (#macroparam#) and (yj.zfbz_1 = 'N' or yj.zfbz_1 is null)

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.dcxcuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.ajmc, t.jcssqq, t.jcssqz, t.larq, t.jarq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.jcry, t.jcjg_dm, t.dclx_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm from np_tbnsdcajxxb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdclajlzfqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.zfbz_1, t.bcyj, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsdclajlzfqkb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPXX T WHERE T.SPXXUUID = $uuid$

select a.dzbzdszl_dm from jc_sswfajtsclsqb a where a.jcajxxuuid = ? UNION select b.dzbzdszl_dm from jc_sswfajjctsclsqb b where b.jcajxxuuid = ? UNION select c.dzbzdszl_dm from jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb c where c.jcajxxuuid = ?
select * from np_hczdqbgzqkdg where ywzjuuid=?
select t.jcjysuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.sy, t.jcjy, t.jcbm_dm, t.czrq_1, t.swjg_dm, t.czry_dm, t.wsbh, t.zfbz_1 from Jc_Jcjys t where T.sjslid = $uuid$
UPDATE FZ_TZZCSQWTS T SET T.YXBZ = ?, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE, T.XGR_DM = ? WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,y.jcayxxuuid,t.jcajxxuuid,t.jcajbh, t.djxh,t.ajmc from jc_ajxx t,jc_ayxx y where t.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and t.jcajbh=?

select g.* from NP_SSZCQKBG g where (1 = #macroparam# or g.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.bz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.sszcqkbguuid = ?) and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.xzzxtzsgsuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.swsxtzswszg,t.wszg,t.wszzrq,t.dzbzdszl_dm,t.qddchbdccqdmsrmc,t.flyj,t.xzzxccmc,t.xzzxjgmc,t.wh,t.nh,t.zg,t.swjgjg,t.swjg_dm,t.tzsuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.xzzxtzsgsuuid from fz_xzzxtzs t where t.jdsuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value3$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
select a.tbnsdcajxxuuid,a.djxh,b.dcssrqq as ydwtsjndq,b.dcssrqz as ydwtsjndz from np_tbnsdcajxxb a,np_tbnsdclasqb b where a.tbnsdcajxxuuid=b.tbnsdcajxxuuid and a.tbnsdcajbh = ? and a.djxh = ?
select t.* from jc_sswfxwjjdjb_jjrxx t where t.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select t.LCSLID, t.SJSLID, t.TZSUUID, t.WSZG, t.SWJG_DM, t.JRJGMC, t.JCRY, t.JCZHM, t.JCRSL, t.BCXCKZHKHRMC, t.WSZZRQ, t.CXNR, t.GFJCAJXXUUID from jc_xzcxckzhtzs t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select SWJCXMSZBUUID, SWJCXMSUUID, FXXM, FXYJ, FXYJ_1, BZ, AYXXXM_DM ,JCAYXXLYMC,CBSE,FKYJ from JC_SWJCXMS_ZB where SWJCXMSUUID = $uuid$ and ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.ajjczt_dm, t.jcajxxuuid, y.sswflx_dm from jc_ajxx t, jc_ayxx y where t.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and t.djxh = $uuid$ and t.ajlx_dm = $value$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$ and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = $key$
select y.* from np_fxydydxx y, np_ssfxydbg b where y.bguuid = b.bguuid and y.bguuid = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.JCAJXXUUID, t.WFXXUUID, t.JCAJBH, t.AJMC, t.DJXH, t.AJLX_DM, t.WTAJBZ, t.ZDAJBZ, t.DBAJBZ, t.YSSFBZ, t.AJSZJG_DM, t.JCSSQJQ, t.JCSSQJZ, t.LASQRQ, t.LARQ, t.RWXDRQ, t.JCDJRQ, t.SWJCTZSSDRQ, t.JCJSRQ, t.SLDJRQ, t.SLJSRQ, t.ZXDJRQ, t.ZXWBRQ, t.TZSJ, t.JCRY, t.SLRY, t.ZXRY, t.LABM_DM, t.JCBM_DM, t.SLBM_DM, t.ZXBM_DM, t.YJSKZE, t.YJFKZE, t.YJZNJZE, t.SJSKZE, t.SJZNJZE, t.SJFKZE, t.DJZCLX_DM, t.HY_DM, t.SWJG_DM, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.JCJZRQ, t.SLJZRQ, t.CLWBBZ, t.AJJCZT_DM, t.SLYJ_2, t.LCSLID, t.NSRSBH, t.NSRMC, t.JCRQQ, t.DYABZ, t.ZGSWJG_DM, t.JARQ, t.JCXM from jc_ajxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcssqjq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcssqjz <= ?) and t.ajszjg_dm in #macroparam# and (1 = #macroparam# or t.slyj_2 like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajlx_Dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ajmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.larq = ?) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' order by t.larq desc

select s.dzbzdszl_dm, s.dzbzdszlmc, s.ywzjuuid from np_zdydsjxx s, cs_np_zdydsj a where a.dzbzdszl_dm = s.dzbzdszl_dm and s.xtgn_dm = a.xtgn_dm and s.xtgn_dm = ? and s.ywuuid = ? and s.yxbz = 'Y' and a.yxbz='Y' order by s.lrrq asc

select count(*) as sl from gy_ws_wszb where ywzjuuid in(select distinct(ywzjuuid) from jc_swjctzsy where dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1120174' and swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from jc_swjctzsy where ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N')) and dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$ and wh=$value2$ and nh=$value3$ and zfsj is null

SELECT SWWFSSBCLTZSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_SWWFSSBCLTZS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(SHBXFBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT BYSWXZCFJDSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_BYSWXZCFJDS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(SHBXFBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT SWXZCFJDSUUID AS SDWSUUID, LCSLID FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS WHERE SSWFXWDJUUID = ? AND NVL(ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.gljg_dm from dm_qx_znjgdzbkz_jcjg t where t.jcjg_dm=?

select nszczxqkqrbuuid, nspgajxxuuid, djxh, zcbgbsrq, sjjkrq, fzr_dm_1, qrjg, qtjyhqksm, swjg_dm, qrrq, qrr_dm, lcslid, zzstzlds, qysdstzynssde, qysdstzynse,fzrqz from np_nszczxqkqrb where nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and lcslid = $lcslid$ and sjslid = $sjslid$

select t. GFJCAJYSUUID, t. GFJCAJXXUUID, t. GFJCYSSQSWSZG, t. BYSBMMC, t. SQSWJG_DM, t. YSLY, t. YSFLYJ, t. YSNR, t. FK, t. LXJE, t. ZNJ, t. FK_1, t. HJJE, t. SQYJ, t. GFJCYSSQSWSZZRQ,
t. GFJCYSSWSZG, t. GFJCYSSWSZZRQ, t. LCSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1 from JC_GFJCAJYS t where t.GFJCAJYSUUID = $uuid$

select x.dygtgzdqbqkbuuid,x.gjssqbdjbuuid,x.skfgj_dm,x.skflx,x.skfxm,x.skfcsrq,x.skfxb,x.skfssgnsr_dm, x.skfdz,x.fkflx,x.fkfgj_dm,x.skfyzbm,x.fkfxm,x.tggnsr_dm,x.fkfdz,x.fkfyzbm,x.fkrq,x.nszznd,x.zflx,x.zfzebz,x.fjuuid, x.zfjebz,x.zfzesz,x.yqkjskbz,x.zfjesz,x.sl_1,x.yqkjsk from np_xdygtgzdqbqkb x where x.dygtgzdqbqkbuuid=?
select b.dzbzdszl_dm,b.zdmc,b.bmc,b.ywzj,a.sdwsuuid from zh_sdxx a,cs_jc_xgzdpzb b where a.dzbzdszl_dm=b.dzbzdszl_dm and a.ajxxuuid=? and (a.zfbz_1 is null or a.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select z.sjfhfpzbuuid, z.sjfhfpuuid, z.fpmc, z.fpzl_dm, z.fpfs, z.fpqshm, z.fpzzhm, z.bz, z.xh,z.lrrq,z.lrr_dm,z.sjgsdq,z.fp_dm from fz_sjfhfpzb z where z.sjfhfpuuid = $uuid$

SELECT DM.DZBZDSZLMC, DM.DZBZDSZL_DM, LJ.XMLZHBEANLLJ, LJ.YWBDSJLJ, ZB.XMLLSH, ZB.YWWSUUID, NVL(NVL(ZB.WSBH, ZB.WSZG),'无') WH, ZB.UUID, LJ.BDLJMC, LJ.CSDMZ_1, LJ.LCBZ, ZB.LRR_DM ZRRXM, ZB.LCSLID, zb.lrrq, ZB.Wszzgz_Dm, ZB.Jgssswjg_Dm FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ LJ, GY_WS_WSZB ZB, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL DM WHERE LJ.DZBZDSZL_DM = ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM = DM.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.YWZJUUID = ? AND ZB.ZFR_DM IS NULL

select s.nsxybfpsqbuuid, s.djxh, s.gszgswjgdm, s.dszgswjgdm, s.jbr, s.jbrlxdh, s.sqbpnd, s.slrdm, s.sqrq, s.slrq, s.sljgdm, s.slbz, s.lcslid,s.sjslid,s.ndpjjg,s.nsrxybpyy_dm,s.nsrxyfpyy_dm,s.zfbz_1 from Zh_Nsxybfpsqb s where s.djxh = ? and s.sqbpnd = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. TBNSTZFHUUID, t. AJXXUUID, t. AJMC, t. TBNSDCAJBH, t. DJXH, t. NSRSBH, t. NSRMC, t. SQR_DM, t. SQRQ, t. XCNR, t. XCYQ, t. LCSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t.TBNSDCAYBH, t.fjuuid from ZH_XCSQB_TBNSTZFH t where t.TBNSTZFHUUID=$uuid$

select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajdbh z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.zdsswfajdbhuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.jcayxxuuid = ? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajbqdcbxxb x, gy_ws_wszb t where x.zdsswfajbqdcbuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and x.jcayxxuuid = ? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb y, gy_ws_wszb t where y.zdsswfajdblxuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and y.jcayxxuuid = ?
select t.* from jc_swjcslspb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select (case when t.cxrmc is not null then t.cxrmc else t.cxrxm end) as cxrmc, t. AY, t. SLSJQ, t. SLSJZ, t. TLDD, t. ZCRXM, t. JLR, t. FYJTTLBLUUID, t. TLJLYJD, t. WSZZRQ, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ from FZ_XZFYAJJTTLBL t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select count(zxbg.jczxbguuid) as sl, 'BDA1120251' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swjczxbg zxbg where zxbg.jcajxxuuid = ? and zxbg.jabz = 'Y' and (zxbg.zfbz_1 is null or zxbg.zfbz_1 = 'N')

SELECT T.QZZXDJBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.WSBH, T.QZZXFS_DM, T.DJRQ, T.DJRY_DM, T.RGDJBZ, T.ZLCSLID, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ FROM FZ_QZZXDJB T WHERE T.ZLCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = 'N'

select jc.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, jc.jcajxxuuid, jc.jcajxzcfscbguuid, jc.cbskhfkbguuid, jc.cflx_dm, jc.mswfsdje, jc.wfsd_dm, jc.zgswjg_dm, jc.zjgftfkje, jc.fzjgftfkje, jc.lcslid,jc.lrrq, jc.sjslid,jc.sswflx_dm,jc.wfcy_dm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jc where jc.jcajxxuuid = ? and nvl(jc.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jc.cbskhfkbguuid is null

SELECT T.*, B.SSBQSQSJ FROM FZ_SSBQYQXXB T LEFT JOIN (SELECT SQ.SQRQ SSBQSQSJ, BQ.SSBQXXBUUID FROM FZ_SWXZZFSQB SQ, FZ_SSBQXXB BQ WHERE SQ.AJXXUUID = BQ.AJXXUUID AND SQ.LCSLID = BQ.LCSLID AND NVL(SQ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(BQ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') B ON T.SSBQXXBUUID = B.SSBQXXBUUID WHERE T.SSBQYQXXBUUID = $value1$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdclashbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.shyj, t.shyjsm, t.shr, t.shrq, t.sfwzs, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsdclashb t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.hdslid = $hdslid$

SELECT T.XZZXTZSGSUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.JDSUUID, T.TZSUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.XZZXJGMC, T.XZZXCCMC, T.FLYJ, T.XZZXTZSGS1UUID, T.QDDCHBDCCQDMSRMC, T.WSZZRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.SJSLID = $sjslid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.xsnrjluuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.lrrq, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.swztry_dm, t.qyztry, t.swcxrydm, t.qycxryxm, t.xsdd, t.xssj, t.jlr, t.dcryqrba, t.qysftydcfa, t.xscs, t.tbnsdcsyjdlx_dm, t.ys, t.ym, t.xsjl, t.sjtb_sj, a.tbnsdcajxxuuid, a.ajmc,a.nsrsbh,a.nsrmc from NP_XSNRJL t, np_tbnsdcajxxb a where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid=$uuid$ order by t.xssj desc
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWJCSLBG T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$
select * from np_ytbl b where (1 = #macroparam# or b.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.ytbluuid = ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_yydjajxxb where yydjapaybh =? and NVL(zfbz_1,'N') =?

SELECT T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBZBUUID, T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBUUID, T.XH, T.SQFQJNFKJZRQ, T.SQFQJNFKJE, T.SQFQJNFKQS, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SQFQJNFKQS, NVL(T.PZFQJNFKZQS, T.SQFQJNFKQS) AS PZFQJNFKZQS, NVL(T.PZFQJNFKJE, T.SQFQJNFKJE) AS PZFQJNFKJE, NVL(T.PZSQFQJNFKJZRQ, T.SQFQJNFKJZRQ) AS PZSQFQJNFKJZRQ, T.FKXXUUID FROM FZ_YQHZFQJNFKXXBZB T WHERE T.YQHZFQJNFKXXBUUID = $UUID$
select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.ajjczt_dm from jc_ajxx t where t.djxh = ?
select g.* from np_nspgbg g where g.zlcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
select b.* from np_gxssybtsqkhzb b,np_zrdjtzynssrhsdetzs s where b.tbnsdcajxxuuid = s.tbnsdcajxxuuid and s.zrdjtzynssrhsdetzsuuid=$uuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_ZSSQBZNRTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?

select sqb.lcslid from jc_lasqb sqb where sqb.jcayxxuuid = ? union select jj.lcslid from jc_sswfxwjjdjb jj where (jj.jcayxxuuid = ? or jj.jcajxxuuid = ?) union select fa.lcslid from JC_Zdsswfajccfa fa, jc_zdsswfajdbh dbh, Jc_Zdsswfajdblxxxb lx where fa.zdsswfajdbhuuid = dbh.zdsswfajdbhuuid and dbh.zdsswfajdblxuuid = lx.zdsswfajdblxuuid and (lx.jcayxxuuid = ? or lx.jcajxxuuid = ?) union select cb.lcslid from Jc_Zdsswfajbqdcbxxb cb where (cb.jcayxxuuid = ? or cb.jcajxxuuid = ?) union select db.lcslid from Jc_Zdsswfajdblxxxb db where (db.jcayxxuuid = ? or db.jcajxxuuid = ?) union select t.lcslid from JC_Sswfajtsclsqb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm in ('BDA1120127', 'BDA1120131') and t.jcajxxuuid = ? union select t.lcslid from Zh_Xcsqb_Wtxc t where t.jcajxxuuid = ? union select t.lcslid from Zh_Shglxxb t where t.jcajxxuuid = ? union select fh.lcslid from ZH_SSWFAJXCHFH fh, Zh_Shglxxb sh where fh.shglxxbuuid = sh.shglxxbuuid and sh.jcajxxuuid = ? union select y.lcslid from fz_ssbqyqxxb y where nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and y.ajxxuuid = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SHBXFFZMXXXB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = $ywzjuuid$ AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$)

select t.* from fz_nsdbs t where t.nsdbzt = 'Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfdqcl, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfjccl, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.ajxxuuid, ' ') = ' ' and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $value1$ and t.djxh = $value2$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and h.tfjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
select t.DQZBZLQDMXUUID, t.DQZBZLQDUUID, t.ZLSSSQQ, t.ZLSSSQZ, t.DW_1, t.SL, t.YS, t.BZ, t.DQTHZBZLLX_DM, t.ZBZLMC from jc_dqzbzlqd_mx t where t.dqzbzlqduuid = $uuid$

select t.YYDJAPSLZSSQBUUID, t.YYDJSXXXUUID, t.SFSSWZJDDLXQYBZ, t.XSSSYHZC, t.ZJDLJG, t.DLRYXM, t.DLRLXDH, t.DLRYX, t.QYTQYX, t.YBHTCBYZYJ, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSRQ_3, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SJTB_SJ, t.LCSLID, t.SJSLID, t.HDSLID, x.YYDJQDLX_DM from NP_YYDJAPSLZSSQJGB t, NP_YYDJSXXX x where t.yydjsxxxuuid = x.yydjsxxxuuid and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.sjslid = $sjslid$ and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.jcckzhxkzmuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.jscxdw, t.jcry, t.jcrysl, nvl(t.jczhms, t.jczhm) jczhms, t.bcxckzhkhrmc, t.wszzrq, t.swjg_dm, t.swxzzfsqbuuid, t.cxnr, t.lcslid from jc_jcckzhxkzm t where t.lcslid = $uuid$

select t.YYDJAPHTJLUUID, t.YYDJSXXXUUID, t.SWJG_DM, t.HTNR, t.HTSJ, t.HTDD, t.QYZTRYXM, t.QYZTRYZW, t.ZGSWJGZTRYZW, t.JLRQZ, t.SJHSYXSWJGLXRDH, t.EMAIL, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.SWZTRY_DM, t.ZGSWJGQTRYXM, t.GSQYQTRYXM, t.SJTB_SJ, t.FJUUID, t.SFDCYZYJ, t.SJSLID from NP_YYDJAPHTJL t where t.lcslid =$lcslid$ and t.sjslid =$sjslid$
select t.* from fz_zdswajsmsltzs t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select qc.djxh, qc.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid from NP_NSXYDJPDQDQC qc where qc.djxh = ? and qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid = ? and qc.zfbz_1='N'

select x.ajmc, x.jcajbh, y.bgrq_1, x.jcajxxuuid, nvl(sum(z.ybtse), 0) as ncbskznjfkje, nvl(sum(z.ncfje), 0) as yjfkje from jc_ajxx x, jc_swjcslbg y, jc_swcljdqkb z where x.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and x.jcajxxuuid = z.jcajxxuuid(+) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and y.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or x.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(y.bgrq_1) >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(y.bgrq_1) <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and x.ajszjg_dm = ? group by x.ajmc, x.jcajbh, y.bgrq_1, x.jcajxxuuid

select t.zdswajzzsluuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.wsbh, t.wszg, t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.ajslrq, t.zzsldly, t.slryqm, t.slryqmrq, t.slwyhbgsyj, t.bgsfzrqmrq, t.bgsfzrqm, t.slwyhfzryj, t.slwyhfzryjqm, t.slwyhfzryjqmrq, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.hdslid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.tqdw_dm, t.swjg_dm from fz_zdswajzzsl t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = $tj1$ or t.jcajxxuuid = $value1$) and (1 = $tj2$ or t.sjslid = $value2$) and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value3$

select t.nsdbccqdzbuuid,t.dbccmc as dbccbdcmc,t.dbccgg as dbccbdcgg,t.dbccqs as dbccbdcqs,t.dbccjldw as dbccbdcdw, t.dbccsl as dbccbdcsl,t.dbccdj as dbccbdcdj ,t.dbccje as dbccbdcje from fz_nsdbccqd_zb t where t.bdcbz='Y' and t.nsdbccqduuid=?

select t. FYSCYJUUID, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. BSQRDBNR, t. SLNR, t. SLYJ_1, t. XZFYYJLX_DM, t. SCYJNR, t. SLRY, t. WSZZRQ, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. XWDCBLUUID, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZSTYBZ
from FZ_XZFYSCYJ t where t.sjslid=$uuid$

update fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk jc set jc.yzpzxh = ?, jc.xgr_dm = ?, jc.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(jc.YZPZXH, 0) = 0 and jc.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = (select a.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf a, fz_swxzcfjds jds where a.jcajxxuuid = jds.sswfxwdjuuid and a.lcslid = jds.lcslid and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N')
select t.tqzjzysjzbuuid, t.tqzjzysjuuid, t.zjmc, t.ys, t.zjcc, t.nrzy, t.je, t.thbz, t.zjsssq, t.tqzjthqduuid from JC_TQZJZYSJ_ZB T where t.tqzjthqduuid = $uuid$

select t.AJMLUUID, t.SWJCAJUUID, t.YC, t.YS, t.ZLMC, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZRRXM, t.WH, t.BZ, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.UUID, t.mlrq, t.procinstid, t.fjuuid,t.js from jc_swjcaj_ml t where t.swjcajuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.bkcktzsuuid, t.lxr, t.lxdh, t.bz, t.swjgfzrqz, t.wszzrq from fz_bkcktzs t where t.bkckgluuid = $uuid$

select qc1.djxh, qc1.gdsbz, qc1.zzpj_dm, qc1.xydjpdfs_dm, qc1.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, nvl(qc1.shxydm,qc1.nsrsbh) as nsrsbh , qc1.nsrmc, qc1.gdghlx_dm, qc1.zgswj_dm, case when qc1.gdghlx_dm !='1' then qc1.gsjgpj_dm when qc1.gdsbz = '1' then qc1.gsjgpj_dm else qc2.gsjgpj_dm end as gsjgpj_dm, case when qc1.gdghlx_dm !='1' then qc1.dsjgpj_dm when qc1.gdsbz = '1' then qc2.dsjgpj_dm else qc1.dsjgpj_dm end as dsjgpj_dm, '0' as xjsj from ( select qc.djxh, qc.gsjgpj_dm, qc.zzpj_dm, qc.xydjpdfs_dm, qc.dsjgpj_dm, qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) as nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.gdghlx_dm, qc.gdsbz, qc.zgswj_dm from Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc, dj_nsrxx nsr where qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.gdghlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrmc like ?) and qc.gdsbz = ? and qc.xydjpdzt='2' ) qc1 left join Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc2 on qc1.djxh = qc2.djxh and qc2.gdsbz = ? and qc2.xydjpdzt='2' where qc1.zgswj_dm=?
select*from td_fxxx_nspgb where fxydxh=?

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_ZCTGNSJFDBTZS T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZCTGNSJFDBTZSUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZLXQJNSFKUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SJSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)
select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je,t.bz from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$

select t.cshtbwluuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.zgswjg_dm, t.csnr, t.cbyzyjhzhychtjsrq, t.cshtrq, t.cshtdd, t.qyztryxm, t.qyztryzw, t.ssxddyfqtryxm, t.dygfztr, t.dygfztrzw, t.dygfzqtryxm, t.zgswjgztryxm, t.zgswjgztryzw, t.zgswjgqtryxm, t.ssxddyfztrqm, t.qdxhxssqbh, t.qtryxm, t.jlrxm, t.csyj_dm, t.sjslid, t.lcslid, t.lrrq from np_cshtbwl t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$

select djb.ajmc, djb.ajbh_1, djb.xzfyjgmc, djb.sqrxm, djb.bsqrmc_1, bg.tzsj, bg.tzdd, bg.tzzcr, xxb.flyj from fz_xzfysqdjb djb,fz_xzfygyxxb xxb, fz_xzfytzbg bg, fz_xzfytzbl bl where xxb.xzfysqdjbuuid = djb.xzfysqdjbuuid and xxb.sfysq = 'Y' and djb.xzfysqdjbuuid = bl.xzfysqdjbuuid and bl.xzfytzbluuid = bg.xzfytzbluuid and djb.djxh = ? and ajbh_1 = ?

SELECT T.JCAJXZCFSCBGUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.JBQK, T.JCQKJFXWT, T.DSRCSSBQK, T.TZQK, T.CLJY, T.CLYJ_1, T.QTQKSM, T.SCRY, T.SCRQ, T.SCJGSCYJ, T.ZSRQ_3, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSTYBZ, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ FROM FZ_JCAJXZCFSCBG T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.JCAJXZCFSCBGUUID = ?) select t.SWJCAJUUID, t.LJSWJG_DM, t.AJJS, t.JM, t.LJR_DM, t.LJRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SJSLID, t.AJBH, t.JS, t.AJBGQX, t.MJ_DM, t.YS, t.QZH, t.MLH, t.AJH, t.SFFJ, t.QTJYHQKSM, t.BJQKSM, t.LJRQM, t.JCRQM, t.AJLB, t.dzbzdszl_dm from jc_swjcaj t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sffj ='N'

select t. FCJLUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. SWJGJG, t. ZG, t. NH, t. WH, t. XJSWJG_DM, t. JCAJFCJLLX_DM, t. JLJTMS, t. WSZZRQ, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJSLID, t. SJGSDQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. FCSWJG_DM from JC_FCJL t where t.sjslid= $uuid$
select t.* from jc_sswfajjtsljy t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_PMBMGYXXB T WHERE T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$ AND T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select f.* from Np_Dbyydjybhtshyjzfqkb f where f.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and f.lcslid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or f.hdslid = ?) and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? order by lrrq desc

SELECT WTXCUUID, JCAJXXUUID, SQR_DM, SQRQ, DJXH, XCLX_DM, XCLY_DM, XCNR, XCYQ, AJBH_1, AJMC, DBHWSZG, FHSWJG_DM, ZSR_DM, ZSTYBZ, ZSRQ_3, LCSLID, ZFBZ_1, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_XCSQB_WTXC WHERE WTXCUUID = $wtxcuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select * from td_fxfx_nspgxmb t where t.nspgxmmc = ? and t.pgssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.pgssqz = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_SQXQBYSLTZ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Tzsuuid = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

select lh.wflhckh,bw.fwzh_1, y.ywhhfqkuuid,y.hsrq_2,y.fhjfrq,y.jfr,y.mdg,y.qhzl,y.wfqhckh,y.hjcnr,y.bz,y.tbry,y.tbrq,bw.lhqkdjbuuid,qf.fjuuid from np_lhqkdjb lh left join np_bwqkdjb bw on lh.lhqkdjbuuid = bw.lhqkdjbuuid left join np_swsxqfb qf on lh.lhqkdjbuuid = qf.lhqkdjbuuid left join np_ywhhfqk y on lh.lhqkdjbuuid = y.lhqkdjbuuid where lh.lhqkdjbuuid=?

select t.tzsuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.slswjgmc, t.slr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.slrq, t.blqx, t.sqrq, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.fyjgmc, t.wszg, t.lcswsx_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm from fz_swsxtzs t where t.slbz = 'N' and t.tzsuuid= $uuid$

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm = ? union select #macroparam# as swjg_dm from dual), swjg22 as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm in (select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) union select gljg_dm as swjg_dm from cs_fz_nfjgygljgdzb where nfjg_dm = ?) select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and exists (select 1 from swjg t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null union select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and a.lrr_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null union select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and exists (select 1 from swjg22 t where t.swjg_dm = a.tfjg_dm) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null
select t.xzfygyxxbuuid,t.xzfysqdjbuuid,t.fysqchrq from fz_xzfygyxxb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA1210022' and t.cxbz='Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.xzfysqdjbuuid=$uuid$

select t.yjrq from jc_Swjcajyjzljjqd t where t.jcajxxuuid =$uuid$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdwsuuid = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from jc_swjcslshb t where t.swjcslshbuuid = $uuid$

FHRQ_2, t. QDRXM, t. QDRQ, t. QDSWJG_DM, t. BWTHGMC, t. DHCHGJKSFS, t. MJ_DM, t. QFRXM, t. QBBH, t. LXDH, t. LXR_DM, t. YZBM, t. HFDW_DM, t. HFDZ, t. HFRQ, t. HJBH, t. HJZT_DM, t. JSRXM, t. JSRQ, t. JSSWJG_DM, t. SQYQXCSWJG_DM, t. YQSQWSZG, t. YQJZRQ, t. SQYQJZRQ, t. WSZZRQ, t. WSZG, t. XCHWSZG, t. XDCSX, t. XDCYD, t. XCHWSZZRQ, t. FHWSZG, t. DCJG_1, t. FHWSZZRQ, t. SQR_DM, t. SQRQ, t. LCSLID, t. LRRQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. TXDZ, t. NR, t. ZZSJ from zh_hjxxb t where t.hjxxbuuid = $uuid$
