select t.tbnsjkglkhtjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.yydjapajbh, t.yydjapajmc, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.jkgljd, t.djxh, t.qymc, t.jknd, t.jklx, t.jkqqk, t.jkhqk, t.gtzrmbje, t.qysdsmbkse, t.qysdstzynssde, t.qysdstzybsdse, t.zzsyssre, t.ybzzse, t.xfsyssre, t.ybxfse, t.yysyssre, t.ybyyse, t.qtsyssre, t.ybqtse, t.gzglndq, t.gzglndz, t.tbnsdcgzglfxpgjl, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsjkglkhtjb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid =$uuid$

select t.swajdsrzscluuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.dsrxm, t.xb_dm, t.nl, t.zy_dm, t.zz, t.zsnr, t.zsrqzrq, t.swjg_dm, t.zsrxm, t.zfbz_1, t.lxdh, t.ys, t.sfzjzl_dm, t.sfzjhm from JC_SWAJDSRZSCL t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select t.spxxuuid, t.ywzjuuid, t.pzzl_dm, t.sphm, t.zsxm_dm, t.sjje, t.tfrq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.zsrq from fz_spxx t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$
SELECT T.*, (T.SWJGJG || '' || T.ZG || '〔' || T.NH || '〕' || T.WH || '号') AS WSZG FROM FZ_SWSXTZS_XZCLBQCCSY T WHERE T.XZCLBQCCTZSUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

select a.zlxqgzxxbuuid, a.sswfxwdjuuid, a.zlxqgzqx, a.sfgz, a.xhrq, a.zlxqgzzt_dm, a.lcslid as zlxglcslid, d.djxh, d.lcslid as wfxwlcslid, d.rgdjbz, d.sswflx_dm, d.sswfxwclzt_dm, d.sswfsd_dm, d.djjg_dm from fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_zlxqgzxxb a where d.sswfxwdjuuid = a.sswfxwdjuuid and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.rgdjbz = ? and d.sswflx_dm = ? and d.sswfsd_dm = ? and d.djjg_dm = ? and a.zlxqgzzt_dm = ? and a.ywfl_dm = 'A06' and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT FJMCBGCZYXXCDBMXUUID, FJMCBGCZYXXCDBUUID, FBFHLWSRFNSRSBH, FBFHLWSRFLXRXM, FBFHLWSRFLXDH, FBFHLWSRFDJXH, FJMNSRMC, FJMXMSZD, FJMDJXH, FJMQYLXRXM, FJMQYLXDH, DLRMC, XMLX, HTJE, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, HTBZ, SFGCCSJG, FJMNSRSBH, FBFHLWSRFMC FROM ZH_FJMCBGCZYXXCDB_MX T WHERE T.FJMCBGCZYXXCDBUUID = $uuid$

select t.tzsuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.wszg, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.slswjgmc, t.slr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.slrq, t.blqx, t.sqrq, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.spswjg_dm, t.spswjgmc, t.sply, t.wszg, t.lcswsx_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm from fz_swsxtzs t where t.slbz = 'S' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$

select g.wszg, g.sjslid, g.xzfygywsuuid, g.xzfysqdjbuuid, g.djxh, g.nsrmc, g.nsrsbh, g.swjgjg, g.zg, g.nh, g.wh, g.xzfyjg_dm, g.slswjg_dm, g.tzzcrxm, g.tzsj, g.tzdd, g.tzsuuid, g.lcslid, g.xzfyyjlx_dm, g.jdnr, g.fkyj, g.cljg, g.dzbzdszl_dm, g.bxwdcrxm, g.djxynr, g.slfyrq, g.swjg_dm, g.hdslid from Fz_Xzfygyws g where g.xzfygywsuuid = ? and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select z.zxbztzsuuid, z.nspgajxxuuid, z.bzqx, z.slswjg_dm, z.wtms, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, z.qrbz, z.lcslid, a.djxh, a.pgssqq, a.pgssqz, a.sjly_dm from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz z, np_nspgajxxb a, np_zcbsdzb b where z.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and z.zxbztzsuuid = b.zxbztzsuuid and z.qrbz = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and b.zxbztzsuuid in (#macroparam#)
update fz_shbxfxzcfjdsjy a set a.yzpzxh = ?, a.xgr_dm = ?, a.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(a.yzpzxh,0) = 0 and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and a.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid = ?
select t.swxzcfjdsjyuuid, t.yzpzxh from fz_swxzcfjds_jy t where t.swxzcfjdsjyuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.yzpzxh is not null

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm, t.ajmc, t.ajlx_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.dclx_dm, t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc from np_tbnsdcajxxb t, np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb b where b.tbnsdcajxxuuid = t.tbnsdcajxxuuid and b.ayxxly='04' and t.djxh=? and b.zfbz_1='N' and t.tbnsdcajbh is not null

select t.yydjapuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.hzqdyydjapswjgmc, t.apsymynsndqxq, t.apsymynsndqxz, t.djyzyjsyj, t.ssxddyfqdrq, t.yydjapqddd, t.sxrq, t.zrdjff, t.qyfqzrzw, t.qyfqzrxm, t.tcyqsqqx, t.tjzlmc, t.jstj, t.nsnd_1, t.sbhdwh, t.gjswjqdfqmrzw, t.gjswjqdfswjgmc, t.gjswjqdfqdrq, t.gjswjqdfqmrxm, t.dfswjqdfqdrq, t.dfswjqdfqmrxm, t.dfswjqdfqmrzw, t.dfswjqdfswjgmc, t.baswjgmc, t.barq, t.swjg_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.lrrq, t.zsr_dm, t.zssj, t.zstybz from np_yydjap t where t.yydjapuuid = $yydjapuuid$
select j.uuid,j.bguuid,j.ygse,j.sswtsm,j.sswt_dm,j.zsxm_dm,j.zspm_dm from NP_ATSHJL j where j.bguuid=?

SELECT CL.WFWZLX_DM, CL.WFWZLX_DM AS SSWFLX_DM, SD.SSWFSDMC, LX.SSWFLXMC, XM.ZSXMMC, CL.WFWZXW_DM, CL.SWCLJDQKBUUID, CL.JCAJXXUUID, CL.ZSXM_DM, CL.ZSPM_DM, CL.SKZZFS_DM, CL.SKSSQQ, CL.SKSSQZ, CL.SLDWSE, CL.YZPZXH, CL.SJSLID, CL.YBTSE, CL.JDXZ_DM, CL.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, CL.JSYJTZS, CL.MBYQNDKS, CL.NSQX, CL.XXSETZSE, CL.XXSETJSE, CL.JXSETZSE, CL.JXSETJSE, CL.LDSETZE, CL.CBSKHFKBGUUID, CL.LCSLID, CL.HDSLID, CL.YZPZMXXH, CL.JSYJSBS, CL.MSWFSDJE, CL.ZGSWJG_DM, CL.WFCY_DM, CL.NCFBS, CL.NCFJE, CL.XXSESBS, CL.JXSESBS, CL.LDSESBS, CL.SWCLJDSUUID FROM JC_SWCLJDQKB CL, DM_GY_SSWFSD SD, DM_GY_SSWFLX LX, DM_GY_ZSXM XM WHERE CL.JCAJXXUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND (CL.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR CL.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND CL.WFWZXW_DM = SD.SSWFSD_DM AND CL.WFWZLX_DM = LX.SSWFLX_DM AND CL.ZSXM_DM = XM.ZSXM_DM

select T.* from FZ_SSQZZXJDS_KJSSKXSY T WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR T.SSQZZXJDSKJSSKXSYUUID = $value1$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.AJXXUUID = $value2$) AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.SWXZZFSQBUUID = $value3$) AND (1 = $tj4$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value4$) AND (1 = $tj5$ OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, $zfbzmrz$) = $zfbz$)

select nspgbguuid, nspgajxxuuid, pgjbqk, ydwtfx, rdjl, pgssrq, cljyfxpgrq, cljyfxpgry_dm, zgjy, zgjyfxpgrq, zgjyfxpgry_dm, lcslid, hdslid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, zstybz, zlcslid, cljysm, nspgcljy_dm from np_nspgbg where nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and lcslid = $lcslid$ order by lrrq desc

SELECT T.DJXH, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.JCRQQ, D.JCAYXXUUID, E.JCDXMC FDLHSFGDQYNSRMC, S.WFWZLX_DM, S.WFWZXW_DM, S.Swcljdsuuid, A.JCQKJFXWT WFQKSM, B.SLYJ_2 SLYJ, B.SLYJMS, C.CLJY CFJD, F.SWXZCFJDSUUID FROM JC_AJXX T LEFT JOIN JC_AYXX D ON T.JCAJXXUUID = D.JCAJXXUUID LEFT JOIN JC_SWJCXMS E ON D.JCAYXXUUID = E.JCAYXXUUID LEFT JOIN JC_SWCLJDQKB S ON T.JCAJXXUUID = S.JCAJXXUUID LEFT JOIN JC_SWJCBG A ON T.JCAJXXUUID = A.JCAJXXUUID LEFT JOIN JC_SWJCSLBG B ON T.JCAJXXUUID = B.JCAJXXUUID LEFT JOIN FZ_JCAJXZCFSCBG C ON T.JCAJXXUUID = C.JCAJXXUUID LEFT JOIN FZ_SWXZCFJDS F ON T.JCAJXXUUID = F.SSWFXWDJUUID WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR A.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (B.ZFR_DM IS NULL) AND (C.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR C.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (D.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR D.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (E.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR E.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (F.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR F.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.JCAJXXUUID = ?

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM FROM JC_AJXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.AJJCZT_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#)

select t.SWJCZBLUUID, t.SWJCZBLSQBZBUUID, t.WSBH, t.CZRXM, t.SFZJHM, t.GZDW, t.JCFW, t.JCZZ, t.FZJG, t.YXRQQ, t.YXRQZ, t.SWJCZH, t.FZRQ, t.NSBZ, t.NSRQ, t.JSBS, t.JXRQ from JC_SWJCZBL t where t.sfzjhm = $uuid$ and (t.bz_1 is null or t.bz_1 = 'Y')
SELECT T.CSDMZ_1 FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ T WHERE T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ? and t.lcbz = '1'

select t.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.sxry_dm, t.sxryssswjg_dm, t.sxrq_1, t.dclx_dm, t.sfzb, t.zbyj, t.cbdw_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.zybsxy, t.ayxxly, t.dclx_dm, t.tbnsdcaybh from np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb t, np_tbnsdcajxxb a where t.sxry_dm = ? and a.tbnsdcajzt_dm in(#macroparam#) and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = a.tbnsdcajxxuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdcjashbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.shyjsm, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.shrq, t.sfwzs, t.ajxtry, t.sfwzdaj, t.sjtb_sj, t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid, t.shyj_dm from np_tbnsdcjashb t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$

SELECT b.* FROM NP_SSFXYDBGJL b WHERE exists (select 1 from NP_SSFXYDBG g where g.bguuid = b.bguuid and (1 = #macroparam# or g.bguuid = ?) and nvl(g.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.SJSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.AJZT_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.SSFXYDBGUUID = ?) AND nvl(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.YBHTSQDJBUUID, t.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, t.YYDJAPSYRQQ, t.YYDJAPSYRQZ, t.JSSQRQ, t.YDDH, t.DJRXM, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSSJ, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SJTB_SJ, t.SJGLJYLX, t.SJGLJYE,t.fjuuid ,t.ybhtjgfftzsuuid from NP_YBHTSQDJB t where t.ybhtsqdjbuuid = $uuid$

select b.pgajbh, t.nspgytqkbuuid, t.nspgajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.bytrxm, t.bytrzw, t.bytrzznx, t.swdlrxm, t.swdlrdwmc, t.ytr, t.ytsj, t.ytdd, t.jlr_dm, t.ytnr, t.nspgjy_dm, t.pgfxry_dm, t.pgjyrq from NP_NSPGYTQKB t, NP_NSPGAJXXB b where t.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid and t.lcslid=? and t.sjslid=? and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select m.sztzxmmxbuuid, m.sztzxmbuuid, m.dzbzdszl_dm, m.tzxm, m.zy_1, m.tzynssde, m.tjynssde, m.ynssdejzje, m.yydjsxxxuuid, m.lrr_dm, m.lrrq from Np_Sztzxmmxb m where exists (select x.sztzxmbuuid from Np_Sztzxmb x where x.sztzxmbuuid = m.sztzxmbuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or x.sztzxmbuuid = ?) and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and m.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(m.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.ajzbdw_dm, t.dbbh, t.djxh, t.cbsx, t.xbjg_dm, t.zcajbz, t.dbzrbm_dm, t.dbzrry_dm, t.jcayxxuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.cbjgswj_Dm, t.xbjgswj_Dm, t.zdsswfajdblxuuid from jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb t where t.jcayxxuuid = $uuid$
select t.xzfygywsuuid,t.xzfysqdjbuuid from fz_xzfygyws t where t.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA1220021' and t.xzfyzzyylx_dm in ('01','02','03') and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.xzfysqdjbuuid=$uuid$

select t.yjajsl,t.clys,t.yjdw_dm,t.yjr_dm,t.jsdw_dm,t.jsry_dm,t.zdswajsltqsys,t.swajlaspbys,t.swajdcbgys,t.jcwslfs,t.jcwslys,t.dsrcssbfs,t.dsrcssbys,t.zdswajsltqsys ,t.zzpzzjlfs, t.zzpzzjlys from jc_zdswajslajjjd t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.tbnsdcajglydqyfxdcqkdjbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.sxry_dm, t.sxryssswjg_dm, t.sxrq_1, t.dclx_dm, t.sfzb, t.zbyj, t.cbdw_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.tbnsdcaybh, t.zybsxy, t.ayxxly from np_tbnstcajglydqyfxdcqkdjb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $tbnsdcajxxuuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_DBYYDJAPQSSQB_FSZLQK T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.LCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.FJUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?

select qc1.djxh, qc1.gdsbz, qc1.zzpj_dm, qc1.xydjpdfs_dm, qc1.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, qc1.nsrsbh, qc1.nsrmc, qc1.gdghlx_dm, qc1.zgswj_dm, case when qc1.gdghlx_dm !='1' then qc1.gsjgpj_dm when qc1.gdsbz = '1' then qc1.gsjgpj_dm else qc2.gsjgpj_dm end as gsjgpj_dm, case when qc1.gdghlx_dm !='1' then qc1.dsjgpj_dm when qc1.gdsbz = '1' then qc2.dsjgpj_dm else qc1.dsjgpj_dm end as dsjgpj_dm, '1' as xjsj from ( select qc.djxh, qc.gsjgpj_dm, qc.zzpj_dm, qc.xydjpdfs_dm, qc.dsjgpj_dm, qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) as nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.gdghlx_dm, qc.gdsbz, qc.zgswj_dm from Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc, dj_nsrxx nsr, dm_gy_swjg jg where qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and jg.swjg_dm = qc.zgswj_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.gdghlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(nsr.shxydm,nsr.nsrsbh) = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrmc like ?) and qc.gdsbz = ? and qc.xydjpdzt='2' and qc.xydjpdfs_dm='4' and jg.sjswjg_dm=? ) qc1 left join Np_Nsxydjpdqdqc qc2 on qc1.djxh = qc2.djxh and qc2.gdsbz = ? and qc2.xydjpdzt='2'

select zb.pdxmmc, zb.xydjpdxm_dm xydjzb_dm, zb.xydjpdxmmc pdnr, td.zbfz cjz, td.zbmfz mfz from (select pxm.xydjpdxm_dm pdxmmc, zxm.xydjpdxm_dm, zxm.xydjpdxmmc from DM_NF_XYDJPDXM zxm, (select pd.xydjpdxm_dm, pd.xydjpdxmmc from DM_NF_XYDJPDXM pd where pd.sjxydjpdxm_dm is null and pd.yxbz = 'Y') pxm where zxm.sjxydjpdxm_dm = pxm.xydjpdxm_dm and zxm.yxbz = 'Y') zb left join Td_Fxmx_Nsrdtzxb td on zb.xydjpdxm_dm = td.zb_dm_1 and td.djxh = ? and td.clzt = '0' order by zb.xydjpdxm_dm asc

select a.zxbztzsuuid, a.nspgajxxuuid, b.djxh, a.bzqx, a.slswjg_dm, a.wtms, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.wszzrq, a.qrbz, a.lcslid, b.pgssqq, b.pgssqz from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz a, np_nspgajxxb b where a.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid and a.zxbztzsuuid = (select zxbztzsuuid from NP_ZCBSDZB where yzpzxh = $yzpzxh$ and rownum = 1) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select n.fxydxh, n.fxxxxh, n.nspgxmid, n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.nsrssswjg_dm, n.nsrssswjgmc, n.nsrsshy, n.fxzfz, n.fxdj, n.clzt, n.scsj, n.fxydbxclbz, n.ydxfph, n.ydxfsj, n.ydxfry_dm, n.ydxfswjg_dm, n.ydczry_dm, n.clsj, n.sjjhcgbz, n.ydczswjg_dm, n.sjjhsj from td_fxxx_nspgb n where n.fxydxh = ?

select t.tbnsdcjajlzfqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.bcyj, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.tbnsdcjasqbuuid from np_tbnsdcjazfqkb t where t.tbnsdcjajlzfqkbuuid = $uuid$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh, h.ggrq, h.xqgzsj from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.tfjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.wsssdrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzzzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or h.hzbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.lrr_dm in(#macroparam#)) and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N')= 'N'
select t.* from jc_swjcajyjzljjqd t where t.jcajyjzljjqduuid = $uuid$

select m.yydjapbtsktzsmxuuid, m.yydjapbtsktzsuuid, m.dzbzdszl_dm, m.zsxm_dm, m.tzjyssr, m.tjzjyjse, m.tzjynssde, m.tjzjqysse, m.lrr_dm, m.lrrq from np_yydjapbtsktzsmxb m where exists (select x.yydjapbtsktzsuuid from np_yydjapbtsktzs x where x.yydjapbtsktzsuuid = m.yydjapbtsktzsuuid and x.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(x.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and (1 = #macroparam# or m.yydjapbtsktzsuuid = ?) and nvl(m.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.XZFYGYWSUUID, T.XZFYSQDJBUUID, T.XZFYGYXXBUUID, T.DJXH, T.NSRMC, T.NSRSBH, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.XZFYJG_DM, T.XZFYJGMC, T.SLSWJG_DM, T.TZZCRXM, T.TZSJ, T.TZDD, T.BXWDCRXM, T.DJXYNR, T.SQR, T.SLFYRQ, T.SWJG_DM, T.WSZZRQ, T.TZSUUID, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSRQ_3, T.ZSTYBZ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.SQRMC, T.FLYJ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FZ_XZFYGYWS T WHERE T.XZFYSQDJBUUID = $value1$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value2$

select t.pgfxrq, t.pgajbh, t.pgxmmc, t.fxydxh, t.pgssqq, t.pgssqz, t.lcslid, a.qrrq, a.nszczxqkqrbuuid, sj.zsxm_dm, sj.zspm_dm, sj.ssqq, sj.ssqz, sj.pgsjskje, sj.tzldje, sj.ynssdetze, s.lrrq, s.pgjbqk, s.rdjl, s.zgjy, t.nspgcljy_dm from np_nspgajxxb t, np_nszczxqkqrb a, np_nspgbg s, np_nspgbgsjskmx sj where t.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid(+) and s.nspgajxxuuid = t.nspgajxxuuid and s.nspgbguuid = sj.nspgbguuid(+) and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.nspgajxxuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJDBYYDJAP T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

select t.cshtbwluuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.zgswjg_dm, t.csnr, t.cbyzyjhzhychtjsrq, t.cshtrq, t.cshtdd, t.qyztryxm, t.qyztryzw, t.ssxddyfqtryxm, t.dygfztr, t.dygfztrzw, t.dygfzqtryxm, t.zgswjgztryxm, t.zgswjgztryzw, t.zgswjgqtryxm, t.ssxddyfztrqm, t.qdxhxssqbh, t.qtryxm, t.jlrxm, t.csyj_dm, t.sjslid, t.lcslid from np_cshtbwl t where t.yydjsxxxuuid = $yydjsxxxuuid$

select t.* from jc_swjczxbg_fjb t where t.jczxbguuid = $uuid$
select d.* from Np_Dbyydjapsltqyxshsqb d where d.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N')= ?

SELECT QC.DJXH, QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID, QC.ZGSWJ_DM ZGSWJG, QC.ZDJB_DM ZDJB, PFDC.CKDJ, TSSX.TSSXDJ, PFDC.NSXYDJPFDCBUUID, TSSX.NSXYDJTSSXDCBUUID FROM NP_NSXYDJPDQDQC QC LEFT JOIN NP_NSXYDJPFDCB PFDC ON QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID = PFDC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID AND QC.DJXH = PFDC.DJXH LEFT JOIN NP_NSXYDJTSSXDCB TSSX ON QC.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID = TSSX.NSXYDJPDQDQCUUID AND QC.DJXH = PFDC.DJXH WHERE QC.LCSLID = ? AND QC.XYDJPDZT = '1' AND QC.ZFBZ_1='N'

select T.AJLYMXUUID, T.JCAYXXUUID, T.AYLYWSZG, T.AYDJJG_DM, T.AYDJBM_DM, T.AYDJR_DM, T.AYDJRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.AYXXTGFMC, T.JCAYXXLY_DM from jc_ayxx_lymx t where t.jcayxxuuid = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' order by t.aydjrq

select t.YBHTSQDJBUUID, t.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, t.YYDJAPSYRQQ, t.YYDJAPSYRQZ, t.JSSQRQ, t.YDDH, t.DJRXM, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSSJ, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SJTB_SJ, t.SJGLJYLX, t.SJGLJYE, t.FJUUID, t.YBHTJGFFTZSUUID, y.YYDJSXXXUUID, y.YBHTSQDJBUUID, y.YYDJAPZSSQDJBUUID, y.DJXH, y.YYDJAPAJBH, y.YYDJAPAYBH, y.YYDJAPAJMC, y.YYDJQDLX_DM, y.YYDJAJZT_DM, y.YYDJAPLX_DM, y.APSYNDQ, y.APSYNDZ, y.APSYRQQ, y.APSYRQZ, y.NMSQBZ, y.SWJG_DM, y.LCSLID, j.jssqrq zssqsj ,s.shpgjl,y.lrrq from np_ybhtsqdjb t, np_yydjsxxx y, np_yydjapzssqdjb j,np_yydjapshpgjl s where t.YBHTSQDJBUUID = y.YBHTSQDJBUUID(+) and y.yydjsxxxuuid = j.yydjsxxxuuid(+) and y.yydjsxxxuuid = s.yydjsxxxuuid(+) and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or y.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.YYDJAJZT_DM in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.yydjsxxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.yydjapajbh = ?) order by y.lrrq desc
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_GY_FJB T where T.YWZJUUID = $uuid$

SELECT T.QZZXDJBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, D.WFXWBH, D.WFXWBH AJBH, D.DJXH, D.NSRSBH, D.NSRMC, T.WSBH, T.QZZXFS_DM, T.DJRQ, T.DJRY_DM, T.RGDJBZ, T.ZLCSLID, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ from FZ_QZZXDJB T, FZ_SSWFXWDJ D WHERE D.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND (1 = $tj1$ OR D.SSWFXWDJUUID = $uuid$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR D.DJXH = $value2$) AND (1 = $tj3$ OR D.WFXWBH = $value3$) AND (1 = $tj4$ OR D.SSWFXWCLZT_DM = $value4$) AND T.ZLCSLID IS NULL AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.sphwhzqtccuuid,t.zxr,t.zxrq_1,t.bzxrmc,t.cfbcgyy,t.sjbh,t.kybcgyy from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and sfcf=$value1$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq, h.wssdfs_dm, h.wsssdrxm, h.wssdrxm, h.wssddz, h.wssdrq, h.dsr, h.xhrq_1, h.dsly, h.jsly, h.xhr_dm, h.jzrxm_1, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, h.lcslid, h.hdslid, h.sjslid, h.hzdh from zh_sdxx a, zh_sdhz h where a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and h.hzbh in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select s.yydjsxxxuuid, s.djxh, s.yydjapajbh, s.yydjapajmc, s.yydjqdlx_dm, s.yydjajzt_dm, s.yydjaplx_dm, s.swjg_dm, p.apsymynsndqxq, p.apsymynsndqxz, p.yydjapqdrq from np_yydjsxxx s, np_yydjap p where s.yydjsxxxuuid = p.yydjsxxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or s.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.yydjapajbh = ?) and s.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and s.yydjajzt_dm = '301' and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.jcajxxuuid, t.lcslid, x.dzbzdszl_dm, x.sswfajtsclsqbuuid zjuuid, x.zssj zzrq, t.ajjczt_dm ajzt_dm from jc_ajxx t, jc_sswfajtsclsqb x where t.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and x.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.ajjczt_dm = ? and x.bz_1 = 'N' and (t.jcajxxuuid = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and t.ajszjg_dm = ? union all select t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.jcajxxuuid, t.lcslid, x.dzbzdszl_dm, x.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid zjuuid, y.lrrq zzrq, t.ajjczt_dm ajzt_dm from jc_ajxx t, jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb x, jc_zdsswfajtsclpf y where t.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and x.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid = y.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and x.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.ajjczt_dm = ? and (t.jcajxxuuid = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and t.ajszjg_dm = ? and x.bz_1='N'

SELECT S.SSWFXWDJUUID, S.WFXWBH as ajbh, S.WFXWMC as ajmc, S.DJXH, S.NSRSBH, S.NSRMC, T.TZSQDJBUUID, T.DJR_DM, T.DJRQ, T.SQR FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ S,FZ_TZSQDJB T WHERE S.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.SSWFXWDJUUID AND T.SSWFXWDJUUID=?

SELECT SXFZAJYSJGBUUID, JCAJXXUUID, WSBH, JSGAJG, NSRMC, NSRSBH, JCAJBH, AJMC, YSYYFLTK, SXFZQKSM, CZRQ_1, CZRY_DM, SWJG_DM, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ_3, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJSLID, SJGSDQ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, LCSLID, HDSLID, ZSTYBZ, FJ FROM JC_SXFZAJYS_JGB WHERE sxfzajysjgbuuid = $uuid$
update zh_sdxx s set s.sdhzuuid = ?, s.wssdsj = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), s.sdzt_dm = ?, s.xgr_dm = ?, s.xgrq = sysdate where s.sdxxuuid = ? and s.sdzt_dm = ?

SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPZSSQS T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND YYDJSXXXUUID = ?

select t.* from jc_cbyjsyqkb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$
