select f.sswfxwxzcfscbgfbuuid, f.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid, f.xh, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.wfsd_dm, f.wfcy_dm, f.nfkje ncfje, f.msffsdje, f.sjtzsz_dm, f.tzje_2, f.bz, f.yzpzxh, f.djxh, f.zgswskfj_dm, f.zgswjg_dm, f.zszspm_dm, f.lcslid, f.sjslid, f.cflx_dm, f.sswflx_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.cfyj from Fz_Sswfxwxzcfscbgfb f where f.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and f.cbskhfkbguuid is null and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from fz_bkckjds t where t.bkckgluuid = $value1$ and t.zfbz_1= 'N'
select t.* from jc_sswfxwjjdjb t where t.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

SELECT t.XHXSCXSQXXBUUID, t.XSJG_1, t.FJQDJS, t.TBRQ_1, t.TBRXM_1, t.SWSXTZSXSJGUUID, t.SQBH, t.SJDYGNSRCZ, t.SJDYGNSRDZXX, t.CZ, t.DZXX, t.DYGJDQHTBXZQZWMC, t.DYGJDQHTBXZQYWMC, t.SPYJ, t.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, t.SWSXTZSBYSLTZUUID, t.SWSXTZSBZNRTZUUID, t.AJSSGS, t.ZYJDGS, t.DJXH, t.NSRSBH, t.NSRMC, t.FJQD, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSRQ_3, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SQRZDYDFDNSRSBHHDJH, t.SQRZZGDXXDZ, t.SQRZZGLXDH, t.DYDFDZYJDDGDYJYJGS, t.SQRDZYJDDGDYJYJGS, t.SQRQ, t.FJNR, t.SQRZZGYZBM, t.SQRZZGLXRXM, t.SQRZZGDZGSWJG_DM, t.SQRZDYDFDZWMC, t.SQRZDYDFDYWMC, t.SQRZDYDFXXZWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFXXYWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFYZBM, t.SQRZDYDFLXDH, t.SQRZDYDFLXRZWXM, t.SQRZDYDFLXRYWXM, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGZWMC, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGYWMC, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGZWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGYWDZ, t.FJSL, t.SMRXM, t.SLYJ, t.SPYJSM, t.SLR_DM, t.FHR_DM, t.SQYJ, t.SQYJ_1, t.SQSJ, t.SBRQ_2, t.SJSLYYYJDSLR_DM FROM FZ_XHXSCXSQXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = $uuid$

select t.fypjcdjglrbuuid, t.zbuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.fypjcdswh, t.ssjafslx_dm, t.dlrxm_1, t.dlrxb_dm, t.dlrzwzy, t.dlrdz, t.ajyl, t.spzz, t.spfshktslgc, t.dsrzyss, t.fyrdss, t.pjsyjdflfg, t.sspjcdjglx_dm, t.pjjgyw, t.pjxzpcje, t.ssfyfdje, t.dsrsshssql, t.pjcdrq, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq from fz_fypjcdjglrb t where t.zbuuid=$uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from np_gjssqbzsqkbgb b where b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid=?
select count(*) as sl from jc_ajxx a where a.jcajbh=$uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select distinct zb.dzbzdszl_dm, zb.lcslid, zb.swjgjg, zb.zg, zb.nh, zb.wh, zb.wszg, zb.wsbh, zl.dzbzdszlmc fjmc from gy_ws_wszb zb, dm_gy_dzbzdszl zl where zb.dzbzdszl_dm = zl.dzbzdszl_dm and zb.lcslid = $lcslid$ and zb.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and zb.zfr_dm is null
select TBNSTZHYNSSDE from np_ynssdetzxmb where tbnsdcajxxuuid=$value1$ and tzndq=$value2$ and zxtzbz='2'
select t.swry_dm, t.swryxm, t.ssswjg_dm swjg_dm, t.ssswjgmc swjgmc from cs_np_zjk t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.ssswjg_dm not like $uuid$
SELECT T.DJZCLX_DM, T.DJZCLXMC, T.DLBZ, T.ZLBZ, T.SJDJZCLX_DM, T.XYBZ, T.YXBZ FROM DM_DJ_DJZCLX T WHERE T.DJZCLX_DM = ? START WITH T.DJZCLX_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR T.DJZCLX_DM = T.SJDJZCLX_DM

SELECT T.SSWFXWXZCFSCBGUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.DSRQK, T.SWXZCFJY, T.SWXZCFYJ, T.WFSSJYJ, T.WFSD_DM, T.DSRCSSBQK, T.SCRY, T.TZQK, T.SCRQ, T.SCJGSCYJ, T.ZSRQ_3, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSTYBZ, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ FROM FZ_SSWFXWXZCFSCBG T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWXZCFSCBGUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)

select t. XZFYGYWSUUID, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. DJXH, t. NSRMC, t. NSRSBH, t. SWJGJG, t. ZG, t. NH, t. WH, t. XZFYJG_DM, t. XZFYJGMC, t. SLSWJG_DM, t. TZZCRXM, t. TZSJ, t. TZDD, t. BXWDCRXM, t. DJXYNR, t. SQR, t. SLFYRQ, t. SWJG_DM, t. WSZZRQ, t. TZSUUID, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSRQ_3, t. DZBZDSZL_DM, t. LCSWSX_DM, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. XZFYGYXXBUUID, t. ZSTYBZ from FZ_XZFYGYWS t where t.LCSLID= $uuid$ and t.DZBZDSZL_DM=$value1$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid,t.ywzjuuid,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je,t.bz,t.cssl, t.bzxrsysl,t.cqzswh,t.zljdjg,t.typmbmsl,t.shpmdscwsl,t.pgjg,t.pgjz,t.bfsl,t.bfcwpgjg,t.bfdscwyz, t.bfdscwcyjz,t.fhzdywqsmc from fz_sphwhzqtcc_zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$

select y.ajmc, y.jcajbh, y.djxh, t.dbswjg_dm, t.cbjg_dm, t.bgjzrq, t.bgjgts, t.wszzrq, t.cjjzrq, x.dbbh, t.wh, t.nh, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.zdsswfajdbhuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.cbjgswj_Dm, t.dbjgswj_Dm from jc_ajxx y, jc_zdsswfajdbh t, jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb x where x.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and y.dbajbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.dzbzdszl_dm = ?) and x.ZDSSWFAJDBLXUUID = t.ZDSSWFAJDBLXUUID and y.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select t.xgsjvalue from gzl_yx_xgsj t where t.xgsjkey = 'ajly' and t.lcslid = ?
select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.sjswjg_dm, d.swjgbz, d.jgjc_dm, d.swjgjg from DM_GY_SWJG d where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' and d.sjswjg_dm = ?

select count(qkb.swcljdqkbuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120141' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swcljdqkb qkb where qkb.jcajxxuuid = ? and qkb.lcslid = ? and (qkb.zfbz_1 is null or qkb.zfbz_1 = 'N') union all select count(jy.sswfajjtsljyuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120144' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_sswfajjtsljy jy where jy.jcajxxuuid = ? and (jy.zfbz_1 is null or jy.zfbz_1 = 'N') union all select count(slbg.jcslbguuid) as sl, 'BDA1120039' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swjcslbg slbg where slbg.jcajxxuuid = ? and slbg.lcslid = ? and (slbg.zfr_dm is null) union all select count(cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120142' as dzbzdszlDm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jccf, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk cfb where jccf.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and jccf.jcajxxuuid = ? and jccf.lcslid = ? and (jccf.zfbz_1 is null or jccf.zfbz_1 = 'N' )
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_NSDBDQDJB T WHERE T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

SELECT TEMP.SSWFXWDJUUID, TEMP.TZYQSQDJBUUID, TEMP.TZSQDJBUUID, TEMP.SQR, S.WFXWBH AS AJBH, S.WFXWMC AS AJMC, S.DJXH, S.NSRSBH, S.NSRMC FROM (SELECT R.TZYQSQDJBUUID, T.TZSQDJBUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SQR FROM FZ_TZYQSQDJB R, FZ_TZSQDJB T WHERE R.TZSQDJBUUID = T.TZSQDJBUUID AND R.TZYQSQDJBUUID = ?) TEMP, FZ_SSWFXWDJ S WHERE TEMP.SSWFXWDJUUID = S.SSWFXWDJUUID

select t.SNYFHMXBUUID, t.HJXXBUUID, t.SNYFP_DM, t.SNYFPHM, t.SNYKPRQ, t.snyghfdjxh, t.SNYGHFNSRSBH, t.SNYJHGYSL, t.SNYSLXJ, t.RLYFP_DM, t.RLYFPHM, t.RLYKPRQ, t.rlyghfdjxh, t.RLYGHFNSRSBH, t.RLYJHGYSL, t.RLYSLXJ, t.SNYRLYSLHJ, t.SNYWMSSL, t.SNYYMSSL, t.SNYWMSXJ, t.SNYYMSXJ, t.RLYWMSSL, t.RLYYMSSL, t.RLYWMSXJ, t.RLYYMSXJ, t.WMSHJ, t.YMSHJ, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFRQ_1, t.NSRSBH, t.SKSSQQ, t.SKSSQZ, t.NSRMC, t.DJXH, t.lcslid, t.hwmc from ZH_SNYRLYZZSZYFPHC_MXB t where t.lcslid = $uuid$
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_YYDJAPZXTZ T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?

select nspgajxxuuid, pgajbh, djxh, ydwtfx, pgxmmc, pgssqq, pgssqz, xmsssj, pgfxrq, pgfxry_dm, fxydxh, sdhcbz, nspgjy_dm, nspgcljy_dm, lcslid, hdslid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjly_dm, ajzt_dm, ytpgjy_dm from np_nspgajxxb where lcslid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. FCSYJYUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. SYRQ, t. SYRYXM, t. SYNR, t. SJSLID, t. SJGSDQ, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. WSBH from jc_fcsyjy t where t.lcslid = $uuid$
SELECT JCAJBH, AJMC, NSRSBH, NSRMC FROM JC_AJXX WHERE JCAJBH LIKE $jcajbh$
select t.xgsjvalue from gzl_yx_xgsj t where t.xgsjkey = 'ywfwKey1' and t.lcslid = ?

select t.yydjapbtsktzsuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.wszg, t.djxh, t.swjg_dm, t.swjgmc, t.jkswjg_dm, t.wszzrq, t.dygfmc, t.zstzrqq, t.zstzrqz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.lrrq, t.zfbz_1 from np_yydjapbtsktzs t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.yydjapbtsktzsuuid = ?) and t.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.djxh,t.xcnr ,t.zstybz as cljg from zh_xcsqb_wtxc t where t.wtxcuuid=?

select t.SWJCZBLUUID, t.SWJCZBLSQBZBUUID, t.WSBH, t.CZRXM, t.SFZJHM, t.GZDW, t.JCFW, t.JCZZ, t.FZJG, t.YXRQQ, t.YXRQZ, t.SWJCZH, t.FZRQ, t.NSBZ, t.NSRQ, t.JSBS, t.JXRQ from JC_SWJCZBL t where t.GZDW in (#macroparam#) and (t.bz_1 is null or t.bz_1 = 'Y')
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SWXZCFQKBJCCFUUID = ?)
select ly.jcayxxlymc from jc_ayxx_lymx mx, jc_ayxx ay, dm_jc_jcayxxly ly where ay.jcayxxuuid = mx.jcayxxuuid and ly.jcayxxly_dm = mx.jcayxxly_dm and ay.zcajbh is null and ay.jcajxxuuid = ?

select 'BQ' bz ,c.swjgjg || c.zg || '〔' || c.nh || '〕' || c.wh || '号' as jdnrzg from fz_ssbqxxb c where c.ajxxuuid =$uuid$ and c.dzbzdszl_dm=$djxh$ union select 'DB' bz, db.bh as jdnrzg from fz_nsdbs db where nvl(db.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and db.ajxxuuid =$ywzjuuid$

select jcayxxuuid, swjclasqbuuid, lasqr_dm, xarq, wfwzlx_dm, wszt_dm, swjg_dm, sjgsdq, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, lcslid, xafxjlayj, sfdya, jclx_dm, jcbm_dm, wfwzxw_dm, sxsswfxw, jbr_dm, jbrq, ajmc, jcssqjq, jcssqjz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zstybz, wsbh from jc_lasqb where jcayxxuuid = ?

UPDATE ZH_SDXX T SET T.ZFBZ_1 = ?, T.ZFR_DM = ?, T.ZFRQ_1 = SYSDATE, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE, T.XGR_DM = ? WHERE T.SDWSUUID IN (SELECT W.SWXZCFTZTZSUUID FROM FZ_SWXZCFTZTZS W WHERE W.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(W.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.SDZT_DM != '03'

select t.swxzysajdjbuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.ssajbh,t.ssajmc,t.slfymc,t.sslx_dm,t.ysswjg_dm_1,t.sjjgfy,t.sqpcje,t.yglx_dm, t.frhqtzzmc,t.frhqtzzlxdh,t.frhqtzzfddbrfzr,t.frhqtzzfddbrfzrzw,t.frhqtzzzz,t.frhqtzzyb,t.xm,t.nl,t.xb_dm, t.jg,t.mzmc,t.zs,t.gzdw,t.zw,t.ygdlrxm,t.ygdlrxb_dm,t.ygdlrnl,t.ysygdlrzz,t.ygdlrzymc,t.ygdlrdwmc,t.dsrlx_dm,t.dsrmc, t.dsrlxdh,t.dsrfddbrxm,t.dsrfddbrzw,t.dsrdz_1,t.dsryzbm,t.dsrxm_1,t.dsrnl,t.dsrxb_dm,t.dsrjg,t.dsrmzmc,t.dsrzs,t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.dsrgzdwmc,t.dsrdlrzz,t.dsrzw_1,t.dsrdlrmc,t.dsrdlrxb_dm,t.dsrdlrnl,t.dsrdlrzw,t.dsrdlrgzdwmc,t.bgmc,t.bgdz_1,t.bgfddbrxm,t.bgfddbrzw,t.ssqq_1,t.zysshly,t.qsrq_1, t.ssdyjtxzxwmc,t.ssdyjtxzxwzcrq,t.jdystzsrq,t.ktrq,t.hytcyxm,t.djr_dm,t.djrq,t.fjmc,t.sscs,t.ssajzt from fz_swxzysajdjb t where t.ssajbh=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$ and t.sscs=$value2$

select distinct qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid,qkb.bwqkdjbuuid,bw.fwzh_1,jd.bwzh,qkb.zfswjg as swdw,bw.yqhfrq,sh.sbrq_2 as sjsbrq from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb left join np_bwqkdjb bw on qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid left join np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb jd on qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = jd.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid left join np_sjhcbgshb sh on qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = sh.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid where qkb.lhqkdjbuuid=?
select b.* from np_fszlqkb b where b.lcslid = ? and b.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?

SELECT t.XHXSCXSQXXBUUID, t.XSJG_1, t.FJQDJS, t.TBRQ_1, t.TBRXM_1, t.SWSXTZSXSJGUUID, t.SQBH, t.SJDYGNSRCZ, t.SJDYGNSRDZXX, t.CZ, t.DZXX, t.DYGJDQHTBXZQZWMC, t.DYGJDQHTBXZQYWMC, t.SPYJ, t.SWSXTZSSLTZUUID, t.SWSXTZSBYSLTZUUID, t.SWSXTZSBZNRTZUUID, t.AJSSGS, t.ZYJDGS, t.DJXH, t.NSRSBH, t.NSRMC, t.FJQD, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSRQ_3, t.ZSTYBZ, t.SQRZDYDFDNSRSBHHDJH, t.SQRZZGDXXDZ, t.SQRZZGLXDH, t.DYDFDZYJDDGDYJYJGS, t.SQRDZYJDDGDYJYJGS, t.SQRQ, t.FJNR, t.SQRZZGYZBM, t.SQRZZGLXRXM, t.SQRZZGDZGSWJG_DM, t.SQRZDYDFDZWMC, t.SQRZDYDFDYWMC, t.SQRZDYDFXXZWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFXXYWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFYZBM, t.SQRZDYDFLXDH, t.SQRZDYDFLXRZWXM, t.SQRZDYDFLXRYWXM, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGZWMC, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGYWMC, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGZWDZ, t.SQRZDYDFZGSWJGYWDZ, t.FJSL, t.SMRXM, t.SLYJ, t.SPYJSM, t.SLR_DM, t.FHR_DM, t.SQYJ, t.SQYJ_1, t.SQSJ, t.SBRQ_2, t.SLSWJG_DM, t.SJSLYYYJDSLR_DM FROM FZ_XHXSCXSQXXB T WHERE T.NSRSBH= $nsrsbh$ AND T.DYGJDQHTBXZQZWMC = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' ORDER BY SQRQ desc
select t.* from jc_jjnsrsswfxwjljgb t where t.jjnsrsswfxwjljgbuuid = $uuid$

select t.nsqkzcbgbuuid, t.djxh, t.swytrq, t.tbrq, t.ybskhj, t.yjznjhj, t.qysdstzynssde, t.qysdstzynse, t.zzstzlds, t.sbjnrq, t.fddbrhfzrhyzxm, t.zcsm, t.tzjl, t.tbr_dm, t.lcslid, b.pgssqq, b.pgssqz from np_nsqkzcbgb t, np_nspgajxxb b where t.nspgajxxuuid = b.nspgajxxuuid(+) and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select z.* from NP_SWSXTZS_NSRZXBZ z where (1 = #macroparam# or z.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or z.nspgajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or z.zxbztzsuuid = ?) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select z.zxbztzsuuid, z.nspgajxxuuid, z.bzqx, z.slswjg_dm, z.wtms, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, z.qrbz, z.lcslid, a.djxh, a.pgssqq, a.pgssqz, a.sjly_dm from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz z, np_nspgajxxb a, zh_sdxx t where z.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and z.sjslid = t.sdwsuuid and a.djxh in (#macroparam#) and TRUNC(a.pgssqq, 'yyyy') <= trunc(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy') and TRUNC(a.pgssqz, 'yyyy') >= trunc(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy') and z.qrbz = 'N' and t.sdzt_dm = '03' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT DM.DZBZDSZLMC, DM.DZBZDSZL_DM, LJ.XMLZHBEANLLJ, LJ.YWBDSJLJ, ZB.XMLLSH, ZB.YWWSUUID, NVL(NVL(ZB.WSBH, ZB.WSZG),'无') WH, ZB.UUID, LJ.BDLJMC, LJ.CSDMZ_1, LJ.LCBZ, ZB.LRR_DM ZRRXM, ZB.LCSLID, zb.lrrq, zb.wszzgz_dm, zb.jgssswjg_dm FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ LJ, GY_WS_WSZB ZB, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL DM WHERE LJ.DZBZDSZL_DM = ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM = DM.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.YWZJUUID = ? and ZB.Sshj_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND ZB.ZFR_DM IS NULL

SELECT FJMQYHZSBNSSXCLLLHUUID, HJXXBUUID, JCAJXXUUID, WSZG, HJJGSZDZGSWJG_DM, QTJGNSRSBH, QTJGNSRMC, QTJGDZ, QTJGDH, QTJGCZ, HJJGNSRSBH, HJJGNSRMC, NSND_1, QTJGDJXH, HSE, ATHYLRLHDE, QTFFHDE, SYSL, HJJGDJXH, SJZSL, YBJSE, ZNJ, FK_1, QTJGSJSRE, QTJGDLCBFY, QTSX, QTJGSZDZGSWJGLXR_DM, QTJGSZDZGSWJGDZ, QTJGSZDZGSWJGDH, QTJGSZDZGSWJGCZ, QTJGSZDZGSWJGYB, QTJGSZDZGSWJG_DM, WSZZRQ, LCSLID, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, SJTB_SJ, DZBZDSZL_DM, HJJGSZDZGSWJGLXR_DM, HJJGSZDZGSWJGDZ, HJJGSZDZGSWJGDH, HJJGSZDZGSWJGCZ, HJJGSZDZGSWJGYB FROM ZH_FJMQYHZSBNSSXCLLLH WHERE FJMQYHZSBNSSXCLLLHUUID = $fjmqyhzsbnssxclllhuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
delete from jc_fcajqc t where t.fcjhuuid = ?
select t.* from Zh_Tzsxx t where t.sxxxuuid = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?
select * from np_jsssqbclqkb b where b.bwqkdjbuuid=?

SELECT T.SSWFXWJJDJBUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.JJZYNR, T.WSBH, T.JCAYXXUUID, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.JLR_DM, T.JLRQ, T.BJJRDJXH, T.BJJRNSRSBH, T.BJJRMC, T.BJJRDJZCLX_DM, T.BJJRFDDBRXM, T.BJJRFZRXM, T.BJJRDZ, T.BJJRLXDH, T.AJCLYJ_DM, T.NCLYJ, T.ZBR_DM, T.ZBRQ, T.JJCS FROM JC_SSWFXWJJDJB T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$

select t. FCSYJYUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. SYRQ, t. SYRYXM, t. SYNR, t. SJSLID, t. SJGSDQ, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. WSBH from jc_fcsyjy t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select * from Np_Tbnsdczxtz t, Np_Zdydsjxx b, Np_Ynssdetzxmb c where t.tbnsdczxtzuuid = b.ywuuid and b.ywzjuuid = c.sjslid and t.djxh = ? and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = ? and b.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1010038' and b.yxbz ='Y'
select t.ywzjuuid from np_zdydsjxx t where t.ywuuid = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#) and yxbz = 'Y'
select s.* from Fz_Ssbqxxb s where (1 = #macroparam# OR s.ssbqxxbuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.sjslid = ?) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.dbswjg_dm, t.cbjg_dm, t.bgjzrq, t.lxdh, t.bgjgts, t.wszzrq, t.wszzr, t.cjjzrq, x.dbbh bh, t.wh, t.nh, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.zdsswfajdbhuuid, x.zdsswfajdblxuuid, x.ajzbdw_dm, x.djxh, t.dbswry_dm, t.jcajxxuuid, t.jcayxxuuid, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.cbjgswj_Dm, t.dbjgswj_Dm ,t.dbswrymc from jc_zdsswfajdbh t, jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb x where t.zdsswfajdblxuuid = x.zdsswfajdblxuuid and t.zdsswfajdbhuuid = $uuid$

select j.swcljdsuuid, j.jcajxxuuid, j.swjgjg, j.zg, j.nh, j.wh, j.jcfwhnr, j.wfss, j.cljdjyj, j.sjslid, j.wszzrq, j.fyjgmc, j.ywfl_dm, j.cbskhfkbguuid, j.fyjg_dm, j.zsrq_3, j.swjg_dm, j.lcslid, j.xjts from jc_swcljds j where j.jcajxxuuid = ? and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.cbskhfkbguuid is null
select jh.* from jc_jcjh jh where jh.jhnd = $uuid$ and jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm = $value1$ and jh.jhsjlx = $value2$ and nvl(jh.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value3$ and jh.jhsyfw = $value4$ and jh.jcjhlx_dm = $value5$

SELECT SSQBJHFHXCBGUUID, HJXXBUUID, DJXH, JCR_DM, JCRQ_1, XCNR, XCYQ, DCJG, DCJG_1, CLQK, SWJGJBR_DM, NSRSBH, NSRMC, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, WSZZRQ, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, QBBH FROM ZH_SSQBJHFH_XCBG WHERE SSQBJHFHXCBGUUID = $ssqbjhfhxcbguuid$
select t.* from jc_swjczxbg_zxwsb t, jc_swjczxbg bg where t.jczxbguuid = bg.jczxbguuid and bg.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (bg.zfbz_1 is null or bg.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select t.* from jc_lasqb t where t.swjclasqbuuid = $uuid$
select T.GFJCAYXXUUID, T.JCAYBH, T.DJXH, T.DJRQ, T.DJR_DM, T.GFJCAJLY_DM, T.BZ from JC_GFJCAYXX T where T.GFJCAYXXUUID=$uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZYSAJSCBG T WHERE T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

select t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.bh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm, t.nsdbrdz, t.nsdbrlxdh, t.nsdbrkhyh_dm, t.nsdbxs, t.dbsehj, t.nsdbrkhyhzh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.hdslid, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.sjgsdq, t.dbccbdcjzgj, t.dbccdcjzgj, t.dbccdqtccjz, t.dbcczjzgj, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.dbccmc, t.nsdbccmc, t.dbccsl, t.dbcczmmc, t.dbdcczmfs, t.nsdbrfzr, t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc, t.nsdbrsfzjhm, t.nsdbrqsrq, t.nsrfzrqz, t.nsrfzrqzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.jfrsbh, t.yjshbxfje, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.shbxfbz, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.wszzrq, t.jcnsdbtzsuuid, t.tzsuuid, t.zfr_dm, t.ajly, t.swdbgzjsqlcslid from fz_nsdbs t left join fz_nsdbjccl a on t.nsdbsuuid = a.nsdbsuuid where t.ajxxuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.nsdbsuuid is null
select f.* from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk q, jc_zfjgftmx f where f.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid = q.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid and q.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = $uuid$

SELECT T.SWXZZFSQBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.BH, T.SWXZZFTSXW_DM, T.NSYWS_DM, T.SQLY, T.SQDW_DM, T.SQRQ, T.ZLSSQJQ, T.ZLSSQJZ, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.ZSRQ_3, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSTYBZ, T.LCSLID, t.sqr_dm FROM FZ_SWXZZFSQB T WHERE T.SWXZZFSQBUUID = $swxzzfsqbuuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = $zfbz1$
select t.sphwhzqtcczbuuid,t.sphwhzqtccmc,t.jldw_dm,t.sl,t.dj,t.je,t.bz from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc_zb t where t.ywzjuuid=$uuid$

select t.ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.SQYQCCQX, t.JTSQYY, t.XYBGZAP, t.TSCLQX, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID, t.WSZZR, t.SQRQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFRQ_1, t.SQR_DM, t.BZ_1, t.WSBH, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YDWCRQ, y.zaslyqtybz from jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb t, jc_zdsswfajtsclpf y where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $lcslid$ and t.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid = y.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid and (y.zaslyqtybz = '1' or y.zaslyqtybz is null) order by t.lrrq desc

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc, b.sy, a.zgswjg_dm, a.djxh from jc_ajxx a, jc_jcjys b where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' OR b.zfbz_1 IS NULL) and a.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and not exists (select jcajxxuuid from jc_zgjys c where c.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid and nvl(c.zfbz_1,'N')='N')

select t.sqfyqzzxxxbuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.jdsuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.slfymc,t.sqly,t.flyj,t.sqzxjbr_dm, t.sqrq,t.sqfyqzzxnr,t.zsr_dm,t.zsrq_3,t.zstybz,t.swjg_dm,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.nh,t.wh,t.sqzxr_dm,t.sqzxrdz,t.sqzxrfddbrxm,t.sqzxrfddbrzw, t.sqzxrlxdh,t.sqzxryzbm,t.wszzrq,t.bsqzxrdz,t.bsqzxrfddbrxm,t.bsqzxrfddbrzw,t.bsqzxrlxdh,t.bsqzxryzbm,t.fyslqzzxsqwsmc,t.fyslqzzxsqwswh, t.byzxcdswh,t.fyslqzzxsqjg,t.fybyslqzzxsqly,t.fyslwscjrq,t.fysljglrry_dm,t.fysljglrrq,t.xzcfbyzxcddly,t.zjzxcdswh ,t.zjzxdly,t.zjzxcdsxdrq,t.wszg,t.fysljglrryxm from fz_sqfyqzzxxxb t where lcslid=$uuid$

select d.yydjapsqxqjsdjbuuid, d.yydjsxxxuuid, d.swsxtzssltzuuid, d.yyydjapzxqk, d.xqapsyrqq, d.xqapsyrqz, d.sfslbz, d.jssqrq, d.slrxm, d.swjg_dm, d.slrq, d.slnr_2, d.fjuuid, d.yyydjapqdrq, d.wszzswjg_dm, d.wszzrq, d.wszg from np_yydjapsqxqjsdjb d where d.yydjapsqxqjsdjbuuid = ?

SELECT T.CSSBBLUUID, T.DD, T.SY, T.DSRXM, T.DCR, T.JLR_DM, T.CSSBNR, T.WSZZRQ, T.DSRQZ, T.YS, T.QZRQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJSLID, T.SJ, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.SSWFXWDJUUID FROM FZ_CSSBBL T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT XCTZBUUID, SSWFAJXCHFHUUID, SHGLXXBUUID, WTXCUUID, LRXCRQ, PRXCRQ, JCRY, AJH, GDD, QTNR, TZLX, LCSLID, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_XCTZB WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR XCTZBUUID = $uuid$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR SSWFAJXCHFHUUID = $ywzjuuid$)

select z.yxzxwxxuuid, z.yjtxzxwwszg, z.yjtxzxw, z.cxzcjtxzxwyj, z.zcyjtxzxwswjg, z.yjtxzxwzcrq, z.ajbh, z.ajmc, z.cxzcjtxzxwly, z.cxzcjtxzxwyjwszg, z.sqr, z.sqrq from zh_cxzcjtxzxwjgb z where z.cxzcjtxzxwjgbuuid = ?
select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.hsyj_dm, t.tjry_dm, t.tjrq from np_tbnsdcjazjhsyjhzb t where t.tbnsdcjazjhsyjhzbuuid = $uuid$

SELECT T.GSXZGLJG_DM CODE, T.GSXZGLJGMC CAPTION, T.SJGSXZGLJG_DM PCODE FROM DM_GY_GSXZGLJG T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR T.GSXZGLJG_DM = T.SJGSXZGLJG_DM START WITH T.XZQHSZ_DM = ?

SELECT T.TZSQDJBUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SQR, T.SQSX, T.SQRQ, T.DJR_DM, T.DJRQ, T.TZZT, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.SJGSDQ, T.SJTB_SJ FROM FZ_TZSQDJB T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (1 = $tj1$ OR T.TZSQDJBUUID = $uuid$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $sswfxwdjuuid$)

select t.xzzxtzsgsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.jdsuuid, t.tzsuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.xzzxjgmc, t.xzzxccmc, t.flyj, t.xzzxtzsgs1uuid, t.qddchbdccqdmsrmc, t.wszzrq, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcswsx_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.wszg, t.swsxtzswszg, t.sshj_dm, t.sphqtccmc, t.pmbmswjg_dm from fz_xzzxtzs t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t1.SWJCZBLUUID, t1.SWJCZBLSQBZBUUID, t1.WSBH, t1.CZRXM, t1.SFZJHM, t1.GZDW, t1.JCFW, t1.JCZZ, t1.FZJG, t1.YXRQQ, t1.YXRQZ, t1.SWJCZH, t1.FZRQ, t1.NSBZ, t1.NSRQ, t1.JSBS, t1.JXRQ, t1.BZ_1, t1zb.ZP, t1zb.FJUUID from jc_swjczbl t1, jc_swjczblsqb_zb t1zb where t1.swjczblsqbzbuuid = t1zb.swjczblsqbzbuuid and t1zb.spbz = 'Y' and t1zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (t1.jsbs is null or t1.jsbs = 'N') and t1.bz_1 = 'Y' and t1.fzjg = ? and t1.jczz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR t1.yxrqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t1.yxrqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t1.swjczh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t1.czrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t1.gzdw = ?)
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWJCBG T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(T.YXBZ, 'Y') = 'Y'

select bw.fwzh_1,jd.bwzh,fkb.nsrsbh,fkb.nsrmc,fkb.sz_dm,fkb.bsse,fkb.znj,fkb.fk_1,fkb.hcjgsm,jd.yqhfrq,fkb.sjsbrq,fkb.fj,fkb.bz from np_ssqbhcjgfkb fkb,np_bwqkdjb bw, np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb jd where fkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = jd.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid and fkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid and fkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = ?
DELETE FROM FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK T WHERE T.SWXZCFQKBJCCFUUID IN (SELECT A.SWXZCFQKBJCCFUUID FROM FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF A WHERE A.CBSKHFKBGUUID = ?)
DELETE FROM FZ_SHBXFFZMXXXB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = ? AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SHBXFXZCFJDS T WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR T.SHBXFXZCFJDSUUID = $uuid$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $sswfxwdjuuid$) AND (1 = $tj3$ OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, $zfbzmrz$) = $zfbz$) AND (1 = $tj5$ OR T.Sjslid = $value5$)
select x.xzzxtzsgsuuid From fz_xzzxtzs x, zh_sdxx s where x.jdsuuid= $jdsuuid$ AND s.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1220113' and s.sdwsuuid = x.xzzxtzsgsuuid and s.sdzt_dm = '03'

select d.dbyydjapqsbauuid, d.yydjapajbh, d.dz, d.jd_1, d.lfh, d.fjh, d.lc_1, d.xzqhqx, d.xzqhds, d.xzqhsf, d.email, d.yzbm, d.nsrzyjyhd, d.ssqyjtmc, d.apsjgljyje, d.ndyysr, d.yylr, d.apsjglfszgj_dm, d.zzkgqyszgj, d.zjkgqyszgj_dm, d.ddbyydjapzjymshzj, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.yydjapqdrq, d.apsyrqq, d.apsyrqz, d.skfgj_dm, d.zfbz_1 , d.djxh from NP_DBYYDJAPQSBA d where d.yydjapajbh = ? and d.zfbz_1= ?
select t.sjfhfpuuid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid from fz_sjfhfp t where t.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$

select T.GFJCAJXXUUID, T.GFJCAYXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.GFJCAJZT_DM, T.JCAJBH , T.AJMC, T.JCBM_DM, T.ZBR_DM, T.ZBRQ, T.FPRQ, T.JCRY, T.JSRY_DM, T.BLSX, T.JSRQ, T.DJXH from JC_GFJCAJXX T where T.GFJCAJXXUUID = $uuid$

select t.GFJCJCXXUUID, t.GFJCAJXXUUID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.ZCYJ, t.JCFKSSQX, t.JFJSHJ, t.YJFEHJ, t.YJFEHJ_1, t.QJFEHJ, t.JBYLBXFJFJSXJ, t.JBYLBXFYJFEXJ, t.JBYLBXFYJFEXJ_1, t.JBYLBXFQJFEXJ, t.JBYLBXFDWYJFE, t.JBYLBXFDWYJFE_1, t.JBYLBXFDWQJFE, t.JBYLBXFGRYJFE, t.JBYLBXFGRYJFE_1, t.JBYLBXFGRQJFE, t.SYBXFJFJSXJ, t.SYBXFYJFEXJ, t.SYBXFYJFEXJ_1, t.SYBXFQJFEXJ, t.SYBXFDWYJFE, t.SYBXFDWYJFE_1, t.SYBXFDWQJFE, t.SYBXFGRYJFE, t.SYBXFGRYJFE_1, t.SYBXFGRQJFE, t.JBYLBXFQFJSXJ, t.JBYLBXFYJFEXJ_2, t.JBYLBXFYJFEXJ_3, t.JBYLBXFQJFEXJ_1, t.JBYLBXFDWYJFE_2, t.JBYLBXFDWYJFE_3, t.JBYLBXFDWQJFE_1, t.JBYLBXFGRYJFE_2, t.JBYLBXFGRYJFE_3, t.JBYLBXFGRQJFE_1, t.GSBXFYJFE, t.GSBXFYJFE_1, t.GSBXFQJFE, t.SYBXFYJFE, t.SYBXFYJFE_1, t.SYBXFQJFE, t.CZWT, t.GFJCJLWSZZRQ, t.LCSLID, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFRQ_1, t.DJXH, t.SJSLID from JC_GFJCJCXX t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select count(jds.swcljdsuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120037' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swcljds jds where jds.jcajxxuuid = ? and jds.lcslid = ? and (jds.zfbz_1 is null or jds.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(jl.swjcjluuid) as sl, 'BDA1120036' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swjcjl jl where jl.jcajxxuuid = ? and (jl.zfbz_1 is null or jl.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(tqs.zdswajsltqsuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120044' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_zdswajsltqs tqs where tqs.jcajxxuuid = ? and (tqs.zfbz_1 is null or tqs.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(cfjds.swxzcfjdsuuid) as sl, 'BDA1220090' as dzbzdszlDm from fz_swxzcfjds cfjds where cfjds.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and cfjds.lcslid = ? and (cfjds.zfbz_1 is null or cfjds.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(bycfjds.byswxzcfjdsuuid) as sl, 'BDA1220084' as dzbzdszlDm from fz_byswxzcfjds bycfjds where bycfjds.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and bycfjds.lcslid = ? and (bycfjds.zfbz_1 is null or bycfjds.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(qkb.swcljdqkbuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120141' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_swcljdqkb qkb where qkb.jcajxxuuid = ? and qkb.lcslid = ? and (qkb.zfbz_1 is null or qkb.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120142' as dzbzdszlDm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jccf, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk cfb where jccf.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = cfb.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and jccf.jcajxxuuid = ? and jccf.lcslid = ? and (jccf.zfbz_1 is null or jccf.zfbz_1 = ?) union all select count(sswf.sswfajjtsljyuuid) as sl, 'BDA1120144' as dzbzdszlDm from jc_sswfajjtsljy sswf where sswf.jcajxxuuid = ? and (sswf.zfbz_1 is null or sswf.zfbz_1 = ?)
update np_skjsb j set j.yzpzxh = null ,j.xgr_dm = ? ,j.xgrq = sysdate where j.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.ynsehdtzsuuid in (#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM NP_DBYYDJAPQSZFQKB T WHERE T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ? AND T.LCSLID = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.Hdslid = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

SELECT T.SWCLJDSUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.CBSKHFKBGUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.JCFWHNR, T.WFSS, T.CLJDJYJ, T.XJTS, T.FYJGMC, T.JKDD, T.WSZZRQ, T.SWJG_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.FYJG_DM, T.SJTB_SJ FROM JC_SWCLJDS T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')='N'
select t.* from JC_FCJH t where t.FCJHUUID = $uuid$

select n.uuid, n.syjuuid, n.fdmc_1, n.lbcj_dm, n.swjg_dm from (select * from cs_fz_flfgwh t where t.syjuuid is not null order by t.lbcj_dm, to_number(fdmc_1) asc) n union all select m.uuid, m.syjuuid, m.fdmc_1, m.lbcj_dm, m.swjg_dm from cs_fz_flfgwh m where m.syjuuid is null

select t.swxzzfsqbuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.bh, t.swxzzftsxw_dm, t.nsyws_dm, t.sqly, t.sqdw_dm, t.sqrq, t.zlssqjq, t.zlssqjz, t.spswjg_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.zsrq_3, t.zsr_dm, t.zstybz, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid from fz_swxzzfsqb t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $zfbz1$
select t.* from jc_swcljdqkb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.xzzxtzsgsuuid,t.swsxtzswszg,t.wszg,t.wszzrq,t.dzbzdszl_dm,t.qddchbdccqdmsrmc,t.flyj,t.xzzxccmc,t.xzzxjgmc,t.wh,t.nh,t.zg,t.swjgjg,t.swjg_dm,t.tzsuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.xzzxtzsgsuuid from fz_xzzxtzs t where t.xzzxtzsgsuuid=$value1$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value2$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

select s.swxzysajdjbuuid as ajuuid, s.nsrsbh, s.nsrmc, s.ssajbh as ajbh, s.ssajmc as ajmc, s.ssdyjtxzxwzcrq as yjtxzxwzcrq, s.ysswjg_dm_1 as zcyjtxzxwswjgDm, s.ssdyjtxzxwmc as yjtxzxw, s.ssdyjtxzxwmc as yjtxzxwwszg, j.fypjcdjglrbuuid as jdbuuid, j.fypjcdswh as cxzcjtxzxwyjwszg, j.djxh, '法院判决结果录入' as cxzcjtxzxwyj from FZ_SWXZYSAJDJB s,Fz_Fypjcdjglrb j where s.swxzysajdjbuuid = j.zbuuid and j.sspjcdjglx_dm in ('02','03','04','05') and (s.zfbz_1 is null or s.zfbz_1 = 'N') and (j.zfbz_1 is null or j.zfbz_1 = 'N') and s.djxh = ?

select t.sswfxwdjuuid, t.wfxwbh, t.wfxwmc, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.sswflx_dm, t.wfss, t.ssqjq_1, t.ssqjz_1, t.sswfxwclzt_dm, t.djjg_dm, t.djrq, t.djr_dm, t.sfsbfwf, t.sswfsd_dm, t.rgdjbz, t.jcajbz, t.ajly, t.zjlx_dm_1, t.zjshry_dm, t.zjshrq, t.fzczjyy, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from fz_sswfxwdj t,dj_nsrxx nsr where (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfxwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.djr_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.rgdjbz, 'N') = ? and nsr.zgswskfj_dm=? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm=?) and t.djxh=nsr.djxh and t.sswfxwclzt_dm in ('01')

select b.* from np_yydjap b left join np_yydjsxxx a on b.yydjsxxxuuid =a.yydjsxxxuuid where b.yydjapqdrq is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.djxh = $yydjapuuid$ and a.YYDJAPLX_DM = $Sjgljylx$

SELECT T.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.NCFJDRQ_1, T.SWXZCFYJ, T.CFJDNR, T.WSZZRQ, T.SWJG_DM, T.NCFJE, T.WFSSJZJ FROM FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS T WHERE T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $sswfxwdjuuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWXZCFSCBGFB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWXZCFSCBGFBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWXZCFSCBGUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)

select t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. AJXXUUID, t. AJLY, t. AJBH_1, t. AJMC, t. DJXH, t. NSRSBH, t. NSRMC, t. XZJJSQFS_DM, t. SQRLB_DM, t. SQRXM, t. SQRSFZJHM, t. SQRXB_DM, t. SQRNL, t. SQRMZMC, t. SQRJG, t. SQRZS, t. SQRYZBM, t. SQRLXDH, t. SQRGZDWMC, t. SQRZW, t. SQRFRHQTZZMC, t. SQRFRHQTZZLXDH, t. SQRFRHQTZZDZ, t. SQRFRHQTZZYZBM, t. SQRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRXM, t. SQRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRZW, t. SQRDLRMC, t. SQDLRXB_DM, t. SQDLRNL, t. SQRDLRZZ, t. SQRDLRGZDWMC, t. SQRDLRZW, t. DSRLX_DM, t. DSRXM_1, t. DSRSFZJHM, t. DSRXB_DM, t. DSRNL, t. DSRMZMC, t. DSRJG, t. DSRZS, t. DSRYZBM, t. DSRLXDH, t. DSRGZDWMC, t. DSRZW_1, t. DSRFRHQTZZMC, t. DSRFRHQTZZLXDH, t. DSRFRHQTZZDZ, t. DSRFRHQTZZYZBM, t. DSRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRXM, t. DSRFRHQTZZFRDBFZRZW, t. DSRDLRMC, t. DSRDLRXB_DM, t. DSRDLRNL, t. DSRDLRZZ, t. DSRDLRGZDWMC, t. DSRDLRZW, t. BSQRMC_1, t. BSQRFZRXM, t. BSQRDZ, t. BSQRYZBM, t. BSQRLXDH, t. FYSQDYJTXZXWMC, t. JTXZXWZL, t. FYSQDYJTXZXWWSZG, t. FYSQDYJTXZXWZCRQ, t. FYSQDYJTXZXWZCYJ, t. FYQQ, t. ZYSSHLY, t. XZFYJG_DM, t. XZFYJGMC, t. XZFYJGDZ, t. SQRQ, t. SDFYSQRQ, t. SFYQTJGYFZS, t. AJLYLX_DM, t. YAJBH, t. YAJMC, t. ZSJGMC_1, t. ZSRQ_1, t. DJR, t. DJRQ, t. SQR, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. SFJGFYJD, t. SSHJ_DM, t. FYAJZT, t. BHFYSQZT, t. TSZT, t. ZLSLZT,t.dsrnsrsbh from FZ_XZFYSQDJB t where t.fyajzt in ('0','4','5','1') and t.AJBH_1=$uuid$
select t.nsdbsuuid ,t.dbsehj,t.nsdbrsbh,t.nsdbrmc,t.nsdbrdjxh,t.nsdbxs,t.nsdbnsqx from fz_nsdbs t where t.ajxxuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$
select t.hsyj_dm, t.hsyjsm from np_tbnsdcjazjhsyjjlb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = ?
select a.bgly from jc_bgsxsqb a where a.jcajxxuuid = ?

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZGSWJG_DM FROM JC_AJXX T, JC_AYXX AY WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = AY.JCAJXXUUID AND AY.JCAYXXUUID = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.zdsswfajccfauuid, t.zdsswfajdbhuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.fabh, t.ajzbdw_dm, t.ndajcbry, t.ccfajtnr, t.sfxydcxjxccb, t.bgswjg_dm, t.lxdh, t.fabgrq, t.lxr_dm, y.nh, y.wh, y.zg, y.swjgjg, z.djxh, z.dbbh from jc_zdsswfajccfa t, jc_zdsswfajdbh y, jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb z where t.zdsswfajdbhuuid = y.zdsswfajdbhuuid and y.zdsswfajdblxuuid = z.zdsswfajdblxuuid and t.sjslid = $uuid$

select * from np_nspgajxxb a where a.ajszjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.swjg_dm = t.sjswjg_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.pgajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.pgssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.pgssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select T.SSBQXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.YUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.DJCKJRJGMC, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.DJCKSJ, T.DJCKZH, T.WSZZRQ, T.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, T.DJCKZHYE, T.QSRXM_1, T.YHQSRQ, T.QSDWQZRQ, T.DJCKXXJE, T.XQJNSKQX, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.CFKYRQ, T.BQBDWMC, T.BQCS, T.JCSSBQCSLY, T.JCDJCKRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.SSBQFLYJ, T.BLJCCFKYSXSX, T.JCBZ, T.DJCKJE, T.DJCKDXJE from fz_ssbqxxb t where t.SSBQXXBUUID=$uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 ='N'

select t.DYKBFPTHQDUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SWJG_DM, t.THRQ_1, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFRQ_1, t.SJSLID, t.ZJTGDWGRQZ, t.NSRJBRQZ, t.SWJGJBRQZ, t.SWJGQZ, t.WSBH from jc_dykbfpthqd t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select distinct lh.lhqkdjbuuid, lh.qbbh, lh.lhf, lh.swrq, bw.fwzh_1, bw.fwmc_1, bw.yqhfrq, bw.bwqkdjbuuid, b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid, case when qkb.czzt = 35 or qkb.czzt = 60 or qkb.czzt = 70 then qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid else qkb.jsssqbclqkbuuid end as jsssqbclqkbuuid from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb left join np_lhqkdjb lh on qkb.lhqkdjbuuid = lh.lhqkdjbuuid left join np_bwqkdjb bw on qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid left join np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb b on qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid where qkb.czzt in (#macroparam#) and lh.hjclyj = '01' and (1 = #macroparam# or lh.qbbh = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwzh_1 = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwmc_1 = #macroparam#) and (qkb.jsswjg_dm = ? or qkb.clswjg_dm = ?)
select s.* from np_yjjcajspb s where (1 = #macroparam# or s.uuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.lcslid = ?) and s.bguuid = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select distinct swjg.swjg_dm from qx_jggw_swrysf gwsf, qx_swjg_gw swjg, dm_qx_swrysf sf,qx_gw_xtgn gwxtgn where gwsf.gwxh = swjg.gwxh and sf.swrysf_dm = gwsf.swrysf_dm and gwxtgn.gw_dm=swjg.gw_dm and sf.yxbz = 'Y' and swjg.yxbz = 'Y' and gwsf.yxbz = 'Y' and sf.swry_dm=? and gwxtgn.xtgn_dm =?

select t. FCBGUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. FCSJQ, t. FCSJZ, t. FCQK, t. FCBGBH, t. BGRQ_1, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. SJSLID, t. YJCAJXXUUID, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. FCYJ, t. WSBH, t. JBQK, t. FCYJJJY, t. FCZZQM, t. FCZYQM, t. ZYQZRQ, t. ZZQZRQ, t. QTQKSM from jc_fcbg t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select t.zdsswfajtsclsqbuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.sqyqccqx, t.jtsqyy, t.xybgzap, t.tsclqx, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.sswfajtsclsqbuuid, t.wszzr, t.sqrq, t.sqr_dm, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.ydwcrq, t.wsbh from jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb t where t.lcslid = $uuid$

select t.* from fz_sswfxwdj t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfxwbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.djrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.djr_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.rgdjbz, 'N') = ? and t.sswfxwclzt_dm in ('01')

select t.kjsskxtzsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.jdsuuid, t.cjwsswjg_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.kjskqx, t.jkpzfs, t.swjg_dm, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.sphm, t.wszzrq, t.ckzhye, t.qsrxm_1, t.qsrq_3, t.qsdwqzrq, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjslid, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from fz_kjsskxtzs t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
UPDATE FZ_SWXZCFTZTZS T SET T.YXBZ = ?, T.XGRQ = SYSDATE, T.XGR_DM = ? WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
update NP_GXSSYBTMXB m set m.yzpzxh = null, m.xgrq = sysdate, m.xgr_dm = ? where m.yzpzxh is not null and m.tbnsdctztzsuuid in (#macroparam#)

select a.*, h.wsssdrxm, h.hzbh, h.hzzzrq from zh_sdxx a left join zh_sdhz h on a.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.lrr_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.sdwsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.lcslid is null

select t.SWYTTZSUUID, t.NSPGAJXXUUID, t.PGAJBH, t.DJXH, t.SSYD, t.YTSJ, t.TGZL, t.LXR_DM, t.LXDH, t.YTDD, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.SWJG_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.QTRYXM, t.QTSM, t.SY, t.YJ_1 from np_swyttzs t where nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.swyttzsuuid = ?

SELECT TZZZTZSUUID, SSWFXWDJUUID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, WSZZRQ, SWJG_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, HDSLID, LCSLID, SJSLID, SJGSDQ, ZFR_DM, SY, YJ_1, ZZLY_1, DZBZDSZL_DM FROM FZ_SWSXTZS_TZZZTZ WHERE TZZZTZSUUID = $tzzztzsuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
update fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk jc set jc.yzpzxh = ?, jc.xgr_dm = ?, jc.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(jc.YZPZXH, 0) = 0 and jc.swxzcfjdsuuid = ?

select (case when t.cxrmc is not null then t.cxrmc else t.cxrxm end) as cxrmc, t. AY, t. SLSJQ, t. SLSJZ, t. TLDD, t. ZCRXM, t. JLR, t. FYJTTLBLUUID, t. TLJLYJD, t. WSZZRQ, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ from FZ_XZFYAJJTTLBL t where t.FYJTTLBLUUID = $uuid$
SELECT T.SJHY_DM PCODE, Rtrim(T.HY_DM) CODE, T.HYMC CAPTION, T.XLBZ FROM DM_GY_HY T WHERE T.SJHY_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.HY_DM
select t.sjglfxxuuid, t.ybhtsqdjbuuid, t.yydjapzssqdjbuuid, t.yydjapuuid, t.sjglfmc, t.sjtb_sj, t.ssxddyf, t.gjhdqsz_dm from np_sjglfxx t where t.ybhtsqdjbuuid = $uuid$

SELECT T.UUID, T.SWJG_DM, SUBSTR(T.SSWFSD_DM, 0, 2) SSWFLX_DM, T.SSWFSD_DM, T.WFCD_DM, T.WFCDPDBZ_DM, T.WFCDPDBZLJF, T.WFCDPDBZZ, T.WFXWZTXZ, T.FKJSFS_DM, T.FKJEXX, T.FKJESX, T.FKBLXX, T.FKBLSX, T.JSQXLX_DM, T.TS, T.RFKJE, T.ZGFKJE, T.JKLX_DM_1, T.WFQJ, T.CFJZ, T.SFGZ, T.SFLSB, T.SFSWBF FROM CS_FZ_XZCFCLQ T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ?

SELECT T.CSSBBLUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SJ, T.DD, T.SY, T.DSRXM, T.DCR, T.JLR_DM, T.CSSBNR, T.WSZZRQ, T.DSRQZ, T.YS, T.QZRQ, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ FROM FZ_CSSBBL T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.CSSBBLUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.LCSWSX_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)
select distinct m.yzpzxh, m.gxssybtmxbuuid, m.tbnsdctztzsuuid, m.tbnsdcajxxuuid from NP_GXSSYBTMXB m where m.tbnsdctztzsuuid in (#macroparam#) and m.yzpzxh is not null
select t.* from jc_swcljds t where t.jcajxxuuid= $uuid$
select t.* from zh_sdhz t where t.sdhzuuid = $sdhzuuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
select t.skwgqyzgjmgdqrtzsuuid, t.wszg, t.qdskwgqyzjmgdrq, t.djxh, t.skwqymc, t.wszzrq, t.swjg_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from np_skwgqyzgjmgdqrtzs t where t.djxh = ?

select jl.ssfxydbguuid,jl.bguuid,jl.rwuuid,jl.sjslid,jl.lcslid,jl.jcrq_1,jl.jcssqq,jl.jcssqz,jl.zjcry,jl.fjcry, jl.ytrxm,jl.ytnr,jl.ytrq,jl.ytqywtsm,jl.ytzdsyry,jl.ytzdzcshry,jl.zcshjl, jl.syjg,jl.syrq,jl.zsyr,jl.fsyr,jl.syfs,jl.syyj,jl.lrr_dm,jl.lrrq, b.fxydxh, b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.djxh,b.shyj_dm, b.shr_dm,b.ydczswjg_dm,b.rwwcsx,b.atshhsyj,b.atshhsr,b.atshhsyjsm,b.atshzsyj, b.atshzsr,b.atshzsyjsm,b.ytfs,b.ytjhsjq,b.ytjhsjz,b.zytrxm,b.fytrxm, b.pgssqq,b.pgssqz,b.ajzt_dm,b.ydbm_dm,b.ydczry_dm,b.ydxfswjg_dm,b.ydxfsj,b.ydxfph,b.shsfxyzs,b.pgajbh,b.fxydfkuuid from NP_SSFXYDBG b, NP_SSFXYDBGJL jl where b.bguuid=jl.bguuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and nvl(jl.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and jl.bguuid =? order by jl.lrrq desc

SELECT BQ.SSBQXXBUUID, BQ.AJXXUUID, BQ.YUUID, BQ.SWJG_DM, BQ.SWJGJG, BQ.ZG, BQ.NH, BQ.WH, BQ.DJCKJRJGMC, BQ.SSBQFLYJ, BQ.SPSWJG_DM, BQ.DJCKSJ, BQ.DJCKZH_1, BQ.DJCKJE, BQ.WSZZRQ, BQ.SSBQCSJDSWSZG, BQ.DJCKZHYE, BQ.QSRXM_1, BQ.YHQSRQ, BQ.QSDWQZRQ, BQ.DJCKXXJE, BQ.DJCKDXJE, BQ.XQJNSKQX, BQ.FYJG_DM, BQ.FYJGMC, BQ.CFKYRQ, BQ.BQBDWMC, BQ.BQCS, BQ.JCSSBQCSLY, BQ.JCDJCKRQ, BQ.BLJCCFKYSXSX, BQ.JCBZ, BQ.DZBZDSZL_DM, BQ.LCSLID, BQ.HDSLID, BQ.SJSLID, BQ.ZFRQ_1, BQ.ZFR_DM, BQ.ZFBZ_1, BQ.LRRQ, BQ.LRR_DM, BQ.XGRQ, BQ.XGR_DM, BQ.SJGSDQ, (CASE BQ.DZBZDSZL_DM WHEN 'BDA1220102' THEN BQ.DJCKSJ WHEN 'BDA1220101' THEN BQ.CFKYRQ ELSE BQ.WSZZRQ END) SSBQRQ, SQB.SQRQ, (BQ.SWJGJG || '' || BQ.ZG || '【' || BQ.NH || '】' || BQ.WH || '号') AS WSZG FROM FZ_SSBQXXB BQ, FZ_SWXZZFSQB SQB WHERE BQ.AJXXUUID = SQB.AJXXUUID AND BQ.LCSLID = SQB.LCSLID AND NVL(BQ.JCBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(BQ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND BQ.AJXXUUID = ? AND BQ.DZBZDSZL_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select t.tqswjg_dm swjgDm, t.tqswjgmc swjgmc from NP_TBNSDCZJSP t group by t.tqswjg_dm, t.tqswjgmc

select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg d where exists (select s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where exists (select j.sjswjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j where j.swjg_dm =? and j.sjswjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) and s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' and s.swjg_dm = d.sjswjg_dm) and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y'

select qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid, qc.djxh, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zdjb_dm, dc.swdjqkhj, dc.nssbqkhj, dc.zbpzglhj, dc.skjnhj, dc.wfqkhj, dc.pfhj, dc.ckdj, tssx.tssxdj from np_nsxydjpdqdqc qc, np_nsxydjpfdcb dc, np_nsxydjtssxdcb tssx where qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid = dc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid and qc.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid = tssx.nsxydjpdqdqcuuid and qc.lcslid=? and dc.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT F.SSWFXWDJUUID AJXXUUID, F.WFXWBH AJBH, F.WFXWMC AJMC, F.DJXH, F.NSRSBH, F.NSRMC, '法制' AJLX FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ F, FZ_SSBQXXB B WHERE F.SSWFXWDJUUID = B.AJXXUUID AND F.DJXH = $value1$ AND (1 = $tj2$ OR B.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value2$) AND NVL(F.JCAJBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.JCBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(F.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION SELECT J.JCAJXXUUID AJXXUUID, J.JCAJBH AJBH, J.AJMC, J.DJXH, J.NSRSBH, J.NSRMC, '稽查' AJLX FROM JC_AJXX J, FZ_SSBQXXB B WHERE J.JCAJXXUUID = B.AJXXUUID AND J.DJXH = $value3$ AND (1 = $tj4$ OR B.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value4$) AND NVL(B.JCBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(T.JCAJBZ, 'N') = 'N' AND T.DJJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSRMC LIKE ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WFXWBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WFXWMC LIKE ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFLX_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFSD_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSQJQ_1 >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSQJZ_1 < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND T.DJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.DJRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1

SELECT T.JCSSQJQ JCRQQ, T.JCSSQJZ JCRQZ, (case when A.WFSS is null then B.WFSS else A.WFSS || ';' || B.WFSS end)as WFSS, A.SWCLJDSUUID, A.CLJDJYJ CLYJ, A.CLJDJYJ CLJD, B.SWXZCFJDSUUID, B.SWXZCFYJ CFYJ, B.CFJD, B.YJFKJE FROM JC_AJXX T left join JC_SWCLJDS A on T.JCAJXXUUID = A.JCAJXXUUID left join FZ_SWXZCFJDS B on T.JCAJXXUUID = B.SSWFXWDJUUID WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR A.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND (B.ZFR_DM IS NULL) ANd T.JCAJXXUUID = ?
update fz_zlxqgzxxb a set a.xhrq = null,a.sfgz = null,a.zlxqgzzt_dm = ?, a.xgr_dm = ?, a.xgrq = ? where a.zlxqgzxxbuuid = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
update zh_sdxx s set s.sdzt_dm = ?, s.xgr_dm = ?, s.xgrq = sysdate where s.sdxxuuid = ? and s.sdzt_dm = ?
select c.qzfwname,c.servicename,c.czxk,c.sfmrqdlc from cs_np_zdydsj c where c.xtgn_dm=? and c.dzbzdszl_dm=? and c.yxbz='Y'

select a.rwuuid, a.fxydxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.djxh, a.ydczswjg_dm, a.ydbm_dm, a.ydczry_dm, a.qzhduuid, a.fxdj, a.rwwcsx, a.ydxfswjg_dm, a.ydxfsj, a.ydxfph, a.ajzt_dm, a.zfbz_1 from NP_ATSHRWFPB a where nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.rwuuid=?
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_YSQBYSLTZ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Tzsuuid = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
select t.* from jc_zdswajsltqs t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N') order by t.lrrq desc

select t.SSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.WSBH, t.AJTSCLLY, t.AJTSCLYJ, t.SQYQJZRQ, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.SQR_DM, t.SQRQ, t.LCSLID, t.yjcwcrq from JC_Sswfajtsclsqb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = $lcslid$ and t.sswfajtsclsqbuuid = $uuid$

select y.ajmc,y.jcajbh,t.dbswjg_dm,t.cbjg_dm,t.bgjzrq,t.bgjgts,t.wszzrq,t.cjjzrq,x.dbbh,t.wh,t.nh,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.zdsswfajdbhuuid,y.djxh, t.jcajxxuuid from jc_ajxx y,jc_zdsswfajdbh t,jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb x where x.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and y.dbajbz ='Y' and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and x.ZDSSWFAJDBLXUUID= t.ZDSSWFAJDBLXUUID and y.ajszjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select * from np_zrdjdcyqtgxgzlsqdjb n where n.zrdjtcyqtgxgzlsqdjbuuid = $uuid$
select q.gjssqbdjbuuid, z.dygtgzdqbqkbuuid, q.qbbh, z.skfxm, z.fkfxm, z.nszznd, z.zflx from np_gjssqbdjb q, np_xdygtgzdqbqkb z where q.gjssqbdjbuuid = z.gjssqbdjbuuid and q.gjssqbdjbuuid = ?
select t.bkckjdsuuid, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh,t.wszzrq from fz_bkckjds t where t.bkckgluuid = $uuid$

select a.ajbh ,a.sffj ,a.swjcajuuid from JC_SWJCAJ a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.jcajxxuuid = ? and a.swjcajuuid not in (select b.swjcajuuid from JC_AJJY b where (b.zstybz is null or b.zstybz = 'Y') and (1 = (#macroparam#) or b.ajjyuuid != ?))
select b.bguuid, b.atshzsyj, b.ytgllcslid, b.sdhclcslid, b.sswfxwdjuuid, b.ajzt_dm from np_ssfxydbg b where b.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select j.* from jc_swcljds j where (1 = #macroparam# or j.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.jcajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.swcljdsuuid = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. TBNSTZFHXCBGUUID, t. XCHTBNSTZUUID, t. YM, t. YS, t. TBNSTZFHSWSXXCHFHUUID, t. JCAJXXUUID, t. DJXH, t. JCR_DM, t. JCRQ_1, t. XCNR, t. XCYQ, t. DCJG, t. DCJG_1, t. CLQK, t. SWJGJBR_DM, t. WSZZRQ, t. JCAJBH, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1 from ZH_TBNSTZFH_XCBG t where t.TBNSTZFHXCBGUUID = $uuid$
select t.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, t.sswfxwdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.sjslid, t.hdslid, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.yuuid from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.yuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.ajmc, a.jcajbh, b.swjcajuuid, b.ljswjg_dm, b.ajjs, b.jm, b.ajbh, b.ajbgqx, b.mj_dm, b.sffj, b.ljrq, b.ajlb from jc_ajxx a, jc_swjcaj b where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid and b.swjg_dm in(#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ajmc like ?) and nvl(b.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.xhbz,'N') = 'N'

select t.* from jc_cbyjsyqkb t, jc_swcljdqkb qkb where t.swcljdqkbuuid = qkb.swcljdqkbuuid and t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(qkb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null)
update JC_SWJCBG t set t.yxbz = ? where (t.jcajxxuuid = ? or t.swjcbguuid = ?) and t.zfbz_1 <> 'Y'

select nspgmx.zbmc_2, nspgmx.zbz, nspgmx.tsxx, nspgmx.djxh, nspgmx.fxydxh, nspgmx.fxmxxh, nspgmx.fxxxxh, nspgmx.nsrssswjg_dm, nspgmx.nsrssswjgmc, nspgmx.zb_dm_1, mxfk.zbyxx from td_fxmx_nspgb nspgmx, TD_FXYD_MXFKB mxfk where nspgmx.fxmxxh = mxfk.fxmxxh(+) and nspgmx.fxydxh = $uuid$

SELECT T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WFXXUUID, T.JCAJBH, T.AJMC, T.DJXH, T.AJLX_DM, T.WTAJBZ, T.ZDAJBZ, T.DBAJBZ, T.YSSFBZ, T.AJSZJG_DM, T.JCSSQJQ, T.JCSSQJZ, T.LASQRQ, T.LARQ, T.RWXDRQ, T.JCDJRQ, T.SWJCTZSSDRQ, T.JCJSRQ, T.SLDJRQ, T.SLJSRQ, T.ZXDJRQ, T.ZXWBRQ, T.TZSJ, T.JCRY, T.SLRY, T.ZXRY, T.LABM_DM, T.JCBM_DM, T.SLBM_DM, T.ZXBM_DM, T.YJSKZE, T.YJFKZE, T.YJZNJZE, T.SJSKZE, T.SJZNJZE, T.SJFKZE, T.DJZCLX_DM, T.HY_DM, T.SWJG_DM, T.JCJZRQ, T.SLJZRQ, T.CLWBBZ, T.AJJCZT_DM, T.SLYJ_2, T.LCSLID, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.JCRQQ, T.DYABZ, T.ZGSWJG_DM, A.AYSZJG_DM, A.JCSSQQ, A.JCSSQZ, A.JLRQ FROM JC_AJXX T, JC_AYXX A WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.JCAJXXUUID = A.JCAJXXUUID ORDER BY T.JCAJBH
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC T WHERE T.SJSLID = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj1$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

SELECT XCYQFHUUID, SHGLXXBUUID, YQSQWSZG, SJSWJG_DM, XCHWSZG, HHJZRQ, YQJZRQ, SQYQYY, STFYJCQK, LXR_DM, LXDH, WSZZRQ, TBNSDCAJBH, TBNSDCAJMC, TBNSDCAYBH, YQPFWSZG, SQYQXCSWJG_DM, WSSYYJ_DM, PFYJSM, QTSX, PFR_DM_1, PFRQ, PFSWJG_DM_1, SJSLID, LCSLID, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_TBNSTZ_XCYQFH WHERE XCYQFHUUID = $xcyqfhuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.* from jc_lyswjcajdjb t where t.lcslid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $zfbz1$

select t.* from NP_SYXXFKB t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.syuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.syzt = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lcslid = ?)

select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz, nspg.rwwcsx from (select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz, nspg.rwwcsx from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and (nspg.YDCZRY_DM is null) union all select nspg.fxydxh, nspg.nsrsbh, nspg.djxh, nspg.nsrmc, nspg.ydxfry_dm, nspg.ydxfryxm, nspg.ydxfswjg_dm, nspg.ydxfswjgmc, nspg.scsj, nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid, nspg.ydxfsj, nspg.fxdj, nspg.ydczryxm, nspg.ydczry_dm, nspg.ydczswjgmc, nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz, nspg.rwwcsx from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM is not null and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM LIKE ?) nspg order by nspg.scsj asc

select bz.ZXBZTZSUUID, ajxxb.DJXH, bz.BZQX, bz.SLSWJG_DM, bz.WTMS, bz.SWJGJG, bz.ZG, bz.NH, bz.WH, bz.WSZZRQ from Np_Swsxtzs_Nsrzxbz bz, NP_NSPGAJXXB ajxxb where ajxxb.nspgajxxuuid = bz.nspgajxxuuid and ajxxb.djxh = ? and nvl(bz.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(ajxxb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select bz.ZXBZTZSUUID, s.DJXH, bz.BZQX, bz.SLSWJG_DM, bz.WTMS, bz.SWJGJG, bz.ZG, bz.NH, bz.WH, bz.WSZZRQ from Np_Swsxtzs_Nsrzxbz bz,np_ssfxydbg s where s.bguuid = bz.nspgajxxuuid and s.djxh = ? and nvl(bz.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM fz_swsxtzs T WHERE nvl(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND T.YWZJUUID = ? AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?

select t.DYKBFPSJZBUUID, t.DYKBFPTHQDUUID, t.THFPZL_DM as DYFPZL_DM, t.THFPMC as DYFPMC, t.THFP_DM as DYFP_DM, t.THFPQSHM as DYFPQSHM, t.THFPZZHM as DYFPZZHM, t.THFPFS as DYFPFS, t.FPTHQKBZ as BDYFPQKBZ, t.DYKBFPTHQDFPTHQKUUID, t.SJGSDQ, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ from jc_dykbfpthqd_fpthqk t where t.dykbfpthqduuid = $uuid$

select t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.ajly, t.bh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm, t.nsdbrdz, t.nsdbrlxdh, t.nsdbrkhyh_dm, t.nsdbrkhyhzh, t.nsdbxs, t.dbsehj, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.dbccmc, t.nsdbccmc, t.dbccsl, t.dbcczmmc, t.dbdcczmfs, t.nsdbrfzr, t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc, t.nsdbrsfzjhm, t.nsdbrqsrq, t.nsrfzrqz, t.nsrfzrqzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.wszzrq, t.dbccbdcjzgj, t.dbccdcjzgj, t.dbccdqtccjz, t.dbcczjzgj, t.jfrsbh, t.yjshbxfje, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.shbxfbz, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.tzsuuid, t.jcnsdbtzsuuid, t.lrr_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.lcslid from fz_nsdbs t where nsdbsuuid=$uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.SSHJ_DM = $value2$) AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SSWFXWJJDJB T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.BJJRDJXH = $uuid$

select t.tzsuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.slswjgmc, t.slr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.slrq, t.blqx, t.sqrq, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.fyjgmc, t.fyjg_dm, t.wszg, t.lcswsx_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.bznr from fz_swsxtzs t where t.slbz = 'B' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$

select t.yydjapshjlzfqkbuuid, t.yydjsxxxuuid, t.bcyj, t.shr_dm, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.zfbz_1, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj from np_yydjapshjlzfqkb t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.hdslid = $hdslid$

select t.DJXH, t.ZCAJBH, t.ZCAJMC, t.AYSZJG_DM, t.AYSZBM_DM, t.LRR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.AJLX_DM, t.AYNCLYJSM, t.XGCL, t.ZYNR, t.JLR_DM, t.NCLCBDW, t.QDTJ, t.WFWZLX_DM, t.AJCLYJ_DM, t.QDSX, t.BABZ, t.NSRSBH, t.NSRMC, t.HY_DM, t.DJZCLX_DM, t.ZGSWJG_DM, t.SWJCAYZT_DM, t.SSWFLX_DM, t.FXYDXH from jc_ayxx t where djxh = ?

select ajmc,ajbh_1,sqrxm,sqrlb_Dm,xzjjsqfs_Dm,bsqrlxdh,bsqryzbm,bsqrdz,bsqrfzrxm,bsqrmc_1,dsrdlrzw,dsrdlrgzdwmc,dsrdlrzz, dsrdlrnl,dsrdlrxb_Dm,dsrdlrmc,dsrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrzw,dsrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrxm,dsrfrhqtzzyzbm,dsrfrhqtzzdz,dsrfrhqtzzlxdh, dsrfrhqtzzmc,dsrzw_1,dsrgzdwmc,dsrlxdh,dsryzbm,dsrzs,dsrjg,dsrmzmc,dsrnl,dsrxb_Dm,dsrsfzjhm,dsrxm_1,dsrlx_Dm,sqrdlrzw, sqrdlrgzdwmc,sqrdlrzz,sqdlrnl,sqdlrxb_Dm,sqrdlrmc,sqrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrzw,sqrfrhqtzzfrdbfzrxm,sqrfrhqtzzyzbm,sqrfrhqtzzdz,sqrfrhqtzzlxdh,sqrfrhqtzzmc, sqrzw,sqrgzdwmc,sqrlxdh,sqryzbm,sqrzs,sqrjg,sqrmzmc,sqrnl,sqrxb_Dm,sqrsfzjhm,nsrmc,nsrsbh,djxh,ajly, sqr,fysqdyjtxzxwwszg,jtxzxwzl,fysqdyjtxzxwmc,ajlylx_Dm,sdfysqrq,sqrq,xzfyjgdz,xzfyjgmc,xzfyjg_Dm,zysshly,fyqq,fysqdyjtxzxwzcyj,fysqdyjtxzxwzcrq,sfjgfyjd,xzfysqdjbuuid from fz_xzfysqdjb where djxh=?

SELECT UUID, DJXH, DZBZDSZL_DM, LCSLID, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, WSZG, ZZR_DM, WSZZRQ, WSZZSWJG_DM, YWWSUUID, BUSINESSCONTENT, XMLLSH, SWSX_DM, SDZT_DM, DYBZ, DYRY_DM, DYRQ, ZFR_DM, ZFSJ, YWZJUUID, BLSX, WSBH, YWFL_DM, SSHJ_DM, SJGSDQ from gy_ws_wszb t where t.ywzjuuid = ?
select t.xzfygyxxbuuid,t.xzfysqdjbuuid,t.sfdchjxy from fz_xzfygyxxb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA1220012' and t.sfdchjxy='Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.xzfysqdjbuuid=$uuid$

SELECT J.LARQ FROM JC_AJXX J WHERE J.DJXH = ? AND J.LARQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND J.LARQ < (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND J.AJJCZT_DM NOT IN ('501', '502', '503') UNION SELECT D.DJRQ FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ D WHERE D.DJXH = ? AND D.DJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DJRQ < (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) AND NVL(D.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND D.SSWFXWCLZT_DM <> '38'

select t.SWJCZBLUUID, t.SWJCZBLSQBZBUUID, t.WSBH, t.CZRXM, t.SFZJHM, t.GZDW, t.JCFW, t.JCZZ, t.FZJG, t.YXRQQ, t.YXRQZ, t.SWJCZH, t.FZRQ, t.NSBZ, t.NSRQ, t.JSBS, t.JXRQ from JC_SWJCZBL t where t.GZDW in (#macroparam#) and t.czrxm in (#macroparam#) and (t.bz_1 is null or t.bz_1 = 'Y')

select distinct bg.jcajxxuuid, hzb.*, hzb.sl_1 sldwse from jc_swjcbg bg, jc_ncbtskhzb hzb where bg.swjcbguuid = hzb.swjcbguuid and bg.jcajxxuuid=? and (hzb.zfbz_1 is null or hzb.zfbz_1='N') and (bg.yxbz is null or bg.yxbz = 'Y')
update np_ssfxydbg j set j.sswfxwdjuuid = null, j.xgr_dm = ?, j.xgrq = sysdate where j.bguuid = ? and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdclajlzfqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.zfbz_1, t.bcyj, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsdclajlzfqkb t where t.tbnsdclajlzfqkbuuid = $uuid$
select t.JCSSFAUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.ZDR_DM, t.ZDRQ, t.JCMD, t.ZTSSBZ, t.sjslid, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFR_DM from JC_SSFA t where t.sjslid = $uuid$
select tqzjzysjzbuuid, tqzjzysjuuid, zjmc, ys, zjcc, nrzy, je, thbz, zjsssq, tqzjthqduuid from jc_tqzjzysj_zb t where t.tqzjzysjzbuuid = $uuid$

SELECT T.AJJYUUID, T.SWJCAJUUID, T.JCAJXXUUID, T.WSBH, T.AJBH, T.ZLMC, T.JCAJZLLB_DM, T.DW, T.XM, T.YS, T.QXQ, T.QXZ, T.SQJYYYJYJ, T.SQSJ, T.NJYAJZLMCHZNR, T.ZSR_DM, T.ZSSJ, T.LCSLID, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZSTYBZ, T.BZ_1 FROM JC_AJJY T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.LCSLID = $uuid$

SELECT T.ZLXQGZXXBUUID, T.SSWFXWDJUUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.WFXWLX, T.FLYJ, T.ZLXQGZQX, T.ZLXQGZNR, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.WSZZRQ, T.XGSWJG_DM, T.SFGZ, T.XHRQ, T.ZLXQGZZT_DM, T.LCSLID, T.YWFL_DM FROM FZ_ZLXQGZXXB T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZLXQGZXXBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SJSLID = ?)

select f.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid, f.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, f.xh, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.cfyj, f.ncfbs, f.ybtse, f.ncfje, f.yzpzxh, f.zszspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.cflx_dm, f.mswfsdje, f.sswflx_dm, f.wfsd_dm, f.zgswjg_dm, f.hy_dm, f.zgswskfj_dm, f.djxh from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk f where f.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid in (select jc.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jc where jc.cbskhfkbguuid = ? and nvl(jc.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select ZFJGFTMXUUID, NCBTSKHZBUUID, SWJCBGUUID, DJXH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, BLSL, YJSKHJ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, SWCLJDQKBUUID, SJSLID, JCAJXXUUID, SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID, ZFBZ_1 from jc_zfjgftmx where jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and zfbz_1 = 'N' and swcljdqkbuuid is not null

select * from NP_TBNSDCZJSP t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.tbnsdcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.splx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.tqswjg_dm = ?) and t.spyj is null
SELECT t.fpzl_dm,t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.zjje FROM fp_yjfpdjsq_mx t WHERE djsquuid IN (SELECT djsquuid FROM fp_yjfpdjsq WHERE djrdjxh = ?) order by t.fphm asc

select * from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jjrzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select y.* from np_swyttzs y where (1 = #macroparam# or y.nspgajxxuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.swyttzsuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or y.sjslid = ?) and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.dcxcuuid, t.rwbh, t.djxh, t.tbnsdcajbh, t.ajmc, t.jcssqq, t.jcssqz, t.larq, t.jarq, t.jcry, t.jcjg_dm, t.dclx_dm, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.ajlx_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zjhsbz, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc from np_tbnsdcajxxb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $tbnsdcajxxuuid$

select t.zdswajsljyuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.ydrs, t.sdrs, t.slwyhzcr_dm, t.slwyhcy, t.swhszswjg_dm, t.swhslrq, t.swhslyjlx_dm, t.nzccljdnr, t.jlr, t.cxrmc from fz_zdswajsljy t where t.jcajxxuuid = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select T. FCGZFAUUID, T. FCAJQCUUID, T. FCGZFABH, T. FCGZFA, T. WSZZRQ, T. SWJG_DM, T. LRR_DM, T. LRRQ, T. XGR_DM, T. XGRQ, T. SJSLID, T. SJGSDQ, T. ZFBZ_1, T. ZFR_DM, T. ZFRQ_1, T. LCSLID, T. HDSLID, T. WSZZR from JC_FCGZFA T where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select count(1) as count from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(t.tgsjfpjcbz, 'N') = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(t.zstybz, 'N') = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(t.lcbjbz,'N') = ?) and t.tgsjfpjdlx_dm in('01','03')
select s.* from Fz_Swsxtzs s where (1 = #macroparam# or s.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.ywzjuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.tzsuuid = ?) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_YSYWGGJGB T WHERE T.YSYWGGJGBUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select j.* from Np_Atshjl j where j.bguuid = ?

SELECT A.GFJCAJXXUUID, B.GFJCAYXXUUID, A.JCSSQJQ, A.JCSSQJZ, B.JCAYBH, B.DJXH, B.DJRQ, B.DJR_DM, B.GFJCAJLY_DM, B.BZ FROM JC_GFJCAJXX A ,JC_GFJCAYXX B WHERE A.GFJCAYXXUUID = B.GFJCAYXXUUID AND A.GFJCAJZT_DM='01'

select g.* from NP_SSFXYDBG g where (1 = #macroparam# or g.ydczswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.fxydxh = ?) and g.ajzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.atshzsyj = ?) and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from zh_sdxx a where a.gywsuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

update fz_sswfxwdj set sswfxwdjuuidbf = ? , sswfxwclzt_dm = ?,xgr_dm = ?,xgrq = sysdate where djxh = ? and sswflx_Dm = ? and sswfsd_Dm = ? and ssqjq_1 = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and ssqjz_1 = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and lcslid is null and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZFYSQDJB T WHERE T.AJBH_1 = $uuid$

select t.nsdbsuuid, t.ajxxuuid, t.ajly, t.bh, t.nsdbrdjxh, t.nsdbrsbh, t.nsdbrmc, t.nsdbrdjzclx_dm, t.nsdbrdz, t.nsdbrlxdh, t.nsdbrkhyh_dm, t.nsdbrkhyhzh, t.nsdbxs, t.dbsehj, t.nsqx, t.nsdbnsqx, t.dbccmc, t.dbccsl, t.dbcczmmc, t.dbdcczmfs, t.nsdbrfzr, t.nsdbrsfzjzlmc, t.nsdbrsfzjhm, t.nsdbrqsrq, t.nsrfzrqz, t.nsrfzrqzrq, t.swjgjbr_dm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.wszzrq, t.dbccbdcjzgj, t.dbccdcjzgj, t.dbccdqtccjz, t.dbcczjzgj, t.jfrsbh, t.yjshbxfje, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.shbxfbz, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.tzsuuid, t.nsdbccmc, t.jcnsdbtzsuuid, t.lcslid from fz_nsdbs t where t.nsdbzt='Y' and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfdqcl,'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.sfjccl,'N') = 'N' and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$ and ajxxuuid=$uuid$

SELECT YZSXKTZDUUID, SSWFAJXCHUUID, ZSXKFPFS, XKFPJE, LXR_DM, LXDH, WTFSWJGDZ, YZBM, ZZR_DM, ZZRQ_2, ZZSWJG_DM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_YZSXKTZD WHERE SSWFAJXCHUUID = $sswfajxchuuid$

select * from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jjrzzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select b.zxbztzsuuid, b.nspgajxxuuid, b.swjgjg, b.zg, b.nh, b.wh, b.qrbz, b.lcslid, b.bsqx, b.sjslid, b.bzqx, b.slswjg_dm, b.sy, b.yj_1, b.wtms, b.qtsm, b.bsqx from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz b, np_nspgajxxb a where b.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or b.zxbztzsuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.nspgajxxuuid = ?)

select t.FPHPZUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.HPZHM, t.HPYY, t.BHFPYKJDDWHGRMC, t.YKJFPDWHGRNSRSBH, t.BHFPYTKDRQ, t.BHFPYTKDSQFPDWHGR, t.YSQFPDWHGRNSRSBH, t.BHFPYTKNRBZ, t.JBRQZRQ, t.SWJGJBRQZRQ, t.SWJGFZRQZRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.NSRJBRXM, t.SWJGFZRQZ, t.SJSLID, t.BHFPYTKDPMHJYXMDXXJEHJ, t.NSRFZRQZ, t.NSRFZRQZRQ, t.NSRQZ_1, t.SWJGQZ, t.SWJGJBRQZ, t.FPHM, t.BHFPZL_DM, t.FP_DM, t.HPZFP_DM, t.HPZFPZL_DM, t.SFSWSJ, t.BHFPZLMC, t.BHFPMC from jc_fphpz t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

SELECT T.AJJYHGHQDUUID, T.AJJYUUID, T.NJYAJZLMCHZNR, T.AJJYRQ, T.THRQ_1, T.LXDH, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFRQ_1, T.WSBH, T.CZBZ, T.AJGLR_DM, T.AJGHYS, T.SJTB_SJ FROM JC_AJJY_JYGHQD T WHERE (T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) AND T.AJJYHGHQDUUID = $uuid$
select * from np_hcdxgzxzfqbgzqkdg where qbgzqkdguuid=? and xybz='Y'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.AJXXUUID = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj4$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value4$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select dj.wfxwbh as ajbh, dj.wfxwmc as ajmc, jds.sswfxwdjuuid, jds.swjgjg, jds.zg, jds.nh, jds.wh, jds.jkqx, jds.yjfkje, jds.wszzrq cfjdszzrq, fb.yzpzxh, jds.swxzcfjdsuuid from fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb, fz_sswfxwxzcfscbg bg, fz_swxzcfjds jds, fz_sswfxwdj dj where bg.sswfxwdjuuid = fb.sswfxwdjuuid and dj.sswfxwdjuuid = jds.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.sswfxwdjuuid = bg.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.lcslid = bg.lcslid and nvl(fb.yzpzxh, 0) != 0 and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(jds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and dj.djxh = ? union all select dj.jcajbh as ajbh, dj.ajmc as ajmc, jds.sswfxwdjuuid, jds.swjgjg, jds.zg, jds.nh, jds.wh, jds.jkqx, jds.yjfkje, jds.wszzrq cfjdszzrq, fb.yzpzxh, jds.swxzcfjdsuuid from FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK fb, FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF bg, fz_swxzcfjds jds, jc_ajxx dj where bg.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = fb.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and dj.jcajxxuuid = jds.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.sswfxwdjuuid = bg.jcajxxuuid and jds.lcslid = bg.lcslid and nvl(fb.yzpzxh, 0) != 0 and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(jds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and dj.djxh = ?

with a as (select swjg_dm from jc_swcljds where swcljdsuuid = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, jc_swcljds b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh = $value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select s.gxssybtmxbuuid, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, s.skssqq, s.skssqz, s.yjse, s.yjse_2, s.ybtse, s.jslxqk, s.yydjsxxxuuid, s.yydjapbtsktzsuuid, s.djxh, s.dzbzdszl_dm, s.yzpzxh, s.sjslid, s.lrr_dm, s.lrrq, s.sjgsdq from Np_Ssybtmxb s where s.yydjapbtsktzsuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select m.* from FZ_FSWFSD m,fz_sswfxwdj n where m.sswfxwdjuuid=n.sswfxwdjuuid and n.wfxwbh=?
update fz_swxzcfjds_jy a set a.yzpzxh = ?, a.xgr_dm = ?, a.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(a.yzpzxh,0) = 0 and nvl(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N' and a.swxzcfjdsjyuuid = ?
update fz_shbxfxzcfjdsjy a set a.yzpzxh = null, a.xgr_dm = ?, a.xgrq = sysdate where a.yzpzxh is not null and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.shbxfxzcfjdsjyuuid in (#macroparam#)
select sjhcbgshbuuid, shyj, shr, shyjsm, shrq, sbrq_2, sbzjwh, bz, gjssqbdjbuuid from np_sjhcbgshb where gjssqbdjbuuid=?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS T WHERE T.SWXZCFJDSUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_SQXQBZNRTZ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.Tzsuuid = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
select a.yydjapuuid,a.yydjsxxxuuid,a.djyzyjsyj,a.zrdjff from np_yydjap a where a.yydjsxxxuuid = ?
select t.pmbmgyxxbuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrmc,t.nsrsbh,t.pmbmswjg_dm,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.nh,t.wh,t.flyj,t.dwmc,t.wszg,t.wszzrq from Fz_Pmbmgyxxb t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm='BDA1220122'
select t.fxydxh, t.fxydclxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.sssqq, t.sssqz, t.bsje, t.znje, t.zzsdjldje, t.qysdstzynssde, t.qysdstzynse, t.fkje_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq from td_fxyd_skfkb t where t.fxydxh = ?
select t.* from jc_jjnsrsswfxwjlspb t where t.jjnsrsswfxwjlspbuuid = $uuid$
