select s.* from Fz_Sphwhzqtcc s where (1 = #macroparam# OR s.sphwhzqtccuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.jdsuuid = ?) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.DQZBZLTHMXQDUUID, t.DQZBZLTHQDUUID, t.DQZBZLQDMXUUID, t.ZLSSSQQ, t.ZLSSSQZ, t.DW_1, t.SL, t.YS, t.ZBZLMC, t.DQTHZBZLLX_DM, t.bz from jc_dqzbzlthmxqd t where t.dqzbzlthqduuid = $uuid$
SELECT * FROM DM_GY_SWJG WHERE SWJG_DM = ?

select t. SSWFXWJJDJBJJRXXUUID, t. SSWFXWJJDJBUUID, t. JJRDZ, t. JJRSFZJZL_DM, t. JJRSFZJHM, t. JJRLXDH, t. JJRDWMC, t. JJRZW, t. JJRXM_1, t. JJRQ_1, t. JJXS_DM, t. JJRYX, t. JJXXJE, t. JJJLZT, t. JJLX_DM, t. JLDWSBH, t. JJRQM, t. JJRQMRQ, t. SLHZWSBH, t. SLRQ, t. SLSWJG_DM, t. SLHZWSZZRQ, t. ZFBZ_1 from Jc_Sswfxwjjdjb_Jjrxx t where t. SSWFXWJJDJBJJRXXUUID = $uuid$

select t.DYKBFPSJUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.DYLY, t.JBRQZRQ, t.FDDBR, t.SWJGJBRQZRQ, t.SWJGFZRQZRQ, t.SWJGQZRQ, t.NSRJBRXM, t.SWJGFZRQZ, T.JCRY, t.ZFBZ_1, t.SJSLID, t.SJBH, t.NSRQZ_1, t.FZRQZRQ, t.SWJGQZ from jc_dykbfpsj t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select t.wsbh, t.sqjg, t.sqsj, t.lcslid, t.swjczblsqbuuid, t.bz_1, y.swjczblsqbzbuuid, y.swjczbllx_dm, y.lssqbz, x.swjczbluuid, x.czrxm, x.sfzjhm, x.gzdw, x.jcfw, x.jczz, x.fzjg, x.yxrqq, x.yxrqz, x.swjczh, x.fzrq, y.spbz, t.lrr_dm, y.fjuuid from jc_swjczblsqb t, jc_swjczblsqb_zb y, jc_swjczbl x where t.swjczblsqbuuid = y.swjczblsqbuuid and y.swjczblsqbzbuuid = x.swjczblsqbzbuuid and t.lcslid = $uuid$

select t.larq, t.jcbm_dm, t.jcajxxuuid, t.jcajbh, t.ajmc, x.dbajgzbuuid, x.jcry, x.cbqx, x.scbgsj, x.ybgcs, x.dbajzt_dm, y.cbjg_dm, y.dbswjg_dm, y.zdsswfajdbhuuid from jc_dbajgzb x, jc_zdsswfajdbh y,jc_ajxx t where x.ZDSSWFAJDBHUUID = y.ZDSSWFAJDBHUUID and y.jcajxxuuid = t.jcajxxuuid(+) and x.sjslid = $uuid$
select g.nsrsbh, g.nsrmc from np_hczdqbgzqkdg g where g.jsssqbclqkbuuid = ?
select t.djxh, t.ybhtsqdjbuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.sqsx, t.sqrq, t.sfslbz, t.sqly, t.yqbsjzrq, t.jssqrq, t.slr_dm from np_yydjapzssqyqbsjsdjb t where t.yydjapzssqyqbsjsdjbuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.XH, T.FLYJ, T.XYBZ, T.YXBZ from CS_FZ_YWCLFLYJ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.XH = ?) AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from np_swyttzs where lcslid = $lcslid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_ZSSQSLTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?

select t.ajzbdw_dm, t.dbbh, t.djxh, t.cbsx, t.xbjg_dm, t.zcajbz, t.dbzrbm_dm, t.dbzrry_dm, t.jcayxxuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.cbjgswj_Dm, t.xbjgswj_Dm, t.nbyj from jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb t where t.zdsswfajdblxuuid = $uuid$

select b.bguuid, b.fxydxh, b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.nsrmc, b.atshzsyj, b.pgajbh, s.zxbztzsuuid, s.bzqx, s.slswjg_dm, s.wtms, s.swjgjg, s.zg, s.nh, s.wh, s.wszzrq, s.qrbz, s.sy, s.lcslid, s.sjslid, s.yj_1, s.bsqx, s.qtsm, s.ydssqq, s.ydssqz from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz s, np_ssfxydbg b where s.nspgajxxuuid = b.bguuid and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.zxbztzsuuid in (#macroparam#)
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE T.JCAYXXUUID = ?

select t.DQZBZLQDUUID, t.DQZBZLRQ, t.NSRQZRQ_1, t.SWJG_DM, t.QYJBRXM, t.SJSLID, t.DZSWJG_DM_1, t.DQZBZLTZSUUID, t.SWRYQZ, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.ym_1 from jc_dqzbzlqd t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and t.jcajxxuuid = $key$ and (t.ZFBZ_1 is null or t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')

select z.zxbztzsuuid, z.nspgajxxuuid, z.bzqx, z.slswjg_dm, z.wtms, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, z.qrbz, z.lcslid, z.ydssqq as pgssqq, z.ydssqz as pgssqz, a.djxh, null sjly_dm from np_swsxtzs_nsrzxbz z, np_ssfxydbg a, zh_sdxx t where z.nspgajxxuuid = a.bguuid and z.zxbztzsuuid = t.sdwsuuid and a.djxh = $djxh$ and z.qrbz = 'N' and t.sdzt_dm = '03' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tbnsdclajlzfqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.zfbz_1, t.bcyj, t.shr, t.shrssswjg_dm, t.zfrq_2, t.sjtb_sj from np_tbnsdclajlzfqkb t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.hdslid = $hdslid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_BYSWXZCFJDS T WHERE T.BYSWXZCFJDSUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.ZCBSDZBUUID, t.ZXBZTZSUUID, t.YZPZXH pzxh, b.swjgjg, b.zg, b.nh, b.wh, b.qrbz from NP_ZCBSDZB t, NP_SWSXTZS_NSRZXBZ b where t.zxbztzsuuid = b.zxbztzsuuid and b.nspgajxxuuid = $uuid$ and b.qrbz = $qrbz$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.FJMC,t.DZBZDSZL_DM,t.FJUUID from fz_gy_fjb t where t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$

select s.*, c.swjg_dm, c.sfzdxh, c.wssdfs_dm, c.xqts, c.wsmrsdr, c.sdjgts, c.wssddz from zh_sdxx s, cs_zh_zdxhwspzb c where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdhzuuid is null and s.dzbzdszl_dm = c.dzbzdszl_dm and s.tfjg_dm = c.swjg_dm and c.sfzdxh = 'Y' and s.dzbzdszl_dm not in ('BDA1220079', 'BDA1220172', 'BDA1220090', 'BDA1120037', 'BDA1020059', 'BDA1020042', 'BDA1120123')
select h.sphwhzqtccuuid From fz_sphwhzqtcc h, zh_sdxx s where h.jdsuuid = $jdsuuid$ and s.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1220109' and s.sdwsuuid = h.sphwhzqtccuuid and s.sdzt_dm = '03'

select sj.DYKBFPSJZBUUID, sj.DYKBFPSJUUID, sj.DYFPZL_DM, sj.DYFPMC, sj.DYFP_DM, sj.DYFPQSHM, sj.DYFPZZHM, sj.DYFPFS, sj.BDYFPQKBZ, sj.THBZ, sj.FPDYQKBZ from jc_dykbfpsj_zb sj, jc_dykbfpthqd_fpthqk thqk, jc_dykbfpthqd thqd where sj.dykbfpsjzbuuid = thqk.dykbfpsjzbuuid and thqk.dykbfpthqduuid = thqd.dykbfpthqduuid and thqd.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sj.dykbfpsjuuid = $uuid$
select t.* from fz_swxzysajdjb t where t.swxzysajdjbuuid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$
select count(1) from np_nspgytqkb where hdslid=?
DELETE FROM ZH_FJ_FPQD T WHERE T.SSWFAJXCHUUID = ? AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = ?

select nspgmx.zbmc_2, nspgmx.zbz, nspgmx.tsxx, nspgmx.djxh, nspgmx.fxydxh, nspgmx.fxmxxh, nspgmx.fxxxxh, nspgmx.nsrssswjg_dm, nspgmx.nsrssswjgmc, nspgmx.zb_dm_1, nspgmx.fxqjq, nspgmx.fxqjz, nspgmx.mxlylx, nspgmx.zbfz, nspgmx.yjsx, nspgmx.yjxx from td_fxmx_nspgb nspgmx where nspgmx.djxh = ? union all select j.zbmc_2, j.zbz, j.tsxx, j.djxh, j.fxydxh, j.fxmxxh, j.fxxxxh, j.nsrssswjg_dm, j.nsrssswjgmc, j.zb_dm_1, j.fxqjq, j.fxqjz, j.mxlylx, j.zbfz, j.yjsx, j.yjxx from td_fxmx_jcxab j where j.djxh = ?

select t.swxzpcuuid, t.pcajbh, t.ajmc, t.pcqqrlx_dm, t.djxh, t.dwdz, t.lxdh, t.yzbm, t.fddbr, t.zw, t.xm, t.xb_dm, t.gzdw, t.nl, t.mz_dm, t.zz, t.qqrsfzjhm, t.wtdlrxm, t.wtdlrxb_dm, t.dlrzw, t.wtdlrgzdwmc, t.wtdlrzz, t.wtdlrsfzjhm, t.jtxzxwmc, t.jtxzxwzcrq, t.xzjjsqfs_dm, t.pcywjgmc, t.ssyly, t.pcqqdjtnr, t.sqpcdlygj, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, t.djry_dm, t.pcsqdjsj, t.pcajzt, t.scyj, t.sfpc, t.pcje, t.sfzc, t.zcje, t.slry_dm, t.slrq_1, t.pcjdswszg, t.pcywjgfddbrxm, t.pcywjgpcyj, t.flyj, t.jdnr, t.fyjg_dm, t.pcjdswszzrq, t.lcslid, t.ajxxuuid, t.ajly from fz_swxzpc t where t.pcajbh= $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.SPHWHZQTCCUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.JDSUUID, T.SJBH, T.SWJG_DM, T.ZXR, T.ZXRQ_1, T.BZXRMC, T.CFBCGYY, T.KYBCGYY, T.WSZZRQ, T.SWJGJBR_DM, T.PMBMJGJSRXM, T.PMBMJG, T.PMBMSGDWJSR, T.SWJGFZR_DM, T.SWJGFZRXM, T.BFHCWDWJSRXM, T.BFHCWDWJSRQMRQ, T.NSRQSRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.JEHJ, T.SWJGJBRXM, T.NSRMC, T.NSDBRMC, T.SFCF, T.HCRQ, T.HCR, T.SWSXTZSWSZG, T.SSHJ_DM FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.UUID, T.SWJG_DM, SUBSTR(T.SSWFSD_DM, 0, 2) SSWFLX_DM, T.SSWFSD_DM, T.WFCD_DM, T.WFCDPDBZ_DM, T.WFCDPDBZLJF, T.WFCDPDBZZ, T.WFXWZTXZ, T.FKJSFS_DM, T.FKJEXX, T.FKJESX, T.FKBLXX, T.FKBLSX, T.JSQXLX_DM, T.TS, T.RFKJE, T.ZGFKJE, T.JKLX_DM_1, T.WFQJ, T.CFJZ, T.SFGZ, T.SFLSB, T.SFSWBF FROM CS_FZ_XZCFCLQ T WHERE T.SSWFSD_DM = ? AND T.WFXWZTXZ = ? AND T.SWJG_DM = ? ORDER BY T.WFCD_DM

select t.ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.SQYQCCQX, t.JTSQYY, t.XYBGZAP, t.TSCLQX, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID, t.WSZZR, t.SQRQ, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFRQ_1, t.SQR_DM, t.BZ_1, t.WSBH, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YDWCRQ from jc_zdsswfajtsclsqb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $lcslid$ and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) order by t.lrrq desc

select f.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, f.lcslid, f.sswflx_dm, f.cflx_dm, f.wfsd_dm, f.wfcy_dm, f.zjgftfkje, f.fzjgftfkje, f.zgswjg_dm, f.mswfsdje from FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF f where nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and f.sjslid = $uuid$

select a.sdxxuuid, a.sdhzuuid, a.ajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.dzbzdszl_dm, a.sdwsuuid, a.gywsuuid, (a.swjgjg || '' || a.zg || '〔' || a.nh || '〕' || a.wh || '号') as sdwswszg, a.swjgjg, a.zg, a.nh, a.wh, a.tfjg_dm, a.tfrq, a.sdzt_dm, a.ywjd_dm, a.wssdsj, a.sdwslcslid, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from zh_sdxx a where a.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.sdhzuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

with a as (select swjg_dm from fz_swxzcfsxgzs where SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, fz_swxzcfsxgzs b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh = $value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select distinct lh.lhqkdjbuuid, lh.qbbh, lh.lhf, lh.swrq, bw.fwzh_1, bw.fwmc_1, bw.yqhfrq, bw.bwqkdjbuuid, b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid, qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb, np_lhqkdjb lh, np_bwqkdjb bw, np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb b where qkb.lhqkdjbuuid = lh.lhqkdjbuuid and qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid and qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid and qkb.czzt in (#macroparam#) and lh.hjclyj = '01' and (1 = #macroparam# or lh.qbbh = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwzh_1 = #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or bw.fwmc_1 = #macroparam#) and qkb.clswjg_dm= ?

SELECT W.WFXWBH, W.WFXWMC, W.NSRSBH, W.NSRMC, W.DJXH, DJ.SQR, DJ.SQSX, DJ.SQRQ, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID, GZS.NCFJE, DJ.TZSQDJBUUID, SD.WSSDSJ FROM FZ_TZSQDJB DJ, FZ_SSWFXWDJ W, FZ_SWXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = W.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID = W.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SWXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND DJ.TZZT NOT IN ('0', '5') AND (1 = #macroparam# or W.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or W.WFXWBH = ?) AND NVL(DJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(W.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(SD.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(GZS.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT W.WFXWBH, W.WFXWMC, W.NSRSBH, W.NSRMC, W.DJXH, DJ.SQR, DJ.SQSX, DJ.SQRQ, DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID, GZS.CFJE AS NCFJE, DJ.TZSQDJBUUID, SD.WSSDSJ FROM FZ_TZSQDJB DJ, FZ_SSWFXWDJ W, FZ_SHBXFXZCFSXGZS GZS, ZH_SDXX SD WHERE DJ.SSWFXWDJUUID = W.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SSWFXWDJUUID = W.SSWFXWDJUUID AND GZS.SBFXZCFSXGZSUUID = SD.SDWSUUID AND DJ.TZZT NOT IN ('0', '5') AND (1 = #macroparam# or W.NSRSBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or W.WFXWBH = ?) AND NVL(DJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(W.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(SD.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(GZS.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from NP_SSQBSBQKB b where b.gjssqbdjbuuid= ? and b.sbdw=?

select t.SWJCAJUUID, t.LJSWJG_DM, t.AJJS, t.JM, t.LJR_DM, t.LJRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.SJSLID, t.AJBH, t.JS, t.AJBGQX, t.MJ_DM, t.YS, t.QZH, t.MLH, t.AJH, t.SFFJ, t.QTJYHQKSM, t.BJQKSM, t.LJRQM, t.JCRQM, t.AJLB, t.GLLX from jc_swjcaj t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sffj ='N'
update fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb set fb.YZPZXH = ?, fb.xgr_dm = ?, fb.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(fb.YZPZXH, 0) = 0 and nvl(fb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and fb.swxzcfjdsuuid = ?

select f.zgswskfj_dm, f.djxh, f.yjskhj, q.hy_dm, q.zsxm_dm, q.zspm_dm, q.zszm_dm, q.skssqq, q.skssqz, q.jsyjsbs, q.jsyjtzs, q.sldwse from jc_zfjgftmx f, jc_swcljdqkb q, jc_swcljds s where f.swcljdqkbuuid = q.swcljdqkbuuid and q.swcljdsuuid = s.swcljdsuuid and nvl(q.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and nvl(s.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and s.swcljdsuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM NP_SWSXTZS_TQYXBYSLTZ T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ? AND T.YYDJAPAYBH= ?
select * from np_nszczxqkqrb where lcslid = $lcslid$ and nspgbguuid = $sjslid$ and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

select t.* from fz_xzfysqdjb t where ((t.TSZT = '000' and t. FYAJZT in ('0', '4')) or (t.zlslzt = '2' and t. FYAJZT = '3') or (t.bhfysqzt = '2' and t. FYAJZT = '3')) and nvl(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.djxh = $uuid$

select f.swxzcfjdsuuid, f.sswfxwdjuuid, f.swjgjg, f.zg, f.nh, f.wh, f.wfss, f.yjfkje, f.jkdd, f.jkzh, f.fyjg_dm, f.wszzrq, f.swjg_dm, f.lcslid, f.sjslid, f.jkqx, f.fkxjts, f.jcrqq, f.cbskhfkbguuid, f.jcrqz, f.jcssqq, f.jcssqz, f.jcfwhnr, f.wfsd, f.fyjgmc, f.swxzcfyj, f.cfjd from fz_swxzcfjds f where f.sswfxwdjuuid = ? and nvl(f.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and f.cbskhfkbguuid is null
select t.* from jc_swcljds t, jc_ajxx aj where t.jcajxxuuid = aj.jcajxxuuid and aj.djxh = $uuid$ and (aj.zfbz_1 is null or aj.zfbz_1 = 'N') and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t. FCJDSUUID, t. FCAJQCUUID, t. FCZJDSJ, t. JDYJ, t. SWJG_DM, t. LRR_DM, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJSLID, t. SJGSDQ, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. FCSWJJCJSPYJ, t. SWJLDSP, t. WSBH, t. LRRQ from jc_fcjds t where t.sjslid= $uuid$

select a.* from fz_bkckgl a where not exists (select 1 from fz_bkcktzs b where a.bkckgluuid = b.bkckgluuid and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and a.djxh = ? and a.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and a.zstybz = '1' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select c.* from fz_bkckgl c, fz_bkcktzs d where c.bkckgluuid = d.bkckgluuid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), 'yyyy/MM/dd') - d.kzqxz) <= 0 and not exists (select 1 from fz_bkckgl e where c.bkckgluuid = e.yuuid and nvl(e.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and e.zstybz = '1') and c.djxh = ? and c.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and c.zstybz = '1' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select s.gxssybtmxbuuid, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, s.skssqq, s.skssqz, s.yjse, s.yjse_2, s.ybtse, s.jslxqk, s.yydjsxxxuuid, s.yydjapbtsktzsuuid, s.djxh, s.dzbzdszl_dm, s.yzpzxh, s.sjslid, s.lrr_dm, s.lrrq, s.sjgsdq from Np_Ssybtmxb s where (1 = #macroparam# or s.sjslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.yydjapbtsktzsuuid = ?) and s.yydjsxxxuuid = ? and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select nspg.fxydxh,nspg.nsrsbh,nspg.djxh,nspg.nsrmc,nspg.ydxfry_dm,nspg.ydxfryxm,nspg.ydxfswjg_dm,nspg.ydxfswjgmc,nspg.scsj,nspg.ydxfph,nspg.nsrsshy, nspg.nspgxmid,nspg.ydxfsj,nspg.fxdj,nspg.ydczryxm,nspg.ydczry_dm,nspg.ydczswjgmc,nspg.ydczswjg_dm,nspg.fxzfz,nspg.ydbm_dm,nspg.qzhduuid, nspg.rwuuid,nspg.rwwcsx from (select nspg.fxydxh,nspg.nsrsbh,nspg.djxh,nspg.nsrmc,nspg.ydxfry_dm,nspg.ydxfryxm,nspg.ydxfswjg_dm,nspg.ydxfswjgmc,nspg.scsj,nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy,nspg.nspgxmid,nspg.ydxfsj,nspg.fxdj,nspg.ydczryxm,nspg.ydczry_dm,nspg.ydczswjgmc,nspg.ydczswjg_dm,nspg.fxzfz,'' ydbm_dm, '' qzhduuid,'' rwuuid,null rwwcsx from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydczswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.fxydxh = ?) and (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and (nspg.YDCZRY_DM is null) union all select nspg.fxydxh,nspg.nsrsbh,nspg.djxh,nspg.nsrmc,nspg.ydxfry_dm,nspg.ydxfryxm,nspg.ydxfswjg_dm,nspg.ydxfswjgmc,nspg.scsj,nspg.ydxfph, nspg.nsrsshy,nspg.nspgxmid,nspg.ydxfsj,nspg.fxdj,nspg.ydczryxm,nspg.ydczry_dm,nspg.ydczswjgmc,nspg.ydczswjg_dm, nspg.fxzfz,'' ydbm_dm,'' qzhduuid,'' rwuuid, null rwwcsx from td_fxxx_nspgb nspg where (nspg.clzt = '0' or nspg.clzt is null) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM is not null and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nspg.fxydxh = ?) and nspg.YDCZRY_DM LIKE ? union all select a.fxydxh,a.nsrsbh,a.djxh,a.nsrmc,'' ydxfry_dm,'' ydxfryxm,a.ydxfswjg_dm,'' ydxfswjgmc, null scsj,a.ydxfph,'' nsrsshy,'' nspgxmid, a.ydxfsj,a.fxdj,'' ydczryxm,a.ydczry_dm, '' ydczswjgmc,a.ydczswjg_dm,null fxzfz,a.ydbm_dm,a.qzhduuid,a.rwuuid,a.rwwcsx from np_atshrwfpb a where (1 = #macroparam# or a.ydczswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ydxfsj >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ydxfsj <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.fxydxh = ?) and a.ajzt_dm = ? and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') nspg order by nspg.scsj asc

HDSLID, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. FCYJ, t. WSBH, t. JBQK, t. FCYJJJY, t. FCZZQM, t. FCZYQM, t. ZYQZRQ, t. ZZQZRQ, t. QTQKSM from jc_fcbg t where t.FCBGUUID= $uuid$
select t.* from jc_swcljdqkb t where t.swcljdsuuid in (#macroparam#) and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.sjswjg_dm, d.swjgbz, d.jgjc_dm, d.swjgjg from DM_GY_SWJG d where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' and d.sjswjg_dm = ?

with a as (select swjg_dm from jc_swjcjl where swjcjluuid = $uuid$) select count(*) as sl from a, jc_swjcjl b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and b.wh = $value1$ and b.nh=$value2$ and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPYSQ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1,'N') = ?
DELETE FROM JC_SWCLJDQKB T WHERE T.CBSKHFKBGUUID = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM != ?)

select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_zjbh z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.zjbhuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.uuid =? union all select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.LCSLID, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.WSZG, t.ZZR_DM, t.WSZZRQ, t.WSZZSWJG_DM, t.YWWSUUID, t.BUSINESSCONTENT, t.XMLLSH, t.SWSX_DM, t.SDZT_DM, t.DYBZ, t.DYRY_DM, t.DYRQ, t.ZFR_DM, t.ZFSJ, t.YWZJUUID, t.BLSX, t.WSBH, t.YWFL_DM, t.SSHJ_DM, t.SJGSDQ from jc_sswfxwjjdjb z, gy_ws_wszb t where z.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = t.ywwsuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.jcayxxuuid = ?

SELECT T.SPHWHZQTCCUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.JDSUUID, T.SJBH, T.SWJG_DM, T.ZXR, T.ZXRQ_1, T.BZXRMC, T.CFBCGYY, T.KYBCGYY, T.WSZZRQ, T.SWJGJBR_DM, T.PMBMJGJSRXM, T.PMBMJG, T.PMBMSGDWJSR, T.SWJGFZR_DM, T.SWJGFZRXM, T.BFHCWDWJSRXM, T.BFHCWDWJSRQMRQ, T.NSRQSRQ, T.NSDBRQSRQ, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSWSX_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.JEHJ, T.SWJGJBRXM, T.NSRMC, T.NSDBRMC, T.SJTB_SJ, T.SFCF, T.HCRQ, T.HCR, T.SWSXTZSWSZG, T.SSHJ_DM FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC T WHERE T.SPHWHZQTCCUUID = $uuid$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value2$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.*,a.djxh,a.fxydxh from np_nspgbg t, NP_NSPGAJXXB a where t.nspgajxxuuid = a.nspgajxxuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = $qrbz$ and t.lcslid = $lcslid$ order by t.lrrq desc
update jc_swjczbl t set t.bz_1 = 'N' where t.czrxm = ?

select t.tzsuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.slswjgmc, t.wszzrq, t.slr_dm, t.wszg, t.slrq, t.sqrq, t.swjgjg, t.wh, t.nh, t.zg, t.ywzjuuid, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.blqx, t.spswjg_dm, t.spswjgmc, t.sply, t.fyjgmc, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcswsx_dm, t.fyjg_dm, t.zfr_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.pcsqyj_dm, t.bznr from fz_swsxtzs t where t.ywzjuuid = $ywzjuuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.slbz = $slbz$
select * from np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb b where b.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid=?
select t.basically_circs as jbqk, t.check_process as jcqkjfxwt, t.idea_and_gist as clyjjjy, t.proof as qtqksm from insp_check_report t where t.case_id = ?

select t.nh dbhnh, t.zg dbhzg, t.swjgjg dbhswjgjg, t.wh dbhwh, t.wszzrq dbrq, t.zdsswfajdbhuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.cbjg_dm, t.dbswjg_dm, x.jcajbh, x.ajmc, x.djxh, y.xbjzrq, y.cxdbly, y.qtsx, y.dzbzdszl_dm, y.sswfajcbhcxdbhuuid, y.nh, y.wh, y.zg, y.swjgjg, t.bgjzrq, y.wszzrq, y.wszzr, m.cbswjg_dm, y.wszzswjg_dm from jc_zdsswfajdbh t, jc_sswfajcbhcxdbh y, jc_ajxx x,jc_sswfajcbhcxdbxxb m where t.jcajxxuuid = y.jcajxxuuid and y.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and m.lcslid=y.lcslid and y.sswfajcbhcxdbhuuid = $uuid$
select s.* from jc_swjctzsy s where (1 = #macroparam# or s.sjslid = ?) and s.ywzjuuid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or s.swjctzsyuuid = ?) and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select b.djxh,b.sz_dm,b.ssnd,b.ybtse,b.jslxqk,b.yzpzxh,b.zspm_dm,b.yjse_2,t.tbnsdczxtzuuid,b.gxssybtmxbuuid from np_tbnsdczxtz t, np_zdydsjxx z, np_gxssybtmxb b where t.tbnsdczxtzuuid = z.ywuuid and z.ywzjuuid = b.sjslid and z.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1010039' and t.tbnsdczxtzuuid = ? and b.yzpzxh is null and b.zxtzbz = '2'

select t.DQZBZLQDUUID, t.DQZBZLRQ, t.NSRQZRQ_1, t.SWJG_DM, t.QYJBRXM, t.SJSLID, t.DZSWJG_DM_1, t.DQZBZLTZSUUID, t.SWRYQZ, t.JCAJXXUUID,t.ym_1 from jc_dqzbzlqd t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and (t.ZFBZ_1 is null or t.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')
select t.zlssqjq, t.zlssqjz, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh from jc_dqzbzltzs t where t.ajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

update fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb set fb.YZPZXH = ?, fb.xgr_dm = ?, fb.xgrq = sysdate where nvl(fb.YZPZXH,0) = 0 and nvl(fb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and fb.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid =(select bg.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid from fz_sswfxwxzcfscbg bg, fz_swxzcfjds jds where jds.sswfxwdjuuid = bg.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.lcslid=bg.lcslid and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = ?)
select xwtzsuuid, tbnsdcajxxuuid, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, bxwdcrxm, xwrq, xwdd, lxrxm, swjgdz, lxdh, swjg_dm, czrq_1, czry_dm from NP_XWTZS s where s.xwtzsuuid=$uuid$ and s.zfbz_1='N'

select jc.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, jc.jcajxxuuid, jc.jcajxzcfscbguuid, jc.cbskhfkbguuid, jc.cflx_dm, jc.mswfsdje, jc.wfsd_dm, jc.zgswjg_dm, jc.zjgftfkje, jc.fzjgftfkje, jc.lcslid,jc.lrrq, jc.sjslid,jc.sswflx_dm,jc.wfcy_dm from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jc where jc.cbskhfkbguuid = ? and nvl(jc.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPHWHZQTCC_ZB T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = $uuid$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WFXWBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SSWFXWCLZT_DM = ?) aND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.DJJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, ?) = ?)

select t. GFJCQZZXSQSUUID, t. GFJCAJXXUUID, t. SWJGJG, t. ZG, t. NH, t. WH, t. SQZXRMFYMC, t. SHBXFQZZXPZRXM, t. WSZZRQ, t. LCSLID, t. LRR_DM, t. LRRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. SJGSDQ, t. ZFBZ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFRQ_1, t. NR, t. SJSLID, t. WSZG from JC_GFJCQZZXSQS t where t.sjslid = $uuid$

select t.tbnsdcajbh, t.ajmc, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.larq, t.jarq, t.tbnsdcajzt_dm, t.ajlx_dm, a.ajlxmc, t.dclx_dm, d.tbnstzdclxmc dclxmc, t.rwbh tbnsdcaybh, t.ydwtsjndq, t.ydwtsjndz, t.jcssqq, t.jcssqz,t.lrrq ,z.tbnsdczxtzuuid from np_tbnsdcajxxb t, dm_np_ajlx a, dm_np_tbnstzdclx d,np_tbnsdczxtz z where t.ajlx_dm = a.ajlx_dm and t.dclx_dm = d.tbnstzdclx_dm and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = z.tbnsdcajxxuuid(+) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.djxh = ? and t.ydwtsjndq <= ? and t.ydwtsjndz >= ?

select g.* from NP_SSFXYDBG g where (1 = #macroparam# or g.ydczswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.nsrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.fxydxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.shsfxyzs = ?) and g.ajzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.atshhsr in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.ydczry_dm = ?) and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS_JY T WHERE T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $value2$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

with swjg as (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.sjswjg_dm = ? union select #macroparam# as swjg_dm from dual) select distinct t.dzbzdszl_dm from zh_sdxx t where t.sdzt_dm in (#macroparam#) and exists (select 1 from swjg a where a.swjg_dm = t.tfjg_dm) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.tbnsdcgzglqkbuuid, t.tbnsdcajxxuuid, t.djxh, t.pgfxry_dm, t.pgfxrq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1, t.sjtb_sj, t.fjuuid, t.ydctzqkdmyxs, t.xsqlrl, t.ydctzqkdtzynssde, t.ydctzqkdtzrkse, t.gzglcqff, t.gzgljl, t.gzqdmyxs, t.sfzz, t.zzje_1, t.gzglqdgljylx from np_tbnsdcgzglqkb t where t.tbnsdcajxxuuid = $uuid$

select distinct qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid,qkb.jsssqbclqkbuuid,bw.fwzh_1,jd.bwzh,qkb.hcswjg as swdw,jd.yqhfrq from np_jsssqbclqkb qkb left join np_bwqkdjb bw on qkb.bwqkdjbuuid = bw.bwqkdjbuuid left join np_gjqbjhsjjdxxb jd on qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid = jd.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid where qkb.gjqbjhsjjdxxbuuid =?

select b.djxh,b.sz_dm,b.ssnd,b.ybtse,b.jslxqk,b.yzpzxh,b.zspm_dm,b.yjse_2,t.tbnsdczxtzuuid,b.gxssybtmxbuuid from np_tbnsdczxtz t, np_zdydsjxx z, np_gxssybtmxb b where t.tbnsdczxtzuuid = z.ywuuid and z.ywzjuuid = b.sjslid and z.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1010039' and t.tbnsdczxtzuuid = ? and b.yzpzxh is not null and b.zxtzbz = '2'
select * from CS_ZH_SZHYXGNSRXXPZB where yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_BGSXSQB T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

SELECT distinct JG.SWJG_DM CODE, JG.SWJGMC CAPTION FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS zns, DM_QX_ZNJGDZBKZ_JCJG DZB, DM_GY_SWJG JG WHERE DZB.JCJG_DM = zns.swjg_dm AND DZB.GLJG_DM = JG.SWJG_DM and zns.ccm like ? and zns.zn_dm = ?

select t.wsbh, t.sqjg, t.sqsj, t.lcslid, t.swjczblsqbuuid, t.bz_1, y.swjczblsqbzbuuid, y.czrxm, y.sfzjhm, y.zp, y.gzdw, y.jcfw, y.jczz, y.fzjg, y.yxrqq, y.yxrqz, y.swjczbllx_dm, y.bfyy, y.bgyy, y.yswjczh swjczh, y.blzt_dm, y.fjuuid, y.spbz, t.lrr_dm from jc_swjczblsqb t, jc_swjczblsqb_zb y where t.swjczblsqbuuid = y.swjczblsqbuuid and t.lcslid = $uuid$

select fb.sswfxwxzcfscbgfbuuid qkbuuid, bg.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid, fb.zsxm_dm, fb.zspm_dm, fb.zspm_dm zszspm_dm, fb.skssqq, fb.skssqz, fb.nfkje ybtse, decode(fb.zsxm_dm, '30501', '32', '31') skzl_dm, decode(fb.zsxm_dm, '30501', '0501', '0503') sksx_dm, jds.fkxjts + sysdate jkqx, jds.lcslid, 'FZYB' bz, 'YBCF' yllx, 'fz' jcfzbz, decode(fb.cflx_dm, '106', '106', 'qt') cflx_dm, fb.msffsdje, fb.djxh, fb.zgswskfj_dm, fb.swxzcfjdsuuid, dj.xzqhsz_dm, dj.jdxz_dm from fz_sswfxwxzcfscbgfb fb, fz_sswfxwxzcfscbg bg, fz_swxzcfjds jds,fz_sswfxwdj dj where bg.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid = fb.sswfxwxzcfscbguuid and jds.sswfxwdjuuid = bg.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.sswfxwdjuuid = dj.sswfxwdjuuid and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = fb.swxzcfjdsuuid and nvl(fb.yzpzxh, 0) = 0 and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(fb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = $uuid1$ union all select t.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid qkbuuid, a.jcajxxuuid ajxxuuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszspm_dm zszspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.ncfje ybtse, decode(t.cflx_dm, '105', '31', '32') skzl_dm, decode(t.cflx_dm, '105', '0503', '0501') sksx_dm, jds.fkxjts + sysdate jkqx, jds.lcslid, 'JC' bz, 'YBCF' yllx, 'jc' jcfzbz, t.cflx_dm, t.mswfsdje msffsdje, t.djxh, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.swxzcfjdsuuid, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm from FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK t, fz_swxzcfjds jds, FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF a where jds.sswfxwdjuuid = a.jcajxxuuid and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = t.swxzcfjdsuuid and t.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = a.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and nvl(t.yzpzxh, 0) = 0 and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jds.swxzcfjdsuuid = $uuid2$

SELECT T.PMBMGYXXBUUID, T.AJXXUUID, T.YUUID, T.DJXH, T.NSRSBH, T.NSRMC, T.PMBMSWJG_DM, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.SY, T.YJ_1, T.FLYJ, T.JDNR, T.FYJG_DM, T.FYJGMC, T.SPSWJG_DM, T.WSZZRQ, T.DWMC, T.JDSMC, T.PMBMRQ, T.PMBMDD, T.BLQX, T.GGNR, T.FYJE, T.PMBMSDJE, T.PMBMSRJE, T.XGFYJE, T.DJSKJE, T.DJZNJJE_1, T.DJFKJE, T.DJMSWFSDJE, T.RQJE, T.FHSPHWHZQTCCLY, T.FHCWSWJG_DM, T.YXDDZLMC, T.PGJDYJ, T.PGJDWTLX_DM, T.PGJDSTLX_DM, T.HCR_DM, T.HCRQ, T.HTH, T.WTPMBMHTNR, T.WTHTQDRQ, T.WTDWFDDBRXM, T.WTDWFDDBRZW, T.STRXM, T.STRGZDW, T.STRZW, T.STRZJLX_DM, T.STRZJHM, T.DLQX, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LCSLID, T.HDSLID, T.SJSLID, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.WSZG, T.JDPGJGMC, T.PMBMJDSWSZG, T.PGJDBGMC, T.WTDWMC, T.PMBMCCMC, T.PZZL_DM, T.SPHM, T.TFRQ, T.SJJE, T.ZSXM_DM FROM FZ_PMBMGYXXB T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.*, (t.swjgjg || '' || t.zg || '〔' || t.nh || '〕' || t.wh || '号') as sdwswszg from zh_sdxx t where t.ajxxuuid = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select y.fxydxh, y.fxydclxh, y.ywwtbz, y.clzt, y.nsrsyfxpj, y.nsrzcdpj, y.swrybzcyyswjg, y.swrybzcyynsr, y.nsrbzcyyswjg, y.nsrbzcyynsr, y.ggjynb, y.ggjynsr, y.clssq, y.clssz, y.ydry_dm, y.ydryxm, y.ydbm_dm, y.ydbmmc, y.ydswjg_dm, y.ydswjgmc, y.fksj, y.clsj, y.fxfxqk, y.fxydqk, y.ydclyj, y.sfzjc, y.jcrwlazt, y.jcajbh, y.jcajyysm, y.scsj from TD_FXYD_PJFKB y where y.fxydxh = ?
select bwqkdjbuuid,lhqkdjbuuid,fwmc_1,fwzh_1,mj_2,yqhfrq,swdw, bz,bwry,fwrq,clswjg_dm,jsswjg_dm,hcswjg,czzt from np_bwqkdjb where lhqkdjbuuid=?

select d.dqzbzltzsuuid, d.swjgjg, d.zg, d.nh, d.wh, d.nsrmc,d.nsrsbh, d.jcajbh, d.ajxxuuid, d.pzswjg_dm, d.zgswjg_dm, d.zlssqjq,d.zlssqjz, d.szjzrq, d.lxrxm, d.lxdh, d.swjgdz, d.swjgdz, d.wszzrq from jc_dqzbzltzs d where d.dqzbzltzsuuid= $uuid$
select max(t.sjslid) as sjslid,max(t.ssnd) as ssnd from NP_GXSSYBTMXB t where t.zxtzbz='2' and t.tbnsdcajxxuuid=$uuid$ group by t.sjslid

SELECT T.YYDJSXXXUUID,T.YBHTSQDJBUUID,T.YYDJAPZSSQDJBUUID, T.DJXH,T.YYDJAPAJBH,T.YYDJAPAYBH,T.YYDJAPAJMC,T.YYDJQDLX_DM, T.YYDJAJZT_DM,T.YYDJAPLX_DM,T.APSYNDQ,T.APSYNDZ,T.APSYRQQ,T.APSYRQZ, T.NMSQBZ,T.SWJG_DM,T.LCSLID,T.LRRQ,T.XGRQ,T.XGR_DM,T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1,T.SJTB_SJ FROM NP_YYDJSXXX T WHERE T.YYDJSXXXUUID = $uuid$ OR T.LCSLID = $lcslid$ and nvl(T.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT FZZSDKPZUUID, JCAJXXUUID, SSWFAJXCHUUID, AJBH_1, SXWFSS, XCQZYQ, AJXCBG, CLJG, XCHFQX, WTFSWJG_DM, WTFSWJGDZ, YZBM, LXR_DM, LXDH, ZZR_DM, ZZRQ_2, ZFBZ_1, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZH_FJ_TYXCYQ_FZZSDKPZ WHERE SSWFAJXCHUUID = $sswfajxchuuid$ AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM NP_YYDJAPSQXQ_FSZLQK T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or T.YYDJSXXXUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or T.FJUUID = ?) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
select t.pgssqq,t.pgssqz,t.nspgxmmc from TD_FXFX_NSPGXMB t where t.nspgxmid=?

select x.jcajxxuuid, x.jcajbh, x.ajmc, y.nh dbhnh, y.zg dbhzg, y.swjgjg dbhswjgjg, y.wh dbhwh, y.wszzrq dbrq, y.dbswjg_dm, y.dbjgswj_dm, y.cbjgswj_dm, y.cbjg_dm, t.wsbh, t.xbjzrq, t.cxdbly, t.qtsx, t.zdsswfajdbhuuid, t.cbswjg_dm, t.czry_dm, t.czrq_1 from jc_sswfajcbhcxdbxxb t, jc_zdsswfajdbh y, jc_ajxx x where t.zdsswfajdbhuuid = y.zdsswfajdbhuuid and t.jcajxxuuid = x.jcajxxuuid and t.sswfajcbhcxdbuuid = $uuid$
select j.*,b.djxh,b.pgajbh from np_ssfxydbgjl j, np_ssfxydbg b where j.bguuid = b.bguuid and j.ajzt_dm = '010' and b.djxh = ? and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.* from jc_swcljdqkb t where (1=#macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.lcslid = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.sshj_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or t.zsxm_dm not in (#macroparam#)) and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')
